data.value: On the Day you see it every nursing mother will be distracted from that [child] she was nursing, and every pregnant woman will abort her pregnancy, and you will see the people [appearing] intoxicated while they are not intoxicated; but the punishment of Allah is severe.

data.name: Quran2598
data.value: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge and follows every rebellious devil.

data.name: Quran2599
data.value: It has been decreed for every devil that whoever turns to him - he will misguide him and will lead him to the punishment of the Blaze.

data.name: Quran2600
data.value: O People, if you should be in doubt about the Resurrection, then [consider that] indeed, We created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, and then from a lump of flesh, formed and unformed - that We may show you. And We settle in the wombs whom We will for a specified term, then We bring you out as a child, and then [We develop you] that you may reach your [time of] maturity. And among you is he who is taken in [early] death, and among you is he who is returned to the most decrepit [old] age so that he knows, after [once having] knowledge, nothing. And you see the earth barren, but when We send down upon it rain, it quivers and swells and grows [something] of every beautiful kind.

data.name: Quran2601
data.value: That is because Allah is the Truth and because He gives life to the dead and because He is over all things competent

data.name: Quran2602
data.value: And [that they may know] that the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - and that Allah will resurrect those in the graves.

data.name: Quran2603
data.value: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge or guidance or an enlightening book [from Him],

data.name: Quran2604
data.value: Twisting his neck [in arrogance] to mislead [people] from the way of Allah. For him in the world is disgrace, and We will make him taste on the Day of Resurrection the punishment of the Burning Fire [while it is said],

data.name: Quran2605
data.value: "That is for what your hands have put forth and because Allah is not ever unjust to [His] servants."

data.name: Quran2606
data.value: And of the people is he who worships Allah on an edge. If he is touched by good, he is reassured by it; but if he is struck by trial, he turns on his face [to the other direction]. He has lost [this] world and the Hereafter. That is what is the manifest loss.

data.name: Quran2607
data.value: He invokes instead of Allah that which neither harms him nor benefits him. That is what is the extreme error.

data.name: Quran2608
data.value: He invokes one whose harm is closer than his benefit - how wretched the protector and how wretched the associate.

data.name: Quran2609
data.value: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. Indeed, Allah does what He intends.

data.name: Quran2610
data.value: Whoever should think that Allah will not support [Prophet Muhammad] in this world and the Hereafter - let him extend a rope to the ceiling, then cut off [his breath], and let him see: will his effort remove that which enrages [him]?

data.name: Quran2611
data.value: And thus have We sent the Qur'an down as verses of clear evidence and because Allah guides whom He intends.

data.name: Quran2612
data.value: Indeed, those who have believed and those who were Jews and the Sabeans and the Christians and the Magians and those who associated with Allah - Allah will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, over all things, Witness.

data.name: Quran2613
data.value: Do you not see that to Allah prostrates whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth and the sun, the moon, the stars, the mountains, the trees, the moving creatures and many of the people? But upon many the punishment has been justified. And he whom Allah humiliates - for him there is no bestower of honor. Indeed, Allah does what He wills.

data.name: Quran2614
data.value: These are two adversaries who have disputed over their Lord. But those who disbelieved will have cut out for them garments of fire. Poured upon their heads will be scalding water

data.name: Quran2615
data.value: By which is melted that within their bellies and [their] skins.

data.name: Quran2616
data.value: And for [striking] them are maces of iron.

data.name: Quran2617
data.value: Every time they want to get out of Hellfire from anguish, they will be returned to it, and [it will be said], "Taste the punishment of the Burning Fire!"

data.name: Quran2618
data.value: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearl, and their garments therein will be silk.

data.name: Quran2619
data.value: And they had been guided [in worldly life] to good speech, and they were guided to the path of the Praiseworthy.

data.name: Quran2620
data.value: Indeed, those who have disbelieved and avert [people] from the way of Allah and [from] al-Masjid al-Haram, which We made for the people - equal are the resident therein and one from outside; and [also] whoever intends [a deed] therein of deviation [in religion] or wrongdoing - We will make him taste of a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran2621
data.value: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We designated for Abraham the site of the House, [saying], "Do not associate anything with Me and purify My House for those who perform Tawaf and those who stand [in prayer] and those who bow and prostrate.

data.name: Quran2622
data.value: And proclaim to the people the Hajj [pilgrimage]; they will come to you on foot and on every lean camel; they will come from every distant pass -

data.name: Quran2623
data.value: That they may witness benefits for themselves and mention the name of Allah on known days over what He has provided for them of [sacrificial] animals. So eat of them and feed the miserable and poor.

data.name: Quran2624
data.value: Then let them end their untidiness and fulfill their vows and perform Tawaf around the ancient House."

data.name: Quran2625
data.value: That [has been commanded], and whoever honors the sacred ordinances of Allah - it is best for him in the sight of his Lord. And permitted to you are the grazing livestock, except what is recited to you. So avoid the uncleanliness of idols and avoid false statement,

data.name: Quran2626
data.value: Inclining [only] to Allah, not associating [anything] with Him. And he who associates with Allah - it is as though he had fallen from the sky and was snatched by the birds or the wind carried him down into a remote place.

data.name: Quran2627
data.value: That [is so]. And whoever honors the symbols of Allah - indeed, it is from the piety of hearts.

data.name: Quran2628
data.value: For you the animals marked for sacrifice are benefits for a specified term; then their place of sacrifice is at the ancient House.

data.name: Quran2629
data.value: And for all religion We have appointed a rite [of sacrifice] that they may mention the name of Allah over what He has provided for them of [sacrificial] animals. For your god is one God, so to Him submit. And, [O Muhammad], give good tidings to the humble [before their Lord]

data.name: Quran2630
data.value: Who, when Allah is mentioned, their hearts are fearful, and [to] the patient over what has afflicted them, and the establishers of prayer and those who spend from what We have provided them.

data.name: Quran2631
data.value: And the camels and cattle We have appointed for you as among the symbols of Allah; for you therein is good. So mention the name of Allah upon them when lined up [for sacrifice]; and when they are [lifeless] on their sides, then eat from them and feed the needy and the beggar. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may be grateful.

data.name: Quran2632
data.value: Their meat will not reach Allah, nor will their blood, but what reaches Him is piety from you. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may glorify Allah for that [to] which He has guided you; and give good tidings to the doers of good.

data.name: Quran2633
data.value: Indeed, Allah defends those who have believed. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone treacherous and ungrateful.

data.name: Quran2634
data.value: Permission [to fight] has been given to those who are being fought, because they were wronged. And indeed, Allah is competent to give them victory.

data.name: Quran2635
data.value: [They are] those who have been evicted from their homes without right - only because they say, "Our Lord is Allah." And were it not that Allah checks the people, some by means of others, there would have been demolished monasteries, churches, synagogues, and mosques in which the name of Allah is much mentioned. And Allah will surely support those who support Him. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.

data.name: Quran2636
data.value: [And they are] those who, if We give them authority in the land, establish prayer and give zakah and enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong. And to Allah belongs the outcome of [all] matters.

data.name: Quran2637
data.value: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad] - so, before them, did the people of Noah and 'Aad and Thamud deny [their prophets],

data.name: Quran2638
data.value: And the people of Abraham and the people of Lot

data.name: Quran2639
data.value: And the inhabitants of Madyan. And Moses was denied, so I prolonged enjoyment for the disbelievers; then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My reproach.

data.name: Quran2640
data.value: And how many a city did We destroy while it was committing wrong - so it is [now] fallen into ruin - and [how many] an abandoned well and [how many] a lofty palace.

data.name: Quran2641
data.value: So have they not traveled through the earth and have hearts by which to reason and ears by which to hear? For indeed, it is not eyes that are blinded, but blinded are the hearts which are within the breasts.

data.name: Quran2642
data.value: And they urge you to hasten the punishment. But Allah will never fail in His promise. And indeed, a day with your Lord is like a thousand years of those which you count.

data.name: Quran2643
data.value: And for how many a city did I prolong enjoyment while it was committing wrong. Then I seized it, and to Me is the [final] destination.

data.name: Quran2644
data.value: Say, "O people, I am only to you a clear warner."

data.name: Quran2645
data.value: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - for them is forgiveness and noble provision.

data.name: Quran2646
data.value: But the ones who strove against Our verses, [seeking] to cause failure - those are the companions of Hellfire.

data.name: Quran2647
data.value: And We did not send before you any messenger or prophet except that when he spoke [or recited], Satan threw into it [some misunderstanding]. But Allah abolishes that which Satan throws in; then Allah makes precise His verses. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.

data.name: Quran2648
data.value: [That is] so He may make what Satan throws in a trial for those within whose hearts is disease and those hard of heart. And indeed, the wrongdoers are in extreme dissension.

data.name: Quran2649
data.value: And so those who were given knowledge may know that it is the truth from your Lord and [therefore] believe in it, and their hearts humbly submit to it. And indeed is Allah the Guide of those who have believed to a straight path.

data.name: Quran2650
data.value: But those who disbelieve will not cease to be in doubt of it until the Hour comes upon them unexpectedly or there comes to them the punishment of a barren Day.

data.name: Quran2651
data.value: [All] sovereignty that Day is for Allah; He will judge between them. So they who believed and did righteous deeds will be in the Gardens of Pleasure.

data.name: Quran2652
data.value: And they who disbelieved and denied Our signs - for those there will be a humiliating punishment.

data.name: Quran2653
data.value: And those who emigrated for the cause of Allah and then were killed or died - Allah will surely provide for them a good provision. And indeed, it is Allah who is the best of providers.

data.name: Quran2654
data.value: He will surely cause them to enter an entrance with which they will be pleased, and indeed, Allah is Knowing and Forbearing.

data.name: Quran2655
data.value: That [is so]. And whoever responds [to injustice] with the equivalent of that with which he was harmed and then is tyrannized - Allah will surely aid him. Indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving.

data.name: Quran2656
data.value: That is because Allah causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night and because Allah is Hearing and Seeing.

data.name: Quran2657
data.value: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that which they call upon other than Him is falsehood, and because Allah is the Most High, the Grand.

data.name: Quran2658
data.value: Do you not see that Allah has sent down rain from the sky and the earth becomes green? Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Acquainted.

data.name: Quran2659
data.value: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and what is on the earth. And indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.

data.name: Quran2660
data.value: Do you not see that Allah has subjected to you whatever is on the earth and the ships which run through the sea by His command? And He restrains the sky from falling upon the earth, unless by His permission. Indeed Allah, to the people, is Kind and Merciful.

data.name: Quran2661
data.value: And He is the one who gave you life; then He causes you to die and then will [again] give you life. Indeed, mankind is ungrateful.

data.name: Quran2662
data.value: For every religion We have appointed rites which they perform. So, [O Muhammad], let the disbelievers not contend with you over the matter but invite them to your Lord. Indeed, you are upon straight guidance.

data.name: Quran2663
data.value: And if they dispute with you, then say, "Allah is most knowing of what you do.

data.name: Quran2664
data.value: Allah will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which you used to differ."

data.name: Quran2665
data.value: Do you not know that Allah knows what is in the heaven and earth? Indeed, that is in a Record. Indeed that, for Allah, is easy.

data.name: Quran2666
data.value: And they worship besides Allah that for which He has not sent down authority and that of which they have no knowledge. And there will not be for the wrongdoers any helper.

data.name: Quran2667
data.value: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, you recognize in the faces of those who disbelieve disapproval. They are almost on the verge of assaulting those who recite to them Our verses. Say, "Then shall I inform you of [what is] worse than that? [It is] the Fire which Allah has promised those who disbelieve, and wretched is the destination."

data.name: Quran2668
data.value: O people, an example is presented, so listen to it. Indeed, those you invoke besides Allah will never create [as much as] a fly, even if they gathered together for that purpose. And if the fly should steal away from them a [tiny] thing, they could not recover it from him. Weak are the pursuer and pursued.

data.name: Quran2669
data.value: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.

data.name: Quran2670
data.value: Allah chooses from the angels messengers and from the people. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.

data.name: Quran2671
data.value: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them. And to Allah will be returned [all] matters.

data.name: Quran2672
data.value: O you who have believed, bow and prostrate and worship your Lord and do good - that you may succeed.

data.name: Quran2673
data.value: And strive for Allah with the striving due to Him. He has chosen you and has not placed upon you in the religion any difficulty. [It is] the religion of your father, Abraham. Allah named you "Muslims" before [in former scriptures] and in this [revelation] that the Messenger may be a witness over you and you may be witnesses over the people. So establish prayer and give zakah and hold fast to Allah. He is your protector; and excellent is the protector, and excellent is the helper.

data.name: Quran2674
data.value: Certainly will the believers have succeeded:

data.name: Quran2675
data.value: They who are during their prayer humbly submissive

data.name: Quran2676
data.value: And they who turn away from ill speech

data.name: Quran2677
data.value: And they who are observant of zakah

data.name: Quran2678
data.value: And they who guard their private parts

data.name: Quran2679
data.value: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they will not be blamed -

data.name: Quran2680
data.value: But whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the transgressors -

data.name: Quran2681
data.value: And they who are to their trusts and their promises attentive

data.name: Quran2682
data.value: And they who carefully maintain their prayers -

data.name: Quran2683
data.value: Those are the inheritors

data.name: Quran2684
data.value: Who will inherit al-Firdaus. They will abide therein eternally.

data.name: Quran2685
data.value: And certainly did We create man from an extract of clay.

data.name: Quran2686
data.value: Then We placed him as a sperm-drop in a firm lodging.

data.name: Quran2687
data.value: Then We made the sperm-drop into a clinging clot, and We made the clot into a lump [of flesh], and We made [from] the lump, bones, and We covered the bones with flesh; then We developed him into another creation. So blessed is Allah, the best of creators.

data.name: Quran2688
data.value: Then indeed, after that you are to die.

data.name: Quran2689
data.value: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, will be resurrected.

data.name: Quran2690
data.value: And We have created above you seven layered heavens, and never have We been of [Our] creation unaware.

data.name: Quran2691
data.value: And We have sent down rain from the sky in a measured amount and settled it in the earth. And indeed, We are Able to take it away.

data.name: Quran2692
data.value: And We brought forth for you thereby gardens of palm trees and grapevines in which for you are abundant fruits and from which you eat.

data.name: Quran2693
data.value: And [We brought forth] a tree issuing from Mount Sinai which produces oil and food for those who eat.

data.name: Quran2694
data.value: And indeed, for you in livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from that which is in their bellies, and for you in them are numerous benefits, and from them you eat.

data.name: Quran2695
data.value: And upon them and on ships you are carried.

data.name: Quran2696
data.value: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"

data.name: Quran2697
data.value: But the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "This is not but a man like yourselves who wishes to take precedence over you; and if Allah had willed [to send a messenger], He would have sent down angels. We have not heard of this among our forefathers.

data.name: Quran2698
data.value: He is not but a man possessed with madness, so wait concerning him for a time."

data.name: Quran2699
data.value: [Noah] said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."

data.name: Quran2700
data.value: So We inspired to him, "Construct the ship under Our observation, and Our inspiration, and when Our command comes and the oven overflows, put into the ship from each [creature] two mates and your family, except those for whom the decree [of destruction] has proceeded. And do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are to be drowned.

data.name: Quran2701
data.value: And when you have boarded the ship, you and those with you, then say, 'Praise to Allah who has saved us from the wrongdoing people.'

data.name: Quran2702
data.value: And say, 'My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].' "

data.name: Quran2703
data.value: Indeed in that are signs, and indeed, We are ever testing [Our servants].

data.name: Quran2704
data.value: Then We produced after them a generation of others.

data.name: Quran2705
data.value: And We sent among them a messenger from themselves, [saying], "Worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"

data.name: Quran2706
data.value: And the eminent among his people who disbelieved and denied the meeting of the Hereafter while We had given them luxury in the worldly life said, "This is not but a man like yourselves. He eats of that from which you eat and drinks of what you drink.

data.name: Quran2707
data.value: And if you should obey a man like yourselves, indeed, you would then be losers.

data.name: Quran2708
data.value: Does he promise you that when you have died and become dust and bones that you will be brought forth [once more]?

data.name: Quran2709
data.value: How far, how far, is that which you are promised.

data.name: Quran2710
data.value: Life is not but our worldly life - we die and live, but we will not be resurrected.

data.name: Quran2711
data.value: He is not but a man who has invented a lie about Allah, and we will not believe him."

data.name: Quran2712
data.value: He said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."

data.name: Quran2713
data.value: [Allah] said, "After a little, they will surely become regretful."

data.name: Quran2714
data.value: So the shriek seized them in truth, and We made them as [plant] stubble. Then away with the wrongdoing people.

data.name: Quran2715
data.value: Then We produced after them other generations.

data.name: Quran2716
data.value: No nation will precede its time [of termination], nor will they remain [thereafter].

data.name: Quran2717
data.value: Then We sent Our messengers in succession. Every time there came to a nation its messenger, they denied him, so We made them follow one another [to destruction], and We made them narrations. So away with a people who do not believe.

data.name: Quran2718
data.value: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear authority

data.name: Quran2719
data.value: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they were arrogant and were a haughty people.

data.name: Quran2720
data.value: They said, "Should we believe two men like ourselves while their people are for us in servitude?"

data.name: Quran2721
data.value: So they denied them and were of those destroyed.

data.name: Quran2722
data.value: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture that perhaps they would be guided.

data.name: Quran2723
data.value: And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign and sheltered them within a high ground having level [areas] and flowing water.

data.name: Quran2724
data.value: [Allah said], "O messengers, eat from the good foods and work righteousness. Indeed, I, of what you do, am Knowing.

data.name: Quran2725
data.value: And indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so fear Me."

data.name: Quran2726
data.value: But the people divided their religion among them into sects - each faction, in what it has, rejoicing.

data.name: Quran2727
data.value: So leave them in their confusion for a time.

data.name: Quran2728
data.value: Do they think that what We extend to them of wealth and children

data.name: Quran2729
data.value: Is [because] We hasten for them good things? Rather, they do not perceive.

data.name: Quran2730
data.value: Indeed, they who are apprehensive from fear of their Lord

data.name: Quran2731
data.value: And they who believe in the signs of their Lord

data.name: Quran2732
data.value: And they who do not associate anything with their Lord

data.name: Quran2733
data.value: And they who give what they give while their hearts are fearful because they will be returning to their Lord -

data.name: Quran2734
data.value: It is those who hasten to good deeds, and they outstrip [others] therein.

data.name: Quran2735
data.value: And We charge no soul except [with that within] its capacity, and with Us is a record which speaks with truth; and they will not be wronged.

data.name: Quran2736
data.value: But their hearts are covered with confusion over this, and they have [evil] deeds besides disbelief which they are doing,

data.name: Quran2737
data.value: Until when We seize their affluent ones with punishment, at once they are crying [to Allah] for help.

data.name: Quran2738
data.value: Do not cry out today. Indeed, by Us you will not be helped.

data.name: Quran2739
data.value: My verses had already been recited to you, but you were turning back on your heels

data.name: Quran2740
data.value: In arrogance regarding it, conversing by night, speaking evil.

data.name: Quran2741
data.value: Then have they not reflected over the Qur'an, or has there come to them that which had not come to their forefathers?

data.name: Quran2742
data.value: Or did they not know their Messenger, so they are toward him disacknowledging?

data.name: Quran2743
data.value: Or do they say, "In him is madness?" Rather, he brought them the truth, but most of them, to the truth, are averse.

data.name: Quran2744
data.value: But if the Truth had followed their inclinations, the heavens and the earth and whoever is in them would have been ruined. Rather, We have brought them their message, but they, from their message, are turning away.

data.name: Quran2745
data.value: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask them for payment? But the reward of your Lord is best, and He is the best of providers.

data.name: Quran2746
data.value: And indeed, you invite them to a straight path.

data.name: Quran2747
data.value: But indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter are deviating from the path.

data.name: Quran2748
data.value: And even if We gave them mercy and removed what was upon them of affliction, they would persist in their transgression, wandering blindly.

data.name: Quran2749
data.value: And We had gripped them with suffering [as a warning], but they did not yield to their Lord, nor did they humbly supplicate, [and will continue thus]

data.name: Quran2750
data.value: Until when We have opened before them a door of severe punishment, immediately they will be therein in despair.

data.name: Quran2751
data.value: And it is He who produced for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful.

data.name: Quran2752
data.value: And it is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered.

data.name: Quran2753
data.value: And it is He who gives life and causes death, and His is the alternation of the night and the day. Then will you not reason?

data.name: Quran2754
data.value: Rather, they say like what the former peoples said.

data.name: Quran2755
data.value: They said, "When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?

data.name: Quran2756
data.value: We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before; this is not but legends of the former peoples."

data.name: Quran2757
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "To whom belongs the earth and whoever is in it, if you should know?"

data.name: Quran2758
data.value: They will say, "To Allah." Say, "Then will you not remember?"

data.name: Quran2759
data.value: Say, "Who is Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Great Throne?"

data.name: Quran2760
data.value: They will say, "[They belong] to Allah." Say, "Then will you not fear Him?"

data.name: Quran2761
data.value: Say, "In whose hand is the realm of all things - and He protects while none can protect against Him - if you should know?"

data.name: Quran2762
data.value: They will say, "[All belongs] to Allah." Say, "Then how are you deluded?"

data.name: Quran2763
data.value: Rather, We have brought them the truth, and indeed they are liars.

data.name: Quran2764
data.value: Allah has not taken any son, nor has there ever been with Him any deity. [If there had been], then each deity would have taken what it created, and some of them would have sought to overcome others. Exalted is Allah above what they describe [concerning Him].

data.name: Quran2765
data.value: [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, so high is He above what they associate [with Him].

data.name: Quran2766
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord, if You should show me that which they are promised,

data.name: Quran2767
data.value: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people."

data.name: Quran2768
data.value: And indeed, We are able to show you what We have promised them.

data.name: Quran2769
data.value: Repel, by [means of] what is best, [their] evil. We are most knowing of what they describe.

data.name: Quran2770
data.value: And say, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils,

data.name: Quran2771
data.value: And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, lest they be present with me."

data.name: Quran2772
data.value: [For such is the state of the disbelievers], until, when death comes to one of them, he says, "My Lord, send me back

data.name: Quran2773
data.value: That I might do righteousness in that which I left behind." No! It is only a word he is saying; and behind them is a barrier until the Day they are resurrected.

data.name: Quran2774
data.value: So when the Horn is blown, no relationship will there be among them that Day, nor will they ask about one another.

data.name: Quran2775
data.value: And those whose scales are heavy [with good deeds] - it is they who are the successful.

data.name: Quran2776
data.value: But those whose scales are light - those are the ones who have lost their souls, [being] in Hell, abiding eternally.

data.name: Quran2777
data.value: The Fire will sear their faces, and they therein will have taut smiles.

data.name: Quran2778
data.value: [It will be said]. "Were not My verses recited to you and you used to deny them?"

data.name: Quran2779
data.value: They will say, "Our Lord, our wretchedness overcame us, and we were a people astray.

data.name: Quran2780
data.value: Our Lord, remove us from it, and if we were to return [to evil], we would indeed be wrongdoers."

data.name: Quran2781
data.value: He will say, "Remain despised therein and do not speak to Me.

data.name: Quran2782
data.value: Indeed, there was a party of My servants who said, 'Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us and have mercy upon us, and You are the best of the merciful.'

data.name: Quran2783
data.value: But you took them in mockery to the point that they made you forget My remembrance, and you used to laugh at them.

data.name: Quran2784
data.value: Indeed, I have rewarded them this Day for their patient endurance - that they are the attainers [of success]."

data.name: Quran2785
data.value: [Allah] will say, "How long did you remain on earth in number of years?"

data.name: Quran2786
data.value: They will say, "We remained a day or part of a day; ask those who enumerate."

data.name: Quran2787
data.value: He will say, "You stayed not but a little - if only you had known.

data.name: Quran2788
data.value: Then did you think that We created you uselessly and that to Us you would not be returned?"

data.name: Quran2789
data.value: So exalted is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth; there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Noble Throne.

data.name: Quran2790
data.value: And whoever invokes besides Allah another deity for which he has no proof - then his account is only with his Lord. Indeed, the disbelievers will not succeed.

data.name: Quran2791
data.value: And, [O Muhammad], say, "My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful."

data.name: Quran2792
data.value: [This is] a surah which We have sent down and made [that within it] obligatory and revealed therein verses of clear evidence that you might remember.

data.name: Quran2793
data.value: The [unmarried] woman or [unmarried] man found guilty of sexual intercourse - lash each one of them with a hundred lashes, and do not be taken by pity for them in the religion of Allah, if you should believe in Allah and the Last Day. And let a group of the believers witness their punishment.

data.name: Quran2794
data.value: The fornicator does not marry except a [female] fornicator or polytheist, and none marries her except a fornicator or a polytheist, and that has been made unlawful to the believers.

data.name: Quran2795
data.value: And those who accuse chaste women and then do not produce four witnesses - lash them with eighty lashes and do not accept from them testimony ever after. And those are the defiantly disobedient,

data.name: Quran2796
data.value: Except for those who repent thereafter and reform, for indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran2797
data.value: And those who accuse their wives [of adultery] and have no witnesses except themselves - then the witness of one of them [shall be] four testimonies [swearing] by Allah that indeed, he is of the truthful.

data.name: Quran2798
data.value: And the fifth [oath will be] that the curse of Allah be upon him if he should be among the liars.

data.name: Quran2799
data.value: But it will prevent punishment from her if she gives four testimonies [swearing] by Allah that indeed, he is of the liars.

data.name: Quran2800
data.value: And the fifth [oath will be] that the wrath of Allah be upon her if he was of the truthful.

data.name: Quran2801
data.value: And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy... and because Allah is Accepting of repentance and Wise.

data.name: Quran2802
data.value: Indeed, those who came with falsehood are a group among you. Do not think it bad for you; rather it is good for you. For every person among them is what [punishment] he has earned from the sin, and he who took upon himself the greater portion thereof - for him is a great punishment.

data.name: Quran2803
data.value: Why, when you heard it, did not the believing men and believing women think good of one another and say, "This is an obvious falsehood"?

data.name: Quran2804
data.value: Why did they [who slandered] not produce for it four witnesses? And when they do not produce the witnesses, then it is they, in the sight of Allah, who are the liars.

data.name: Quran2805
data.value: And if it had not been for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy in this world and the Hereafter, you would have been touched for that [lie] in which you were involved by a great punishment

data.name: Quran2806
data.value: When you received it with your tongues and said with your mouths that of which you had no knowledge and thought it was insignificant while it was, in the sight of Allah, tremendous.

data.name: Quran2807
data.value: And why, when you heard it, did you not say, "It is not for us to speak of this. Exalted are You, [O Allah]; this is a great slander"?

data.name: Quran2808
data.value: Allah warns you against returning to the likes of this [conduct], ever, if you should be believers.

data.name: Quran2809
data.value: And Allah makes clear to you the verses, and Allah is Knowing and Wise.

data.name: Quran2810
data.value: Indeed, those who like that immorality should be spread [or publicized] among those who have believed will have a painful punishment in this world and the Hereafter. And Allah knows and you do not know.

data.name: Quran2811
data.value: And if it had not been for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy... and because Allah is Kind and Merciful.

data.name: Quran2812
data.value: O you who have believed, do not follow the footsteps of Satan. And whoever follows the footsteps of Satan - indeed, he enjoins immorality and wrongdoing. And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy, not one of you would have been pure, ever, but Allah purifies whom He wills, and Allah is Hearing and Knowing.

data.name: Quran2813
data.value: And let not those of virtue among you and wealth swear not to give [aid] to their relatives and the needy and the emigrants for the cause of Allah, and let them pardon and overlook. Would you not like that Allah should forgive you? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran2814
data.value: Indeed, those who [falsely] accuse chaste, unaware and believing women are cursed in this world and the Hereafter; and they will have a great punishment

data.name: Quran2815
data.value: On a Day when their tongues, their hands and their feet will bear witness against them as to what they used to do.

data.name: Quran2816
data.value: That Day, Allah will pay them in full their deserved recompense, and they will know that it is Allah who is the perfect in justice.

data.name: Quran2817
data.value: Evil words are for evil men, and evil men are [subjected] to evil words. And good words are for good men, and good men are [an object] of good words. Those [good people] are declared innocent of what the slanderers say. For them is forgiveness and noble provision.

data.name: Quran2818
data.value: O you who have believed, do not enter houses other than your own houses until you ascertain welcome and greet their inhabitants. That is best for you; perhaps you will be reminded.

data.name: Quran2819
data.value: And if you do not find anyone therein, do not enter them until permission has been given you. And if it is said to you, "Go back," then go back; it is purer for you. And Allah is Knowing of what you do.

data.name: Quran2820
data.value: There is no blame upon you for entering houses not inhabited in which there is convenience for you. And Allah knows what you reveal and what you conceal.

data.name: Quran2821
data.value: Tell the believing men to reduce [some] of their vision and guard their private parts. That is purer for them. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what they do.

data.name: Quran2822
data.value: And tell the believing women to reduce [some] of their vision and guard their private parts and not expose their adornment except that which [necessarily] appears thereof and to wrap [a portion of] their headcovers over their chests and not expose their adornment except to their husbands, their fathers, their husbands' fathers, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers, their brothers' sons, their sisters' sons, their women, that which their right hands possess, or those male attendants having no physical desire, or children who are not yet aware of the private aspects of women. And let them not stamp their feet to make known what they conceal of their adornment. And turn to Allah in repentance, all of you, O believers, that you might succeed.

data.name: Quran2823
data.value: And marry the unmarried among you and the righteous among your male slaves and female slaves. If they should be poor, Allah will enrich them from His bounty, and Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.

data.name: Quran2824
data.value: But let them who find not [the means for] marriage abstain [from sexual relations] until Allah enriches them from His bounty. And those who seek a contract [for eventual emancipation] from among whom your right hands possess - then make a contract with them if you know there is within them goodness and give them from the wealth of Allah which He has given you. And do not compel your slave girls to prostitution, if they desire chastity, to seek [thereby] the temporary interests of worldly life. And if someone should compel them, then indeed, Allah is [to them], after their compulsion, Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran2825
data.value: And We have certainly sent down to you distinct verses and examples from those who passed on before you and an admonition for those who fear Allah.

data.name: Quran2826
data.value: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth. The example of His light is like a niche within which is a lamp, the lamp is within glass, the glass as if it were a pearly [white] star lit from [the oil of] a blessed olive tree, neither of the east nor of the west, whose oil would almost glow even if untouched by fire. Light upon light. Allah guides to His light whom He wills. And Allah presents examples for the people, and Allah is Knowing of all things.

data.name: Quran2827
data.value: [Such niches are] in mosques which Allah has ordered to be raised and that His name be mentioned therein; exalting Him within them in the morning and the evenings

data.name: Quran2828
data.value: [Are] men whom neither commerce nor sale distracts from the remembrance of Allah and performance of prayer and giving of zakah. They fear a Day in which the hearts and eyes will [fearfully] turn about -

data.name: Quran2829
data.value: That Allah may reward them [according to] the best of what they did and increase them from His bounty. And Allah gives provision to whom He wills without account.

data.name: Quran2830
data.value: But those who disbelieved - their deeds are like a mirage in a lowland which a thirsty one thinks is water until, when he comes to it, he finds it is nothing but finds Allah before Him, and He will pay him in full his due; and Allah is swift in account.

data.name: Quran2831
data.value: Or [they are] like darknesses within an unfathomable sea which is covered by waves, upon which are waves, over which are clouds - darknesses, some of them upon others. When one puts out his hand [therein], he can hardly see it. And he to whom Allah has not granted light - for him there is no light.

data.name: Quran2832
data.value: Do you not see that Allah is exalted by whomever is within the heavens and the earth and [by] the birds with wings spread [in flight]? Each [of them] has known his [means of] prayer and exalting [Him], and Allah is Knowing of what they do.

data.name: Quran2833
data.value: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and to Allah is the destination.

data.name: Quran2834
data.value: Do you not see that Allah drives clouds? Then He brings them together, then He makes them into a mass, and you see the rain emerge from within it. And He sends down from the sky, mountains [of clouds] within which is hail, and He strikes with it whom He wills and averts it from whom He wills. The flash of its lightening almost takes away the eyesight.

data.name: Quran2835
data.value: Allah alternates the night and the day. Indeed in that is a lesson for those who have vision.

data.name: Quran2836
data.value: Allah has created every [living] creature from water. And of them are those that move on their bellies, and of them are those that walk on two legs, and of them are those that walk on four. Allah creates what He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.

data.name: Quran2837
data.value: We have certainly sent down distinct verses. And Allah guides whom He wills to a straight path.

data.name: Quran2838
data.value: But the hypocrites say, "We have believed in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey"; then a party of them turns away after that. And those are not believers.

data.name: Quran2839
data.value: And when they are called to [the words of] Allah and His Messenger to judge between them, at once a party of them turns aside [in refusal].

data.name: Quran2840
data.value: But if the right is theirs, they come to him in prompt obedience.

data.name: Quran2841
data.value: Is there disease in their hearts? Or have they doubted? Or do they fear that Allah will be unjust to them, or His Messenger? Rather, it is they who are the wrongdoers.

data.name: Quran2842
data.value: The only statement of the [true] believers when they are called to Allah and His Messenger to judge between them is that they say, "We hear and we obey." And those are the successful.

data.name: Quran2843
data.value: And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger and fears Allah and is conscious of Him - it is those who are the attainers.

data.name: Quran2844
data.value: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths that if you ordered them, they would go forth [in Allah 's cause]. Say, "Do not swear. [Such] obedience is known. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with that which you do."

data.name: Quran2845
data.value: Say, "Obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon him is only that [duty] with which he has been charged, and upon you is that with which you have been charged. And if you obey him, you will be [rightly] guided. And there is not upon the Messenger except the [responsibility for] clear notification."

data.name: Quran2846
data.value: Allah has promised those who have believed among you and done righteous deeds that He will surely grant them succession [to authority] upon the earth just as He granted it to those before them and that He will surely establish for them [therein] their religion which He has preferred for them and that He will surely substitute for them, after their fear, security, [for] they worship Me, not associating anything with Me. But whoever disbelieves after that - then those are the defiantly disobedient.

data.name: Quran2847
data.value: And establish prayer and give zakah and obey the Messenger - that you may receive mercy.

data.name: Quran2848
data.value: Never think that the disbelievers are causing failure [to Allah] upon the earth. Their refuge will be the Fire - and how wretched the destination.

data.name: Quran2849
data.value: O you who have believed, let those whom your right hands possess and those who have not [yet] reached puberty among you ask permission of you [before entering] at three times: before the dawn prayer and when you put aside your clothing [for rest] at noon and after the night prayer. [These are] three times of privacy for you. There is no blame upon you nor upon them beyond these [periods], for they continually circulate among you - some of you, among others. Thus does Allah make clear to you the verses; and Allah is Knowing and Wise.

data.name: Quran2850
data.value: And when the children among you reach puberty, let them ask permission [at all times] as those before them have done. Thus does Allah make clear to you His verses; and Allah is Knowing and Wise.

data.name: Quran2851
data.value: And women of post-menstrual age who have no desire for marriage - there is no blame upon them for putting aside their outer garments [but] not displaying adornment. But to modestly refrain [from that] is better for them. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing.

data.name: Quran2852
data.value: There is not upon the blind [any] constraint nor upon the lame constraint nor upon the ill constraint nor upon yourselves when you eat from your [own] houses or the houses of your fathers or the houses of your mothers or the houses of your brothers or the houses of your sisters or the houses of your father's brothers or the houses of your father's sisters or the houses of your mother's brothers or the houses of your mother's sisters or [from houses] whose keys you possess or [from the house] of your friend. There is no blame upon you whether you eat together or separately. But when you enter houses, give greetings of peace upon each other - a greeting from Allah, blessed and good. Thus does Allah make clear to you the verses [of ordinance] that you may understand.

data.name: Quran2853
data.value: The believers are only those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and, when they are [meeting] with him for a matter of common interest, do not depart until they have asked his permission. Indeed, those who ask your permission, [O Muhammad] - those are the ones who believe in Allah and His Messenger. So when they ask your permission for something of their affairs, then give permission to whom you will among them and ask forgiveness for them of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran2854
data.value: Do not make [your] calling of the Messenger among yourselves as the call of one of you to another. Already Allah knows those of you who slip away, concealed by others. So let those beware who dissent from the Prophet's order, lest fitnah strike them or a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran2855
data.value: Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. Already He knows that upon which you [stand] and [knows] the Day when they will be returned to Him and He will inform them of what they have done. And Allah is Knowing of all things.

data.name: Quran2856
data.value: Blessed is He who sent down the Criterion upon His Servant that he may be to the worlds a warner -

data.name: Quran2857
data.value: He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and who has not taken a son and has not had a partner in dominion and has created each thing and determined it with [precise] determination.

data.name: Quran2858
data.value: But they have taken besides Him gods which create nothing, while they are created, and possess not for themselves any harm or benefit and possess not [power to cause] death or life or resurrection.

data.name: Quran2859
data.value: And those who disbelieve say, "This [Qur'an] is not except a falsehood he invented, and another people assisted him in it." But they have committed an injustice and a lie.

data.name: Quran2860
data.value: And they say, "Legends of the former peoples which he has written down, and they are dictated to him morning and afternoon."

data.name: Quran2861
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed by He who knows [every] secret within the heavens and the earth. Indeed, He is ever Forgiving and Merciful."

data.name: Quran2862
data.value: And they say, "What is this messenger that eats food and walks in the markets? Why was there not sent down to him an angel so he would be with him a warner?

data.name: Quran2863
data.value: Or [why is not] a treasure presented to him [from heaven], or does he [not] have a garden from which he eats?" And the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic."

data.name: Quran2864
data.value: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way.

data.name: Quran2865
data.value: Blessed is He who, if He willed, could have made for you [something] better than that - gardens beneath which rivers flow - and could make for you palaces.

data.name: Quran2866
data.value: But they have denied the Hour, and We have prepared for those who deny the Hour a Blaze.

data.name: Quran2867
data.value: When the Hellfire sees them from a distant place, they will hear its fury and roaring.

data.name: Quran2868
data.value: And when they are thrown into a narrow place therein bound in chains, they will cry out thereupon for destruction.

data.name: Quran2869
data.value: [They will be told], "Do not cry this Day for one destruction but cry for much destruction."

data.name: Quran2870
data.value: Say, "Is that better or the Garden of Eternity which is promised to the righteous? It will be for them a reward and destination.

data.name: Quran2871
data.value: For them therein is whatever they wish, [while] abiding eternally. It is ever upon your Lord a promise [worthy to be] requested.

data.name: Quran2872
data.value: And [mention] the Day He will gather them and that which they worship besides Allah and will say, "Did you mislead these, My servants, or did they [themselves] stray from the way?"

data.name: Quran2873
data.value: They will say, "Exalted are You! It was not for us to take besides You any allies. But You provided comforts for them and their fathers until they forgot the message and became a people ruined."

data.name: Quran2874
data.value: So they will deny you, [disbelievers], in what you say, and you cannot avert [punishment] or [find] help. And whoever commits injustice among you - We will make him taste a great punishment.

data.name: Quran2875
data.value: And We did not send before you, [O Muhammad], any of the messengers except that they ate food and walked in the markets. And We have made some of you [people] as trial for others - will you have patience? And ever is your Lord, Seeing.

data.name: Quran2876
data.value: And those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, "Why were not angels sent down to us, or [why] do we [not] see our Lord?" They have certainly become arrogant within themselves and [become] insolent with great insolence.

data.name: Quran2877
data.value: The day they see the angels - no good tidings will there be that day for the criminals, and [the angels] will say, "Prevented and inaccessible."

data.name: Quran2878
data.value: And We will regard what they have done of deeds and make them as dust dispersed.

data.name: Quran2879
data.value: The companions of Paradise, that Day, are [in] a better settlement and better resting place.

data.name: Quran2880
data.value: And [mention] the Day when the heaven will split open with [emerging] clouds, and the angels will be sent down in successive descent.

data.name: Quran2881
data.value: True sovereignty, that Day, is for the Most Merciful. And it will be upon the disbelievers a difficult Day.

data.name: Quran2882
data.value: And the Day the wrongdoer will bite on his hands [in regret] he will say, "Oh, I wish I had taken with the Messenger a way.

data.name: Quran2883
data.value: Oh, woe to me! I wish I had not taken that one as a friend.

data.name: Quran2884
data.value: He led me away from the remembrance after it had come to me. And ever is Satan, to man, a deserter."

data.name: Quran2885
data.value: And the Messenger has said, "O my Lord, indeed my people have taken this Qur'an as [a thing] abandoned."

data.name: Quran2886
data.value: And thus have We made for every prophet an enemy from among the criminals. But sufficient is your Lord as a guide and a helper.

data.name: Quran2887
data.value: And those who disbelieve say, "Why was the Qur'an not revealed to him all at once?" Thus [it is] that We may strengthen thereby your heart. And We have spaced it distinctly.

data.name: Quran2888
data.value: And they do not come to you with an argument except that We bring you the truth and the best explanation.

data.name: Quran2889
data.value: The ones who are gathered on their faces to Hell - those are the worst in position and farthest astray in [their] way.

data.name: Quran2890
data.value: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture and appointed with him his brother Aaron as an assistant.

data.name: Quran2891
data.value: And We said, "Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs." Then We destroyed them with [complete] destruction.

data.name: Quran2892
data.value: And the people of Noah - when they denied the messengers, We drowned them, and We made them for mankind a sign. And We have prepared for the wrongdoers a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran2893
data.value: And [We destroyed] 'Aad and Thamud and the companions of the well and many generations between them.

data.name: Quran2894
data.value: And for each We presented examples [as warnings], and each We destroyed with [total] destruction.

data.name: Quran2895
data.value: And they have already come upon the town which was showered with a rain of evil. So have they not seen it? But they are not expecting resurrection.

data.name: Quran2896
data.value: And when they see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one whom Allah has sent as a messenger?

data.name: Quran2897
data.value: He almost would have misled us from our gods had we not been steadfast in [worship of] them." But they are going to know, when they see the punishment, who is farthest astray in [his] way.

data.name: Quran2898
data.value: Have you seen the one who takes as his god his own desire? Then would you be responsible for him?

data.name: Quran2899
data.value: Or do you think that most of them hear or reason? They are not except like livestock. Rather, they are [even] more astray in [their] way.

data.name: Quran2900
data.value: Have you not considered your Lord - how He extends the shadow, and if He willed, He could have made it stationary? Then We made the sun for it an indication.

data.name: Quran2901
data.value: Then We hold it in hand for a brief grasp.

data.name: Quran2902
data.value: And it is He who has made the night for you as clothing and sleep [a means for] rest and has made the day a resurrection.

data.name: Quran2903
data.value: And it is He who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy, and We send down from the sky pure water

data.name: Quran2904
data.value: That We may bring to life thereby a dead land and give it as drink to those We created of numerous livestock and men.

data.name: Quran2905
data.value: And We have certainly distributed it among them that they might be reminded, but most of the people refuse except disbelief.

data.name: Quran2906
data.value: And if We had willed, We could have sent into every city a warner.

data.name: Quran2907
data.value: So do not obey the disbelievers, and strive against them with the Qur'an a great striving.

data.name: Quran2908
data.value: And it is He who has released [simultaneously] the two seas, one fresh and sweet and one salty and bitter, and He placed between them a barrier and prohibiting partition.

data.name: Quran2909
data.value: And it is He who has created from water a human being and made him [a relative by] lineage and marriage. And ever is your Lord competent [concerning creation].

data.name: Quran2910
data.value: But they worship rather than Allah that which does not benefit them or harm them, and the disbeliever is ever, against his Lord, an assistant [to Satan].

data.name: Quran2911
data.value: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner.

data.name: Quran2912
data.value: Say, "I do not ask of you for it any payment - only that whoever wills might take to his Lord a way."

data.name: Quran2913
data.value: And rely upon the Ever-Living who does not die, and exalt [Allah] with His praise. And sufficient is He to be, with the sins of His servants, Acquainted -

data.name: Quran2914
data.value: He who created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six days and then established Himself above the Throne - the Most Merciful, so ask about Him one well informed.

data.name: Quran2915
data.value: And when it is said to them, "Prostrate to the Most Merciful," they say, "And what is the Most Merciful? Should we prostrate to that which you order us?" And it increases them in aversion.

data.name: Quran2916
data.value: Blessed is He who has placed in the sky great stars and placed therein a [burning] lamp and luminous moon.

data.name: Quran2917
data.value: And it is He who has made the night and the day in succession for whoever desires to remember or desires gratitude.

data.name: Quran2918
data.value: And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily, and when the ignorant address them [harshly], they say [words of] peace,

data.name: Quran2919
data.value: And those who spend [part of] the night to their Lord prostrating and standing [in prayer]

data.name: Quran2920
data.value: And those who say, "Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell. Indeed, its punishment is ever adhering;

data.name: Quran2921
data.value: Indeed, it is evil as a settlement and residence."

data.name: Quran2922
data.value: And [they are] those who, when they spend, do so not excessively or sparingly but are ever, between that, [justly] moderate

data.name: Quran2923
data.value: And those who do not invoke with Allah another deity or kill the soul which Allah has forbidden [to be killed], except by right, and do not commit unlawful sexual intercourse. And whoever should do that will meet a penalty.

data.name: Quran2924
data.value: Multiplied for him is the punishment on the Day of Resurrection, and he will abide therein humiliated -

data.name: Quran2925
data.value: Except for those who repent, believe and do righteous work. For them Allah will replace their evil deeds with good. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran2926
data.value: And he who repents and does righteousness does indeed turn to Allah with [accepted] repentance.

data.name: Quran2927
data.value: And [they are] those who do not testify to falsehood, and when they pass near ill speech, they pass by with dignity.

data.name: Quran2928
data.value: And those who, when reminded of the verses of their Lord, do not fall upon them deaf and blind.

data.name: Quran2929
data.value: And those who say, "Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous."

data.name: Quran2930
data.value: Those will be awarded the Chamber for what they patiently endured, and they will be received therein with greetings and [words of] peace.

data.name: Quran2931
data.value: Abiding eternally therein. Good is the settlement and residence.

data.name: Quran2932
data.value: Say, "What would my Lord care for you if not for your supplication?" For you [disbelievers] have denied, so your denial is going to be adherent.

data.name: Quran2933
data.value: Ta, Seen, Meem.

data.name: Quran2934
data.value: These are the verses of the clear Book.

data.name: Quran2935
data.value: Perhaps, [O Muhammad], you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers.

data.name: Quran2936
data.value: If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled.

data.name: Quran2937
data.value: And no revelation comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it.

data.name: Quran2938
data.value: For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule.

data.name: Quran2939
data.value: Did they not look at the earth - how much We have produced therein from every noble kind?

data.name: Quran2940
data.value: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

data.name: Quran2941
data.value: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

data.name: Quran2942
data.value: And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people -

data.name: Quran2943
data.value: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Allah?"

data.name: Quran2944
data.value: He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me

data.name: Quran2945
data.value: And that my breast will tighten and my tongue will not be fluent, so send for Aaron.

data.name: Quran2946
data.value: And they have upon me a [claim due to] sin, so I fear that they will kill me."

data.name: Quran2947
data.value: [Allah] said, "No. Go both of you with Our signs; indeed, We are with you, listening.

data.name: Quran2948
data.value: Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers of the Lord of the worlds,

data.name: Quran2949
data.value: [Commanded to say], "Send with us the Children of Israel."'"

data.name: Quran2950
data.value: [Pharaoh] said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life?

data.name: Quran2951
data.value: And [then] you did your deed which you did, and you were of the ungrateful."

data.name: Quran2952
data.value: [Moses] said, "I did it, then, while I was of those astray.

data.name: Quran2953
data.value: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and prophethood and appointed me [as one] of the messengers.

data.name: Quran2954
data.value: And is this a favor of which you remind me - that you have enslaved the Children of Israel?"

data.name: Quran2955
data.value: Said Pharaoh, "And what is the Lord of the worlds?"

data.name: Quran2956
data.value: [Moses] said, "The Lord of the heavens and earth and that between them, if you should be convinced."

data.name: Quran2957
data.value: [Pharaoh] said to those around him, "Do you not hear?"

data.name: Quran2958
data.value: [Moses] said, "Your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers."

data.name: Quran2959
data.value: [Pharaoh] said, "Indeed, your 'messenger' who has been sent to you is mad."

data.name: Quran2960
data.value: [Moses] said, "Lord of the east and the west and that between them, if you were to reason."

data.name: Quran2961
data.value: [Pharaoh] said, "If you take a god other than me, I will surely place you among those imprisoned."

data.name: Quran2962
data.value: [Moses] said, "Even if I brought you proof manifest?"

data.name: Quran2963
data.value: [Pharaoh] said, "Then bring it, if you should be of the truthful."

data.name: Quran2964
data.value: So [Moses] threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent manifest.

data.name: Quran2965
data.value: And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white for the observers.

data.name: Quran2966
data.value: [Pharaoh] said to the eminent ones around him, "Indeed, this is a learned magician.

data.name: Quran2967
data.value: He wants to drive you out of your land by his magic, so what do you advise?"

data.name: Quran2968
data.value: They said, "Postpone [the matter of] him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers

data.name: Quran2969
data.value: Who will bring you every learned, skilled magician."

data.name: Quran2970
data.value: So the magicians were assembled for the appointment of a well-known day.

data.name: Quran2971
data.value: And it was said to the people, "Will you congregate

data.name: Quran2972
data.value: That we might follow the magicians if they are the predominant?"

data.name: Quran2973
data.value: And when the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, "Is there indeed for us a reward if we are the predominant?"

data.name: Quran2974
data.value: He said, "Yes, and indeed, you will then be of those near [to me]."

data.name: Quran2975
data.value: Moses said to them, "Throw whatever you will throw."

data.name: Quran2976
data.value: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant."

data.name: Quran2977
data.value: Then Moses threw his staff, and at once it devoured what they falsified.

data.name: Quran2978
data.value: So the magicians fell down in prostration [to Allah].

data.name: Quran2979
data.value: They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds,

data.name: Quran2980
data.value: The Lord of Moses and Aaron."

data.name: Quran2981
data.value: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed Moses before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic, but you are going to know. I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will surely crucify you all."

data.name: Quran2982
data.value: They said, "No harm. Indeed, to our Lord we will return.

data.name: Quran2983
data.value: Indeed, we aspire that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we were the first of the believers."

data.name: Quran2984
data.value: And We inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants; indeed, you will be pursued."

data.name: Quran2985
data.value: Then Pharaoh sent among the cities gatherers

data.name: Quran2986
data.value: [And said], "Indeed, those are but a small band,

data.name: Quran2987
data.value: And indeed, they are enraging us,

data.name: Quran2988
data.value: And indeed, we are a cautious society... "

data.name: Quran2989
data.value: So We removed them from gardens and springs

data.name: Quran2990
data.value: And treasures and honorable station -

data.name: Quran2991
data.value: Thus. And We caused to inherit it the Children of Israel.

data.name: Quran2992
data.value: So they pursued them at sunrise.

data.name: Quran2993
data.value: And when the two companies saw one another, the companions of Moses said, "Indeed, we are to be overtaken!"

data.name: Quran2994
data.value: [Moses] said, "No! Indeed, with me is my Lord; He will guide me."

data.name: Quran2995
data.value: Then We inspired to Moses, "Strike with your staff the sea," and it parted, and each portion was like a great towering mountain.

data.name: Quran2996
data.value: And We advanced thereto the pursuers.

data.name: Quran2997
data.value: And We saved Moses and those with him, all together.

data.name: Quran2998
data.value: Then We drowned the others.

data.name: Quran2999
data.value: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

data.name: Quran3000
data.value: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

data.name: Quran3001
data.value: And recite to them the news of Abraham,

data.name: Quran3002
data.value: When he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?"

data.name: Quran3003
data.value: They said, "We worship idols and remain to them devoted."

data.name: Quran3004
data.value: He said, "Do they hear you when you supplicate?

data.name: Quran3005
data.value: Or do they benefit you, or do they harm?"

data.name: Quran3006
data.value: They said, "But we found our fathers doing thus."

data.name: Quran3007
data.value: He said, "Then do you see what you have been worshipping,

data.name: Quran3008
data.value: You and your ancient forefathers?

data.name: Quran3009
data.value: Indeed, they are enemies to me, except the Lord of the worlds,

data.name: Quran3010
data.value: Who created me, and He [it is who] guides me.

data.name: Quran3011
data.value: And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink.

data.name: Quran3012
data.value: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me

data.name: Quran3013
data.value: And who will cause me to die and then bring me to life

data.name: Quran3014
data.value: And who I aspire that He will forgive me my sin on the Day of Recompense."

data.name: Quran3015
data.value: [And he said], "My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous.

data.name: Quran3016
data.value: And grant me a reputation of honor among later generations.

data.name: Quran3017
data.value: And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure.

data.name: Quran3018
data.value: And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray.

data.name: Quran3019
data.value: And do not disgrace me on the Day they are [all] resurrected -

data.name: Quran3020
data.value: The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth or children

data.name: Quran3021
data.value: But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart."

data.name: Quran3022
data.value: And Paradise will be brought near [that Day] to the righteous.

data.name: Quran3023
data.value: And Hellfire will be brought forth for the deviators,

data.name: Quran3024
data.value: And it will be said to them, "Where are those you used to worship

data.name: Quran3025
data.value: Other than Allah? Can they help you or help themselves?"

data.name: Quran3026
data.value: So they will be overturned into Hellfire, they and the deviators

data.name: Quran3027
data.value: And the soldiers of Iblees, all together.

data.name: Quran3028
data.value: They will say while they dispute therein,

data.name: Quran3029
data.value: "By Allah, we were indeed in manifest error

data.name: Quran3030
data.value: When we equated you with the Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran3031
data.value: And no one misguided us except the criminals.

data.name: Quran3032
data.value: So now we have no intercessors

data.name: Quran3033
data.value: And not a devoted friend.

data.name: Quran3034
data.value: Then if we only had a return [to the world] and could be of the believers... "

data.name: Quran3035
data.value: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

data.name: Quran3036
data.value: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

data.name: Quran3037
data.value: The people of Noah denied the messengers

data.name: Quran3038
data.value: When their brother Noah said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?

data.name: Quran3039
data.value: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

data.name: Quran3040
data.value: So fear Allah and obey me.

data.name: Quran3041
data.value: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran3042
data.value: So fear Allah and obey me."

data.name: Quran3043
data.value: They said, "Should we believe you while you are followed by the lowest [class of people]?"

data.name: Quran3044
data.value: He said, "And what is my knowledge of what they used to do?

data.name: Quran3045
data.value: Their account is only upon my Lord, if you [could] perceive.

data.name: Quran3046
data.value: And I am not one to drive away the believers.

data.name: Quran3047
data.value: I am only a clear warner."

data.name: Quran3048
data.value: They said, "If you do not desist, O Noah, you will surely be of those who are stoned."

data.name: Quran3049
data.value: He said, "My Lord, indeed my people have denied me.

data.name: Quran3050
data.value: Then judge between me and them with decisive judgement and save me and those with me of the believers."

data.name: Quran3051
data.value: So We saved him and those with him in the laden ship.

data.name: Quran3052
data.value: Then We drowned thereafter the remaining ones.

data.name: Quran3053
data.value: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

data.name: Quran3054
data.value: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

data.name: Quran3055
data.value: 'Aad denied the messengers

data.name: Quran3056
data.value: When their brother Hud said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?

data.name: Quran3057
data.value: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

data.name: Quran3058
data.value: So fear Allah and obey me.

data.name: Quran3059
data.value: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran3060
data.value: Do you construct on every elevation a sign, amusing yourselves,

data.name: Quran3061
data.value: And take for yourselves palaces and fortresses that you might abide eternally?

data.name: Quran3062
data.value: And when you strike, you strike as tyrants.

data.name: Quran3063
data.value: So fear Allah and obey me.

data.name: Quran3064
data.value: And fear He who provided you with that which you know,

data.name: Quran3065
data.value: Provided you with grazing livestock and children

data.name: Quran3066
data.value: And gardens and springs.

data.name: Quran3067
data.value: Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."

data.name: Quran3068
data.value: They said, "It is all the same to us whether you advise or are not of the advisors.

data.name: Quran3069
data.value: This is not but the custom of the former peoples,

data.name: Quran3070
data.value: And we are not to be punished."

data.name: Quran3071
data.value: And they denied him, so We destroyed them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

data.name: Quran3072
data.value: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

data.name: Quran3073
data.value: Thamud denied the messengers

data.name: Quran3074
data.value: When their brother Salih said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?

data.name: Quran3075
data.value: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

data.name: Quran3076
data.value: So fear Allah and obey me.

data.name: Quran3077
data.value: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran3078
data.value: Will you be left in what is here, secure [from death],

data.name: Quran3079
data.value: Within gardens and springs

data.name: Quran3080
data.value: And fields of crops and palm trees with softened fruit?

data.name: Quran3081
data.value: And you carve out of the mountains, homes, with skill.

data.name: Quran3082
data.value: So fear Allah and obey me.

data.name: Quran3083
data.value: And do not obey the order of the transgressors,

data.name: Quran3084
data.value: Who cause corruption in the land and do not amend."

data.name: Quran3085
data.value: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.

data.name: Quran3086
data.value: You are but a man like ourselves, so bring a sign, if you should be of the truthful."

data.name: Quran3087
data.value: He said, "This is a she-camel. For her is a [time of] drink, and for you is a [time of] drink, [each] on a known day.

data.name: Quran3088
data.value: And do not touch her with harm, lest you be seized by the punishment of a terrible day."

data.name: Quran3089
data.value: But they hamstrung her and so became regretful.

data.name: Quran3090
data.value: And the punishment seized them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

data.name: Quran3091
data.value: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

data.name: Quran3092
data.value: The people of Lot denied the messengers

data.name: Quran3093
data.value: When their brother Lot said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?

data.name: Quran3094
data.value: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

data.name: Quran3095
data.value: So fear Allah and obey me.

data.name: Quran3096
data.value: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran3097
data.value: Do you approach males among the worlds

data.name: Quran3098
data.value: And leave what your Lord has created for you as mates? But you are a people transgressing."

data.name: Quran3099
data.value: They said, "If you do not desist, O Lot, you will surely be of those evicted."

data.name: Quran3100
data.value: He said, "Indeed, I am, toward your deed, of those who detest [it].

data.name: Quran3101
data.value: My Lord, save me and my family from [the consequence of] what they do."

data.name: Quran3102
data.value: So We saved him and his family, all,

data.name: Quran3103
data.value: Except an old woman among those who remained behind.

data.name: Quran3104
data.value: Then We destroyed the others.

data.name: Quran3105
data.value: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned.

data.name: Quran3106
data.value: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

data.name: Quran3107
data.value: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

data.name: Quran3108
data.value: The companions of the thicket denied the messengers

data.name: Quran3109
data.value: When Shu'ayb said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?

data.name: Quran3110
data.value: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

data.name: Quran3111
data.value: So fear Allah and obey me.

data.name: Quran3112
data.value: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran3113
data.value: Give full measure and do not be of those who cause loss.

data.name: Quran3114
data.value: And weigh with an even balance.

data.name: Quran3115
data.value: And do not deprive people of their due and do not commit abuse on earth, spreading corruption.

data.name: Quran3116
data.value: And fear He who created you and the former creation."

data.name: Quran3117
data.value: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.

data.name: Quran3118
data.value: You are but a man like ourselves, and indeed, we think you are among the liars.

data.name: Quran3119
data.value: So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful."

data.name: Quran3120
data.value: He said, "My Lord is most knowing of what you do."

data.name: Quran3121
data.value: And they denied him, so the punishment of the day of the black cloud seized them. Indeed, it was the punishment of a terrible day.

data.name: Quran3122
data.value: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

data.name: Quran3123
data.value: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

data.name: Quran3124
data.value: And indeed, the Qur'an is the revelation of the Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran3125
