data.value: The Trustworthy Spirit has brought it down

data.name: Quran3126
data.value: Upon your heart, [O Muhammad] - that you may be of the warners -

data.name: Quran3127
data.value: In a clear Arabic language.

data.name: Quran3128
data.value: And indeed, it is [mentioned] in the scriptures of former peoples.

data.name: Quran3129
data.value: And has it not been a sign to them that it is recognized by the scholars of the Children of Israel?

data.name: Quran3130
data.value: And even if We had revealed it to one among the foreigners

data.name: Quran3131
data.value: And he had recited it to them [perfectly], they would [still] not have been believers in it.

data.name: Quran3132
data.value: Thus have We inserted disbelief into the hearts of the criminals.

data.name: Quran3133
data.value: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment.

data.name: Quran3134
data.value: And it will come to them suddenly while they perceive [it] not.

data.name: Quran3135
data.value: And they will say, "May we be reprieved?"

data.name: Quran3136
data.value: So for Our punishment are they impatient?

data.name: Quran3137
data.value: Then have you considered if We gave them enjoyment for years

data.name: Quran3138
data.value: And then there came to them that which they were promised?

data.name: Quran3139
data.value: They would not be availed by the enjoyment with which they were provided.

data.name: Quran3140
data.value: And We did not destroy any city except that it had warners

data.name: Quran3141
data.value: As a reminder; and never have We been unjust.

data.name: Quran3142
data.value: And the devils have not brought the revelation down.

data.name: Quran3143
data.value: It is not allowable for them, nor would they be able.

data.name: Quran3144
data.value: Indeed they, from [its] hearing, are removed.

data.name: Quran3145
data.value: So do not invoke with Allah another deity and [thus] be among the punished.

data.name: Quran3146
data.value: And warn, [O Muhammad], your closest kindred.

data.name: Quran3147
data.value: And lower your wing to those who follow you of the believers.

data.name: Quran3148
data.value: And if they disobey you, then say, "Indeed, I am disassociated from what you are doing."

data.name: Quran3149
data.value: And rely upon the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,

data.name: Quran3150
data.value: Who sees you when you arise

data.name: Quran3151
data.value: And your movement among those who prostrate.

data.name: Quran3152
data.value: Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

data.name: Quran3153
data.value: Shall I inform you upon whom the devils descend?

data.name: Quran3154
data.value: They descend upon every sinful liar.

data.name: Quran3155
data.value: They pass on what is heard, and most of them are liars.

data.name: Quran3156
data.value: And the poets - [only] the deviators follow them;

data.name: Quran3157
data.value: Do you not see that in every valley they roam

data.name: Quran3158
data.value: And that they say what they do not do? -

data.name: Quran3159
data.value: Except those [poets] who believe and do righteous deeds and remember Allah often and defend [the Muslims] after they were wronged. And those who have wronged are going to know to what [kind of] return they will be returned.

data.name: Quran3160
data.value: Ta, Seen. These are the verses of the Qur'an and a clear Book

data.name: Quran3161
data.value: As guidance and good tidings for the believers

data.name: Quran3162
data.value: Who establish prayer and give zakah, and of the Hereafter they are certain [in faith].

data.name: Quran3163
data.value: Indeed, for those who do not believe in the Hereafter, We have made pleasing to them their deeds, so they wander blindly.

data.name: Quran3164
data.value: Those are the ones for whom there will be the worst of punishment, and in the Hereafter they are the greatest losers.

data.name: Quran3165
data.value: And indeed, [O Muhammad], you receive the Qur'an from one Wise and Knowing.

data.name: Quran3166
data.value: [Mention] when Moses said to his family, "Indeed, I have perceived a fire. I will bring you from there information or will bring you a burning torch that you may warm yourselves."

data.name: Quran3167
data.value: But when he came to it, he was called, "Blessed is whoever is at the fire and whoever is around it. And exalted is Allah, Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran3168
data.value: O Moses, indeed it is I - Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise."

data.name: Quran3169
data.value: And [he was told], "Throw down your staff." But when he saw it writhing as if it were a snake, he turned in flight and did not return. [Allah said], "O Moses, fear not. Indeed, in My presence the messengers do not fear.

data.name: Quran3170
data.value: Otherwise, he who wrongs, then substitutes good after evil - indeed, I am Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran3171
data.value: And put your hand into the opening of your garment [at the breast]; it will come out white without disease. [These are] among the nine signs [you will take] to Pharaoh and his people. Indeed, they have been a people defiantly disobedient."

data.name: Quran3172
data.value: But when there came to them Our visible signs, they said, "This is obvious magic."

data.name: Quran3173
data.value: And they rejected them, while their [inner] selves were convinced thereof, out of injustice and haughtiness. So see how was the end of the corrupters.

data.name: Quran3174
data.value: And We had certainly given to David and Solomon knowledge, and they said, "Praise [is due] to Allah, who has favored us over many of His believing servants."

data.name: Quran3175
data.value: And Solomon inherited David. He said, "O people, we have been taught the language of birds, and we have been given from all things. Indeed, this is evident bounty."

data.name: Quran3176
data.value: And gathered for Solomon were his soldiers of the jinn and men and birds, and they were [marching] in rows.

data.name: Quran3177
data.value: Until, when they came upon the valley of the ants, an ant said, "O ants, enter your dwellings that you not be crushed by Solomon and his soldiers while they perceive not."

data.name: Quran3178
data.value: So [Solomon] smiled, amused at her speech, and said, "My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And admit me by Your mercy into [the ranks of] Your righteous servants."

data.name: Quran3179
data.value: And he took attendance of the birds and said, "Why do I not see the hoopoe - or is he among the absent?

data.name: Quran3180
data.value: I will surely punish him with a severe punishment or slaughter him unless he brings me clear authorization."

data.name: Quran3181
data.value: But the hoopoe stayed not long and said, "I have encompassed [in knowledge] that which you have not encompassed, and I have come to you from Sheba with certain news.

data.name: Quran3182
data.value: Indeed, I found [there] a woman ruling them, and she has been given of all things, and she has a great throne.

data.name: Quran3183
data.value: I found her and her people prostrating to the sun instead of Allah, and Satan has made their deeds pleasing to them and averted them from [His] way, so they are not guided,

data.name: Quran3184
data.value: [And] so they do not prostrate to Allah, who brings forth what is hidden within the heavens and the earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare -

data.name: Quran3185
data.value: Allah - there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Great Throne."

data.name: Quran3186
data.value: [Solomon] said, "We will see whether you were truthful or were of the liars.

data.name: Quran3187
data.value: Take this letter of mine and deliver it to them. Then leave them and see what [answer] they will return."

data.name: Quran3188
data.value: She said, "O eminent ones, indeed, to me has been delivered a noble letter.

data.name: Quran3189
data.value: Indeed, it is from Solomon, and indeed, it reads: 'In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful,

data.name: Quran3190
data.value: Be not haughty with me but come to me in submission [as Muslims].' "

data.name: Quran3191
data.value: She said, "O eminent ones, advise me in my affair. I would not decide a matter until you witness [for] me."

data.name: Quran3192
data.value: They said, "We are men of strength and of great military might, but the command is yours, so see what you will command."

data.name: Quran3193
data.value: She said, "Indeed kings - when they enter a city, they ruin it and render the honored of its people humbled. And thus do they do.

data.name: Quran3194
data.value: But indeed, I will send to them a gift and see with what [reply] the messengers will return."

data.name: Quran3195
data.value: So when they came to Solomon, he said, "Do you provide me with wealth? But what Allah has given me is better than what He has given you. Rather, it is you who rejoice in your gift.

data.name: Quran3196
data.value: Return to them, for we will surely come to them with soldiers that they will be powerless to encounter, and we will surely expel them therefrom in humiliation, and they will be debased."

data.name: Quran3197
data.value: [Solomon] said, "O assembly [of jinn], which of you will bring me her throne before they come to me in submission?"

data.name: Quran3198
data.value: A powerful one from among the jinn said, "I will bring it to you before you rise from your place, and indeed, I am for this [task] strong and trustworthy."

data.name: Quran3199
data.value: Said one who had knowledge from the Scripture, "I will bring it to you before your glance returns to you." And when [Solomon] saw it placed before him, he said, "This is from the favor of my Lord to test me whether I will be grateful or ungrateful. And whoever is grateful - his gratitude is only for [the benefit of] himself. And whoever is ungrateful - then indeed, my Lord is Free of need and Generous."

data.name: Quran3200
data.value: He said, "Disguise for her her throne; we will see whether she will be guided [to truth] or will be of those who is not guided."

data.name: Quran3201
data.value: So when she arrived, it was said [to her], "Is your throne like this?" She said, "[It is] as though it was it." [Solomon said], "And we were given knowledge before her, and we have been Muslims [in submission to Allah].

data.name: Quran3202
data.value: And that which she was worshipping other than Allah had averted her [from submission to Him]. Indeed, she was from a disbelieving people."

data.name: Quran3203
data.value: She was told, "Enter the palace." But when she saw it, she thought it was a body of water and uncovered her shins [to wade through]. He said, "Indeed, it is a palace [whose floor is] made smooth with glass." She said, "My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, and I submit with Solomon to Allah, Lord of the worlds."

data.name: Quran3204
data.value: And We had certainly sent to Thamud their brother Salih, [saying], "Worship Allah," and at once they were two parties conflicting.

data.name: Quran3205
data.value: He said, "O my people, why are you impatient for evil instead of good? Why do you not seek forgiveness of Allah that you may receive mercy?"

data.name: Quran3206
data.value: They said, "We consider you a bad omen, you and those with you." He said, "Your omen is with Allah. Rather, you are a people being tested."

data.name: Quran3207
data.value: And there were in the city nine family heads causing corruption in the land and not amending [its affairs].

data.name: Quran3208
data.value: They said, "Take a mutual oath by Allah that we will kill him by night, he and his family. Then we will say to his executor, 'We did not witness the destruction of his family, and indeed, we are truthful.' "

data.name: Quran3209
data.value: And they planned a plan, and We planned a plan, while they perceived not.

data.name: Quran3210
data.value: Then look how was the outcome of their plan - that We destroyed them and their people, all.

data.name: Quran3211
data.value: So those are their houses, desolate because of the wrong they had done. Indeed in that is a sign for people who know.

data.name: Quran3212
data.value: And We saved those who believed and used to fear Allah.

data.name: Quran3213
data.value: And [mention] Lot, when he said to his people, "Do you commit immorality while you are seeing?

data.name: Quran3214
data.value: Do you indeed approach men with desire instead of women? Rather, you are a people behaving ignorantly."

data.name: Quran3215
data.value: But the answer of his people was not except that they said, "Expel the family of Lot from your city. Indeed, they are people who keep themselves pure."

data.name: Quran3216
data.value: So We saved him and his family, except for his wife; We destined her to be of those who remained behind.

data.name: Quran3217
data.value: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned.

data.name: Quran3218
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "Praise be to Allah, and peace upon His servants whom He has chosen. Is Allah better or what they associate with Him?"

data.name: Quran3219
data.value: [More precisely], is He [not best] who created the heavens and the earth and sent down for you rain from the sky, causing to grow thereby gardens of joyful beauty which you could not [otherwise] have grown the trees thereof? Is there a deity with Allah? [No], but they are a people who ascribe equals [to Him].

data.name: Quran3220
data.value: Is He [not best] who made the earth a stable ground and placed within it rivers and made for it firmly set mountains and placed between the two seas a barrier? Is there a deity with Allah? [No], but most of them do not know.

data.name: Quran3221
data.value: Is He [not best] who responds to the desperate one when he calls upon Him and removes evil and makes you inheritors of the earth? Is there a deity with Allah? Little do you remember.

data.name: Quran3222
data.value: Is He [not best] who guides you through the darknesses of the land and sea and who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy? Is there a deity with Allah? High is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.

data.name: Quran3223
data.value: Is He [not best] who begins creation and then repeats it and who provides for you from the heaven and earth? Is there a deity with Allah? Say, "Produce your proof, if you should be truthful."

data.name: Quran3224
data.value: Say, "None in the heavens and earth knows the unseen except Allah, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected."

data.name: Quran3225
data.value: Rather, their knowledge is arrested concerning the Hereafter. Rather, they are in doubt about it. Rather, they are, concerning it, blind.

data.name: Quran3226
data.value: And those who disbelieve say, "When we have become dust as well as our forefathers, will we indeed be brought out [of the graves]?

data.name: Quran3227
data.value: We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before. This is not but legends of the former peoples."

data.name: Quran3228
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how was the end of the criminals."

data.name: Quran3229
data.value: And grieve not over them or be in distress from what they conspire.

data.name: Quran3230
data.value: And they say, "When is [the fulfillment of] this promise, if you should be truthful?"

data.name: Quran3231
data.value: Say, "Perhaps it is close behind you - some of that for which you are impatient.

data.name: Quran3232
data.value: And indeed, your Lord is full of bounty for the people, but most of them do not show gratitude."

data.name: Quran3233
data.value: And indeed, your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they declare.

data.name: Quran3234
data.value: And there is nothing concealed within the heaven and the earth except that it is in a clear Register.

data.name: Quran3235
data.value: Indeed, this Qur'an relates to the Children of Israel most of that over which they disagree.

data.name: Quran3236
data.value: And indeed, it is guidance and mercy for the believers.

data.name: Quran3237
data.value: Indeed, your Lord will judge between them by His [wise] judgement. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.

data.name: Quran3238
data.value: So rely upon Allah; indeed, you are upon the clear truth.

data.name: Quran3239
data.value: Indeed, you will not make the dead hear, nor will you make the deaf hear the call when they have turned their backs retreating.

data.name: Quran3240
data.value: And you cannot guide the blind away from their error. You will only make hear those who believe in Our verses so they are Muslims [submitting to Allah].

data.name: Quran3241
data.value: And when the word befalls them, We will bring forth for them a creature from the earth speaking to them, [saying] that the people were, of Our verses, not certain [in faith].

data.name: Quran3242
data.value: And [warn of] the Day when We will gather from every nation a company of those who deny Our signs, and they will be [driven] in rows

data.name: Quran3243
data.value: Until, when they arrive [at the place of Judgement], He will say, "Did you deny My signs while you encompassed them not in knowledge, or what [was it that] you were doing?"

data.name: Quran3244
data.value: And the decree will befall them for the wrong they did, and they will not [be able to] speak.

data.name: Quran3245
data.value: Do they not see that We made the night that they may rest therein and the day giving sight? Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.

data.name: Quran3246
data.value: And [warn of] the Day the Horn will be blown, and whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth will be terrified except whom Allah wills. And all will come to Him humbled.

data.name: Quran3247
data.value: And you see the mountains, thinking them rigid, while they will pass as the passing of clouds. [It is] the work of Allah, who perfected all things. Indeed, He is Acquainted with that which you do.

data.name: Quran3248
data.value: Whoever comes [at Judgement] with a good deed will have better than it, and they, from the terror of that Day, will be safe.

data.name: Quran3249
data.value: And whoever comes with an evil deed - their faces will be overturned into the Fire, [and it will be said], "Are you recompensed except for what you used to do?"

data.name: Quran3250
data.value: [Say, O Muhammad], "I have only been commanded to worship the Lord of this city, who made it sacred and to whom [belongs] all things. And I am commanded to be of the Muslims [those who submit to Allah]

data.name: Quran3251
data.value: And to recite the Qur'an." And whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] himself; and whoever strays - say, "I am only [one] of the warners."

data.name: Quran3252
data.value: And say, "[All] praise is [due] to Allah. He will show you His signs, and you will recognize them. And your Lord is not unaware of what you do."

data.name: Quran3253
data.value: Ta, Seen, Meem.

data.name: Quran3254
data.value: These are the verses of the clear Book.

data.name: Quran3255
data.value: We recite to you from the news of Moses and Pharaoh in truth for a people who believe.

data.name: Quran3256
data.value: Indeed, Pharaoh exalted himself in the land and made its people into factions, oppressing a sector among them, slaughtering their [newborn] sons and keeping their females alive. Indeed, he was of the corrupters.

data.name: Quran3257
data.value: And We wanted to confer favor upon those who were oppressed in the land and make them leaders and make them inheritors

data.name: Quran3258
data.value: And establish them in the land and show Pharaoh and [his minister] Haman and their soldiers through them that which they had feared.

data.name: Quran3259
data.value: And We inspired to the mother of Moses, "Suckle him; but when you fear for him, cast him into the river and do not fear and do not grieve. Indeed, We will return him to you and will make him [one] of the messengers."

data.name: Quran3260
data.value: And the family of Pharaoh picked him up [out of the river] so that he would become to them an enemy and a [cause of] grief. Indeed, Pharaoh and Haman and their soldiers were deliberate sinners.

data.name: Quran3261
data.value: And the wife of Pharaoh said, "[He will be] a comfort of the eye for me and for you. Do not kill him; perhaps he may benefit us, or we may adopt him as a son." And they perceived not.

data.name: Quran3262
data.value: And the heart of Moses' mother became empty [of all else]. She was about to disclose [the matter concerning] him had We not bound fast her heart that she would be of the believers.

data.name: Quran3263
data.value: And she said to his sister, "Follow him"; so she watched him from a distance while they perceived not.

data.name: Quran3264
data.value: And We had prevented from him [all] wet nurses before, so she said, "Shall I direct you to a household that will be responsible for him for you while they are to him [for his upbringing] sincere?"

data.name: Quran3265
data.value: So We restored him to his mother that she might be content and not grieve and that she would know that the promise of Allah is true. But most of the people do not know.

data.name: Quran3266
data.value: And when he attained his full strength and was [mentally] mature, We bestowed upon him judgement and knowledge. And thus do We reward the doers of good.

data.name: Quran3267
data.value: And he entered the city at a time of inattention by its people and found therein two men fighting: one from his faction and one from among his enemy. And the one from his faction called for help to him against the one from his enemy, so Moses struck him and [unintentionally] killed him. [Moses] said, "This is from the work of Satan. Indeed, he is a manifest, misleading enemy."

data.name: Quran3268
data.value: He said, "My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, so forgive me," and He forgave him. Indeed, He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.

data.name: Quran3269
data.value: He said, "My Lord, for the favor You bestowed upon me, I will never be an assistant to the criminals."

data.name: Quran3270
data.value: And he became inside the city fearful and anticipating [exposure], when suddenly the one who sought his help the previous day cried out to him [once again]. Moses said to him, "Indeed, you are an evident, [persistent] deviator."

data.name: Quran3271
data.value: And when he wanted to strike the one who was an enemy to both of them, he said, "O Moses, do you intend to kill me as you killed someone yesterday? You only want to be a tyrant in the land and do not want to be of the amenders."

data.name: Quran3272
data.value: And a man came from the farthest end of the city, running. He said, "O Moses, indeed the eminent ones are conferring over you [intending] to kill you, so leave [the city]; indeed, I am to you of the sincere advisors."

data.name: Quran3273
data.value: So he left it, fearful and anticipating [apprehension]. He said, "My Lord, save me from the wrongdoing people."

data.name: Quran3274
data.value: And when he directed himself toward Madyan, he said, "Perhaps my Lord will guide me to the sound way."

data.name: Quran3275
data.value: And when he came to the well of Madyan, he found there a crowd of people watering [their flocks], and he found aside from them two women driving back [their flocks]. He said, "What is your circumstance?" They said, "We do not water until the shepherds dispatch [their flocks]; and our father is an old man."

data.name: Quran3276
data.value: So he watered [their flocks] for them; then he went back to the shade and said, "My Lord, indeed I am, for whatever good You would send down to me, in need."

data.name: Quran3277
data.value: Then one of the two women came to him walking with shyness. She said, "Indeed, my father invites you that he may reward you for having watered for us." So when he came to him and related to him the story, he said, "Fear not. You have escaped from the wrongdoing people."

data.name: Quran3278
data.value: One of the women said, "O my father, hire him. Indeed, the best one you can hire is the strong and the trustworthy."

data.name: Quran3279
data.value: He said, "Indeed, I wish to wed you one of these, my two daughters, on [the condition] that you serve me for eight years; but if you complete ten, it will be [as a favor] from you. And I do not wish to put you in difficulty. You will find me, if Allah wills, from among the righteous."

data.name: Quran3280
data.value: [Moses] said, "That is [established] between me and you. Whichever of the two terms I complete - there is no injustice to me, and Allah, over what we say, is Witness."

data.name: Quran3281
data.value: And when Moses had completed the term and was traveling with his family, he perceived from the direction of the mount a fire. He said to his family, "Stay here; indeed, I have perceived a fire. Perhaps I will bring you from there [some] information or burning wood from the fire that you may warm yourselves."

data.name: Quran3282
data.value: But when he came to it, he was called from the right side of the valley in a blessed spot - from the tree, "O Moses, indeed I am Allah, Lord of the worlds."

data.name: Quran3283
data.value: And [he was told], "Throw down your staff." But when he saw it writhing as if it was a snake, he turned in flight and did not return. [Allah said], "O Moses, approach and fear not. Indeed, you are of the secure.

data.name: Quran3284
data.value: Insert your hand into the opening of your garment; it will come out white, without disease. And draw in your arm close to you [as prevention] from fear, for those are two proofs from your Lord to Pharaoh and his establishment. Indeed, they have been a people defiantly disobedient."

data.name: Quran3285
data.value: He said, "My Lord, indeed, I killed from among them someone, and I fear they will kill me.

data.name: Quran3286
data.value: And my brother Aaron is more fluent than me in tongue, so send him with me as support, verifying me. Indeed, I fear that they will deny me."

data.name: Quran3287
data.value: [Allah] said, "We will strengthen your arm through your brother and grant you both supremacy so they will not reach you. [It will be] through Our signs; you and those who follow you will be the predominant."

data.name: Quran3288
data.value: But when Moses came to them with Our signs as clear evidences, they said, "This is not except invented magic, and we have not heard of this [religion] among our forefathers."

data.name: Quran3289
data.value: And Moses said, "My Lord is more knowing [than we or you] of who has come with guidance from Him and to whom will be succession in the home. Indeed, wrongdoers do not succeed."

data.name: Quran3290
data.value: And Pharaoh said, "O eminent ones, I have not known you to have a god other than me. Then ignite for me, O Haman, [a fire] upon the clay and make for me a tower that I may look at the God of Moses. And indeed, I do think he is among the liars."

data.name: Quran3291
data.value: And he was arrogant, he and his soldiers, in the land, without right, and they thought that they would not be returned to Us.

data.name: Quran3292
data.value: So We took him and his soldiers and threw them into the sea. So see how was the end of the wrongdoers.

data.name: Quran3293
data.value: And We made them leaders inviting to the Fire, and on the Day of Resurrection they will not be helped.

data.name: Quran3294
data.value: And We caused to overtake them in this world a curse, and on the Day of Resurrection they will be of the despised.

data.name: Quran3295
data.value: And We gave Moses the Scripture, after We had destroyed the former generations, as enlightenment for the people and guidance and mercy that they might be reminded.

data.name: Quran3296
data.value: And you, [O Muhammad], were not on the western side [of the mount] when We revealed to Moses the command, and you were not among the witnesses [to that].

data.name: Quran3297
data.value: But We produced [many] generations [after Moses], and prolonged was their duration. And you were not a resident among the people of Madyan, reciting to them Our verses, but We were senders [of this message].

data.name: Quran3298
data.value: And you were not at the side of the mount when We called [Moses] but [were sent] as a mercy from your Lord to warn a people to whom no warner had come before you that they might be reminded.

data.name: Quran3299
data.value: And if not that a disaster should strike them for what their hands put forth [of sins] and they would say, "Our Lord, why did You not send us a messenger so we could have followed Your verses and been among the believers?"...

data.name: Quran3300
data.value: But when the truth came to them from Us, they said, "Why was he not given like that which was given to Moses?" Did they not disbelieve in that which was given to Moses before? They said, "[They are but] two works of magic supporting each other, and indeed we are, in both, disbelievers."

data.name: Quran3301
data.value: Say, "Then bring a scripture from Allah which is more guiding than either of them that I may follow it, if you should be truthful."

data.name: Quran3302
data.value: But if they do not respond to you - then know that they only follow their [own] desires. And who is more astray than one who follows his desire without guidance from Allah? Indeed, Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

data.name: Quran3303
data.value: And We have [repeatedly] conveyed to them the Qur'an that they might be reminded.

data.name: Quran3304
data.value: Those to whom We gave the Scripture before it - they are believers in it.

data.name: Quran3305
data.value: And when it is recited to them, they say, "We have believed in it; indeed, it is the truth from our Lord. Indeed we were, [even] before it, Muslims [submitting to Allah]."

data.name: Quran3306
data.value: Those will be given their reward twice for what they patiently endured and [because] they avert evil through good, and from what We have provided them they spend.

data.name: Quran3307
data.value: And when they hear ill speech, they turn away from it and say, "For us are our deeds, and for you are your deeds. Peace will be upon you; we seek not the ignorant."

data.name: Quran3308
data.value: Indeed, [O Muhammad], you do not guide whom you like, but Allah guides whom He wills. And He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided.

data.name: Quran3309
data.value: And they say, "If we were to follow the guidance with you, we would be swept from our land." Have we not established for them a safe sanctuary to which are brought the fruits of all things as provision from Us? But most of them do not know.

data.name: Quran3310
data.value: And how many a city have We destroyed that was insolent in its [way of] living, and those are their dwellings which have not been inhabited after them except briefly. And it is We who were the inheritors.

data.name: Quran3311
data.value: And never would your Lord have destroyed the cities until He had sent to their mother a messenger reciting to them Our verses. And We would not destroy the cities except while their people were wrongdoers.

data.name: Quran3312
data.value: And whatever thing you [people] have been given - it is [only for] the enjoyment of worldly life and its adornment. And what is with Allah is better and more lasting; so will you not use reason?

data.name: Quran3313
data.value: Then is he whom We have promised a good promise which he will obtain like he for whom We provided enjoyment of worldly life [but] then he is, on the Day of Resurrection, among those presented [for punishment in Hell]?

data.name: Quran3314
data.value: And [warn of] the Day He will call them and say, "Where are My 'partners' which you used to claim?"

data.name: Quran3315
data.value: Those upon whom the word will have come into effect will say, "Our Lord, these are the ones we led to error. We led them to error just as we were in error. We declare our disassociation [from them] to You. They did not used to worship us."

data.name: Quran3316
data.value: And it will be said, "Invoke your 'partners' " and they will invoke them; but they will not respond to them, and they will see the punishment. If only they had followed guidance!

data.name: Quran3317
data.value: And [mention] the Day He will call them and say, "What did you answer the messengers?"

data.name: Quran3318
data.value: But the information will be unapparent to them that Day, so they will not [be able to] ask one another.

data.name: Quran3319
data.value: But as for one who had repented, believed, and done righteousness, it is promised by Allah that he will be among the successful.

data.name: Quran3320
data.value: And your Lord creates what He wills and chooses; not for them was the choice. Exalted is Allah and high above what they associate with Him.

data.name: Quran3321
data.value: And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they declare.

data.name: Quran3322
data.value: And He is Allah; there is no deity except Him. To Him is [due all] praise in the first [life] and the Hereafter. And His is the [final] decision, and to Him you will be returned.

data.name: Quran3323
data.value: Say, "Have you considered: if Allah should make for you the night continuous until the Day of Resurrection, what deity other than Allah could bring you light? Then will you not hear?"

data.name: Quran3324
data.value: Say, "Have you considered: if Allah should make for you the day continuous until the Day of Resurrection, what deity other than Allah could bring you a night in which you may rest? Then will you not see?"

data.name: Quran3325
data.value: And out of His mercy He made for you the night and the day that you may rest therein and [by day] seek from His bounty and [that] perhaps you will be grateful.

data.name: Quran3326
data.value: And [warn of] the Day He will call them and say, "Where are my 'partners' which you used to claim?"

data.name: Quran3327
data.value: And We will extract from every nation a witness and say, "Produce your proof," and they will know that the truth belongs to Allah, and lost from them is that which they used to invent.

data.name: Quran3328
data.value: Indeed, Qarun was from the people of Moses, but he tyrannized them. And We gave him of treasures whose keys would burden a band of strong men; thereupon his people said to him, "Do not exult. Indeed, Allah does not like the exultant.

data.name: Quran3329
data.value: But seek, through that which Allah has given you, the home of the Hereafter; and [yet], do not forget your share of the world. And do good as Allah has done good to you. And desire not corruption in the land. Indeed, Allah does not like corrupters."

data.name: Quran3330
data.value: He said, "I was only given it because of knowledge I have." Did he not know that Allah had destroyed before him of generations those who were greater than him in power and greater in accumulation [of wealth]? But the criminals, about their sins, will not be asked.

data.name: Quran3331
data.value: So he came out before his people in his adornment. Those who desired the worldly life said, "Oh, would that we had like what was given to Qarun. Indeed, he is one of great fortune."

data.name: Quran3332
data.value: But those who had been given knowledge said, "Woe to you! The reward of Allah is better for he who believes and does righteousness. And none are granted it except the patient."

data.name: Quran3333
data.value: And We caused the earth to swallow him and his home. And there was for him no company to aid him other than Allah, nor was he of those who [could] defend themselves.

data.name: Quran3334
data.value: And those who had wished for his position the previous day began to say, "Oh, how Allah extends provision to whom He wills of His servants and restricts it! If not that Allah had conferred favor on us, He would have caused it to swallow us. Oh, how the disbelievers do not succeed!"

data.name: Quran3335
data.value: That home of the Hereafter We assign to those who do not desire exaltedness upon the earth or corruption. And the [best] outcome is for the righteous.

data.name: Quran3336
data.value: Whoever comes [on the Day of Judgement] with a good deed will have better than it; and whoever comes with an evil deed - then those who did evil deeds will not be recompensed except [as much as] what they used to do.

data.name: Quran3337
data.value: Indeed, [O Muhammad], He who imposed upon you the Qur'an will take you back to a place of return. Say, "My Lord is most knowing of who brings guidance and who is in clear error."

data.name: Quran3338
data.value: And you were not expecting that the Book would be conveyed to you, but [it is] a mercy from your Lord. So do not be an assistant to the disbelievers.

data.name: Quran3339
data.value: And never let them avert you from the verses of Allah after they have been revealed to you. And invite [people] to your Lord. And never be of those who associate others with Allah.

data.name: Quran3340
data.value: And do not invoke with Allah another deity. There is no deity except Him. Everything will be destroyed except His Face. His is the judgement, and to Him you will be returned.

data.name: Quran3341
data.value: Alif, Lam, Meem

data.name: Quran3342
data.value: Do the people think that they will be left to say, "We believe" and they will not be tried?

data.name: Quran3343
data.value: But We have certainly tried those before them, and Allah will surely make evident those who are truthful, and He will surely make evident the liars.

data.name: Quran3344
data.value: Or do those who do evil deeds think they can outrun Us? Evil is what they judge.

data.name: Quran3345
data.value: Whoever should hope for the meeting with Allah - indeed, the term decreed by Allah is coming. And He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

data.name: Quran3346
data.value: And whoever strives only strives for [the benefit of] himself. Indeed, Allah is free from need of the worlds.

data.name: Quran3347
data.value: And those who believe and do righteous deeds - We will surely remove from them their misdeeds and will surely reward them according to the best of what they used to do.

data.name: Quran3348
data.value: And We have enjoined upon man goodness to parents. But if they endeavor to make you associate with Me that of which you have no knowledge, do not obey them. To Me is your return, and I will inform you about what you used to do.

data.name: Quran3349
data.value: And those who believe and do righteous deeds - We will surely admit them among the righteous [into Paradise].

data.name: Quran3350
data.value: And of the people are some who say, "We believe in Allah," but when one [of them] is harmed for [the cause of] Allah, they consider the trial of the people as [if it were] the punishment of Allah. But if victory comes from your Lord, they say, "Indeed, We were with you." Is not Allah most knowing of what is within the breasts of all creatures?

data.name: Quran3351
data.value: And Allah will surely make evident those who believe, and He will surely make evident the hypocrites.

data.name: Quran3352
data.value: And those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Follow our way, and we will carry your sins." But they will not carry anything of their sins. Indeed, they are liars.

data.name: Quran3353
data.value: But they will surely carry their [own] burdens and [other] burdens along with their burdens, and they will surely be questioned on the Day of Resurrection about what they used to invent.

data.name: Quran3354
data.value: And We certainly sent Noah to his people, and he remained among them a thousand years minus fifty years, and the flood seized them while they were wrongdoers.

data.name: Quran3355
data.value: But We saved him and the companions of the ship, and We made it a sign for the worlds.

data.name: Quran3356
data.value: And [We sent] Abraham, when he said to his people, "Worship Allah and fear Him. That is best for you, if you should know.

data.name: Quran3357
data.value: You only worship, besides Allah, idols, and you produce a falsehood. Indeed, those you worship besides Allah do not possess for you [the power of] provision. So seek from Allah provision and worship Him and be grateful to Him. To Him you will be returned."

data.name: Quran3358
data.value: And if you [people] deny [the message] - already nations before you have denied. And there is not upon the Messenger except [the duty of] clear notification.

data.name: Quran3359
data.value: Have they not considered how Allah begins creation and then repeats it? Indeed that, for Allah, is easy.

data.name: Quran3360
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how He began creation. Then Allah will produce the final creation. Indeed Allah, over all things, is competent."

data.name: Quran3361
data.value: He punishes whom He wills and has mercy upon whom He wills, and to Him you will be returned.

data.name: Quran3362
data.value: And you will not cause failure [to Allah] upon the earth or in the heaven. And you have not other than Allah any protector or any helper.

data.name: Quran3363
data.value: And the ones who disbelieve in the signs of Allah and the meeting with Him - those have despaired of My mercy, and they will have a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran3364
data.value: And the answer of Abraham's people was not but that they said, "Kill him or burn him," but Allah saved him from the fire. Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.

data.name: Quran3365
data.value: And [Abraham] said, "You have only taken, other than Allah, idols as [a bond of] affection among you in worldly life. Then on the Day of Resurrection you will deny one another and curse one another, and your refuge will be the Fire, and you will not have any helpers."

data.name: Quran3366
data.value: And Lot believed him. [Abraham] said, "Indeed, I will emigrate to [the service of] my Lord. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise."

data.name: Quran3367
data.value: And We gave to Him Isaac and Jacob and placed in his descendants prophethood and scripture. And We gave him his reward in this world, and indeed, he is in the Hereafter among the righteous.

data.name: Quran3368
data.value: And [mention] Lot, when he said to his people, "Indeed, you commit such immorality as no one has preceded you with from among the worlds.

data.name: Quran3369
data.value: Indeed, you approach men and obstruct the road and commit in your meetings [every] evil." And the answer of his people was not but they said, "Bring us the punishment of Allah, if you should be of the truthful."

data.name: Quran3370
data.value: He said, "My Lord, support me against the corrupting people."

data.name: Quran3371
data.value: And when Our messengers came to Abraham with the good tidings, they said, "Indeed, we will destroy the people of that Lot's city. Indeed, its people have been wrongdoers."

data.name: Quran3372
data.value: [Abraham] said, "Indeed, within it is Lot." They said, "We are more knowing of who is within it. We will surely save him and his family, except his wife. She is to be of those who remain behind."

data.name: Quran3373
data.value: And when Our messengers came to Lot, he was distressed for them and felt for them great discomfort. They said, "Fear not, nor grieve. Indeed, we will save you and your family, except your wife; she is to be of those who remain behind.

data.name: Quran3374
data.value: Indeed, we will bring down on the people of this city punishment from the sky because they have been defiantly disobedient."

data.name: Quran3375
data.value: And We have certainly left of it a sign as clear evidence for a people who use reason.

data.name: Quran3376
data.value: And to Madyan [We sent] their brother Shu'ayb, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah and expect the Last Day and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption."

data.name: Quran3377
data.value: But they denied him, so the earthquake seized them, and they became within their home [corpses] fallen prone.

data.name: Quran3378
data.value: And [We destroyed] 'Aad and Thamud, and it has become clear to you from their [ruined] dwellings. And Satan had made pleasing to them their deeds and averted them from the path, and they were endowed with perception.

data.name: Quran3379
data.value: And [We destroyed] Qarun and Pharaoh and Haman. And Moses had already come to them with clear evidences, and they were arrogant in the land, but they were not outrunners [of Our punishment].

data.name: Quran3380
data.value: So each We seized for his sin; and among them were those upon whom We sent a storm of stones, and among them were those who were seized by the blast [from the sky], and among them were those whom We caused the earth to swallow, and among them were those whom We drowned. And Allah would not have wronged them, but it was they who were wronging themselves.

data.name: Quran3381
data.value: The example of those who take allies other than Allah is like that of the spider who takes a home. And indeed, the weakest of homes is the home of the spider, if they only knew.

data.name: Quran3382
data.value: Indeed, Allah knows whatever thing they call upon other than Him. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran3383
data.value: And these examples We present to the people, but none will understand them except those of knowledge.

data.name: Quran3384
data.value: Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth. Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.

data.name: Quran3385
data.value: Recite, [O Muhammad], what has been revealed to you of the Book and establish prayer. Indeed, prayer prohibits immorality and wrongdoing, and the remembrance of Allah is greater. And Allah knows that which you do.

data.name: Quran3386
data.value: And do not argue with the People of the Scripture except in a way that is best, except for those who commit injustice among them, and say, "We believe in that which has been revealed to us and revealed to you. And our God and your God is one; and we are Muslims [in submission] to Him."

data.name: Quran3387
data.value: And thus We have sent down to you the Qur'an. And those to whom We [previously] gave the Scripture believe in it. And among these [people of Makkah] are those who believe in it. And none reject Our verses except the disbelievers.

data.name: Quran3388
data.value: And you did not recite before it any scripture, nor did you inscribe one with your right hand. Otherwise the falsifiers would have had [cause for] doubt.

data.name: Quran3389
data.value: Rather, the Qur'an is distinct verses [preserved] within the breasts of those who have been given knowledge. And none reject Our verses except the wrongdoers.

data.name: Quran3390
data.value: But they say, "Why are not signs sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, "The signs are only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner."

data.name: Quran3391
data.value: And is it not sufficient for them that We revealed to you the Book which is recited to them? Indeed in that is a mercy and reminder for a people who believe.

data.name: Quran3392
data.value: Say, "Sufficient is Allah between me and you as Witness. He knows what is in the heavens and earth. And they who have believed in falsehood and disbelieved in Allah - it is those who are the losers."

data.name: Quran3393
data.value: And they urge you to hasten the punishment. And if not for [the decree of] a specified term, punishment would have reached them. But it will surely come to them suddenly while they perceive not.

data.name: Quran3394
data.value: They urge you to hasten the punishment. And indeed, Hell will be encompassing of the disbelievers

data.name: Quran3395
data.value: On the Day the punishment will cover them from above them and from below their feet and it is said, "Taste [the result of] what you used to do."

data.name: Quran3396
data.value: O My servants who have believed, indeed My earth is spacious, so worship only Me.

data.name: Quran3397
data.value: Every soul will taste death. Then to Us will you be returned.

data.name: Quran3398
data.value: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - We will surely assign to them of Paradise [elevated] chambers beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. Excellent is the reward of the [righteous] workers

data.name: Quran3399
data.value: Who have been patient and upon their Lord rely.

data.name: Quran3400
data.value: And how many a creature carries not its [own] provision. Allah provides for it and for you. And He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

data.name: Quran3401
data.value: If you asked them, "Who created the heavens and earth and subjected the sun and the moon?" they would surely say, "Allah." Then how are they deluded?

data.name: Quran3402
data.value: Allah extends provision for whom He wills of His servants and restricts for him. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing.

data.name: Quran3403
data.value: And if you asked them, "Who sends down rain from the sky and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness?" they would surely say " Allah." Say, "Praise to Allah "; but most of them do not reason.

data.name: Quran3404
data.value: And this worldly life is not but diversion and amusement. And indeed, the home of the Hereafter - that is the [eternal] life, if only they knew.

data.name: Quran3405
data.value: And when they board a ship, they supplicate Allah, sincere to Him in religion. But when He delivers them to the land, at once they associate others with Him

data.name: Quran3406
data.value: So that they will deny what We have granted them, and they will enjoy themselves. But they are going to know.

data.name: Quran3407
data.value: Have they not seen that We made [Makkah] a safe sanctuary, while people are being taken away all around them? Then in falsehood do they believe, and in the favor of Allah they disbelieve?

data.name: Quran3408
data.value: And who is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah or denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell a [sufficient] residence for the disbelievers?

data.name: Quran3409
data.value: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways. And indeed, Allah is with the doers of good.

data.name: Quran3410
data.value: Alif, Lam, Meem.

data.name: Quran3411
data.value: The Byzantines have been defeated

data.name: Quran3412
data.value: In the nearest land. But they, after their defeat, will overcome.

data.name: Quran3413
data.value: Within three to nine years. To Allah belongs the command before and after. And that day the believers will rejoice

data.name: Quran3414
data.value: In the victory of Allah. He gives victory to whom He wills, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

data.name: Quran3415
data.value: [It is] the promise of Allah. Allah does not fail in His promise, but most of the people do not know.

data.name: Quran3416
data.value: They know what is apparent of the worldly life, but they, of the Hereafter, are unaware.

data.name: Quran3417
data.value: Do they not contemplate within themselves? Allah has not created the heavens and the earth and what is between them except in truth and for a specified term. And indeed, many of the people, in [the matter of] the meeting with their Lord, are disbelievers.

data.name: Quran3418
data.value: Have they not traveled through the earth and observed how was the end of those before them? They were greater than them in power, and they plowed the earth and built it up more than they have built it up, and their messengers came to them with clear evidences. And Allah would not ever have wronged them, but they were wronging themselves.

data.name: Quran3419
data.value: Then the end of those who did evil was the worst [consequence] because they denied the signs of Allah and used to ridicule them.

data.name: Quran3420
data.value: Allah begins creation; then He will repeat it; then to Him you will be returned.

data.name: Quran3421
data.value: And the Day the Hour appears the criminals will be in despair.

data.name: Quran3422
data.value: And there will not be for them among their [alleged] partners any intercessors, and they will [then] be disbelievers in their partners.

data.name: Quran3423
data.value: And the Day the Hour appears - that Day they will become separated.

data.name: Quran3424
data.value: And as for those who had believed and done righteous deeds, they will be in a garden [of Paradise], delighted.

data.name: Quran3425
data.value: But as for those who disbelieved and denied Our verses and the meeting of the Hereafter, those will be brought into the punishment [to remain].

data.name: Quran3426
data.value: So exalted is Allah when you reach the evening and when you reach the morning.

data.name: Quran3427
data.value: And to Him is [due all] praise throughout the heavens and the earth. And [exalted is He] at night and when you are at noon.

data.name: Quran3428
data.value: He brings the living out of the dead and brings the dead out of the living and brings to life the earth after its lifelessness. And thus will you be brought out.

data.name: Quran3429
data.value: And of His signs is that He created you from dust; then, suddenly you were human beings dispersing [throughout the earth].

data.name: Quran3430
data.value: And of His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquillity in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.

data.name: Quran3431
data.value: And of His signs is the creation of the heavens and the earth and the diversity of your languages and your colors. Indeed in that are signs for those of knowledge.

data.name: Quran3432
data.value: And of His signs is your sleep by night and day and your seeking of His bounty. Indeed in that are signs for a people who listen.

data.name: Quran3433
data.value: And of His signs is [that] He shows you the lightning [causing] fear and aspiration, and He sends down rain from the sky by which He brings to life the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed in that are signs for a people who use reason.

data.name: Quran3434
data.value: And of His signs is that the heaven and earth remain by His command. Then when He calls you with a [single] call from the earth, immediately you will come forth.

data.name: Quran3435
data.value: And to Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and earth. All are to Him devoutly obedient.

data.name: Quran3436
data.value: And it is He who begins creation; then He repeats it, and that is [even] easier for Him. To Him belongs the highest attribute in the heavens and earth. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran3437
data.value: He presents to you an example from yourselves. Do you have among those whom your right hands possess any partners in what We have provided for you so that you are equal therein [and] would fear them as your fear of one another [within a partnership]? Thus do We detail the verses for a people who use reason.

data.name: Quran3438
data.value: But those who wrong follow their [own] desires without knowledge. Then who can guide one whom Allah has sent astray? And for them there are no helpers.

data.name: Quran3439
data.value: So direct your face toward the religion, inclining to truth. [Adhere to] the fitrah of Allah upon which He has created [all] people. No change should there be in the creation of Allah. That is the correct religion, but most of the people do not know.

data.name: Quran3440
data.value: [Adhere to it], turning in repentance to Him, and fear Him and establish prayer and do not be of those who associate others with Allah

data.name: Quran3441
data.value: [Or] of those who have divided their religion and become sects, every faction rejoicing in what it has.

data.name: Quran3442
data.value: And when adversity touches the people, they call upon their Lord, turning in repentance to Him. Then when He lets them taste mercy from Him, at once a party of them associate others with their Lord,

data.name: Quran3443
data.value: So that they will deny what We have granted them. Then enjoy yourselves, for you are going to know.

data.name: Quran3444
data.value: Or have We sent down to them an authority, and it speaks of what they were associating with Him?

data.name: Quran3445
data.value: And when We let the people taste mercy, they rejoice therein, but if evil afflicts them for what their hands have put forth, immediately they despair.

data.name: Quran3446
data.value: Do they not see that Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]? Indeed, in that are signs for a people who believe.

data.name: Quran3447
data.value: So give the relative his right, as well as the needy and the traveler. That is best for those who desire the countenance of Allah, and it is they who will be the successful.

data.name: Quran3448
data.value: And whatever you give for interest to increase within the wealth of people will not increase with Allah. But what you give in zakah, desiring the countenance of Allah - those are the multipliers.

data.name: Quran3449
data.value: Allah is the one who created you, then provided for you, then will cause you to die, and then will give you life. Are there any of your "partners" who does anything of that? Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.

data.name: Quran3450
data.value: Corruption has appeared throughout the land and sea by [reason of] what the hands of people have earned so He may let them taste part of [the consequence of] what they have done that perhaps they will return [to righteousness].

data.name: Quran3451
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how was the end of those before. Most of them were associators [of others with Allah].

data.name: Quran3452
data.value: So direct your face toward the correct religion before a Day comes from Allah of which there is no repelling. That Day, they will be divided.

data.name: Quran3453
data.value: Whoever disbelieves - upon him is [the consequence of] his disbelief. And whoever does righteousness - they are for themselves preparing,

data.name: Quran3454
data.value: That He may reward those who have believed and done righteous deeds out of His bounty. Indeed, He does not like the disbelievers.

data.name: Quran3455
data.value: And of His signs is that He sends the winds as bringers of good tidings and to let you taste His mercy and so the ships may sail at His command and so you may seek of His bounty, and perhaps you will be grateful.

data.name: Quran3456
data.value: And We have already sent messengers before you to their peoples, and they came to them with clear evidences; then We took retribution from those who committed crimes, and incumbent upon Us was support of the believers.

data.name: Quran3457
data.value: It is Allah who sends the winds, and they stir the clouds and spread them in the sky however He wills, and He makes them fragments so you see the rain emerge from within them. And when He causes it to fall upon whom He wills of His servants, immediately they rejoice

data.name: Quran3458
data.value: Although they were, before it was sent down upon them - before that, in despair.

data.name: Quran3459
data.value: So observe the effects of the mercy of Allah - how He gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed, that [same one] will give life to the dead, and He is over all things competent.

data.name: Quran3460
data.value: But if We should send a [bad] wind and they saw [their crops] turned yellow, they would remain thereafter disbelievers.

data.name: Quran3461
data.value: So indeed, you will not make the dead hear, nor will you make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs, retreating.

data.name: Quran3462
data.value: And you cannot guide the blind away from their error. You will only make hear those who believe in Our verses so they are Muslims [in submission to Allah].

data.name: Quran3463
data.value: Allah is the one who created you from weakness, then made after weakness strength, then made after strength weakness and white hair. He creates what He wills, and He is the Knowing, the Competent.

data.name: Quran3464
data.value: And the Day the Hour appears the criminals will swear they had remained but an hour. Thus they were deluded.

data.name: Quran3465
data.value: But those who were given knowledge and faith will say, "You remained the extent of Allah 's decree until the Day of Resurrection, and this is the Day of Resurrection, but you did not used to know."

data.name: Quran3466
data.value: So that Day, their excuse will not benefit those who wronged, nor will they be asked to appease [Allah].

data.name: Quran3467
data.value: And We have certainly presented to the people in this Qur'an from every [kind of] example. But, [O Muhammad], if you should bring them a sign, the disbelievers will surely say, "You [believers] are but falsifiers."

data.name: Quran3468
data.value: Thus does Allah seal the hearts of those who do not know.

data.name: Quran3469
data.value: So be patient. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And let them not disquiet you who are not certain [in faith].

data.name: Quran3470
data.value: Alif, Lam, Meem.

data.name: Quran3471
data.value: These are verses of the wise Book,

data.name: Quran3472
data.value: As guidance and mercy for the doers of good

data.name: Quran3473
data.value: Who establish prayer and give zakah, and they, of the Hereafter, are certain [in faith].

data.name: Quran3474
data.value: Those are on [right] guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful.

data.name: Quran3475
data.value: And of the people is he who buys the amusement of speech to mislead [others] from the way of Allah without knowledge and who takes it in ridicule. Those will have a humiliating punishment.

data.name: Quran3476
data.value: And when our verses are recited to him, he turns away arrogantly as if he had not heard them, as if there was in his ears deafness. So give him tidings of a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran3477
data.value: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them are the Gardens of Pleasure.

data.name: Quran3478
data.value: Wherein they abide eternally; [it is] the promise of Allah [which is] truth. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran3479
data.value: He created the heavens without pillars that you see and has cast into the earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shift with you, and dispersed therein from every creature. And We sent down rain from the sky and made grow therein [plants] of every noble kind.

data.name: Quran3480
data.value: This is the creation of Allah. So show Me what those other than Him have created. Rather, the wrongdoers are in clear error.

data.name: Quran3481
data.value: And We had certainly given Luqman wisdom [and said], "Be grateful to Allah." And whoever is grateful is grateful for [the benefit of] himself. And whoever denies [His favor] - then indeed, Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy.

data.name: Quran3482
data.value: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Luqman said to his son while he was instructing him, "O my son, do not associate [anything] with Allah. Indeed, association [with him] is great injustice."

data.name: Quran3483
data.value: And We have enjoined upon man [care] for his parents. His mother carried him, [increasing her] in weakness upon weakness, and his weaning is in two years. Be grateful to Me and to your parents; to Me is the [final] destination.

data.name: Quran3484
data.value: But if they endeavor to make you associate with Me that of which you have no knowledge, do not obey them but accompany them in [this] world with appropriate kindness and follow the way of those who turn back to Me [in repentance]. Then to Me will be your return, and I will inform you about what you used to do.

data.name: Quran3485
data.value: [And Luqman said], "O my son, indeed if wrong should be the weight of a mustard seed and should be within a rock or [anywhere] in the heavens or in the earth, Allah will bring it forth. Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Acquainted.

data.name: Quran3486
data.value: O my son, establish prayer, enjoin what is right, forbid what is wrong, and be patient over what befalls you. Indeed, [all] that is of the matters [requiring] determination.

data.name: Quran3487
data.value: And do not turn your cheek [in contempt] toward people and do not walk through the earth exultantly. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful.

data.name: Quran3488
data.value: And be moderate in your pace and lower your voice; indeed, the most disagreeable of sounds is the voice of donkeys."

data.name: Quran3489
data.value: Do you not see that Allah has made subject to you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth and amply bestowed upon you His favors, [both] apparent and unapparent? But of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge or guidance or an enlightening Book [from Him].

data.name: Quran3490
data.value: And when it is said to them, "Follow what Allah has revealed," they say, "Rather, we will follow that upon which we found our fathers." Even if Satan was inviting them to the punishment of the Blaze?

data.name: Quran3491
data.value: And whoever submits his face to Allah while he is a doer of good - then he has grasped the most trustworthy handhold. And to Allah will be the outcome of [all] matters.

data.name: Quran3492
data.value: And whoever has disbelieved - let not his disbelief grieve you. To Us is their return, and We will inform them of what they did. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts.

data.name: Quran3493
data.value: We grant them enjoyment for a little; then We will force them to a massive punishment.

data.name: Quran3494
data.value: And if you asked them, "Who created the heavens and earth?" they would surely say, "Allah." Say, "[All] praise is [due] to Allah "; but most of them do not know.

data.name: Quran3495
data.value: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. Indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.

data.name: Quran3496
data.value: And if whatever trees upon the earth were pens and the sea [was ink], replenished thereafter by seven [more] seas, the words of Allah would not be exhausted. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.

data.name: Quran3497
data.value: Your creation and your resurrection will not be but as that of a single soul. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.

data.name: Quran3498
data.value: Do you not see that Allah causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night and has subjected the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term, and that Allah, with whatever you do, is Acquainted?

data.name: Quran3499
data.value: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that what they call upon other than Him is falsehood, and because Allah is the Most High, the Grand.

data.name: Quran3500
data.value: Do you not see that ships sail through the sea by the favor of Allah that He may show you of His signs? Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.

data.name: Quran3501
data.value: And when waves come over them like canopies, they supplicate Allah, sincere to Him in religion. But when He delivers them to the land, there are [some] of them who are moderate [in faith]. And none rejects Our signs except everyone treacherous and ungrateful.

data.name: Quran3502
data.value: O mankind, fear your Lord and fear a Day when no father will avail his son, nor will a son avail his father at all. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth, so let not the worldly life delude you and be not deceived about Allah by the Deceiver.

data.name: Quran3503
data.value: Indeed, Allah [alone] has knowledge of the Hour and sends down the rain and knows what is in the wombs. And no soul perceives what it will earn tomorrow, and no soul perceives in what land it will die. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted.

data.name: Quran3504
data.value: Alif, Lam, Meem.

data.name: Quran3505
data.value: [This is] the revelation of the Book about which there is no doubt from the Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran3506
data.value: Or do they say, "He invented it"? Rather, it is the truth from your Lord, [O Muhammad], that you may warn a people to whom no warner has come before you [so] perhaps they will be guided.

data.name: Quran3507
data.value: It is Allah who created the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them in six days; then He established Himself above the Throne. You have not besides Him any protector or any intercessor; so will you not be reminded?

data.name: Quran3508
data.value: He arranges [each] matter from the heaven to the earth; then it will ascend to Him in a Day, the extent of which is a thousand years of those which you count.

data.name: Quran3509
data.value: That is the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,

data.name: Quran3510
data.value: Who perfected everything which He created and began the creation of man from clay.

data.name: Quran3511
data.value: Then He made his posterity out of the extract of a liquid disdained.

data.name: Quran3512
data.value: Then He proportioned him and breathed into him from His [created] soul and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful.

data.name: Quran3513
data.value: And they say, "When we are lost within the earth, will we indeed be [recreated] in a new creation?" Rather, they are, in [the matter of] the meeting with their Lord, disbelievers.

data.name: Quran3514
data.value: Say, "The angel of death will take you who has been entrusted with you. Then to your Lord you will be returned."

data.name: Quran3515
data.value: If you could but see when the criminals are hanging their heads before their Lord, [saying], "Our Lord, we have seen and heard, so return us [to the world]; we will work righteousness. Indeed, we are [now] certain."

data.name: Quran3516
data.value: And if We had willed, We could have given every soul its guidance, but the word from Me will come into effect [that] "I will surely fill Hell with jinn and people all together.

data.name: Quran3517
data.value: So taste [punishment] because you forgot the meeting of this, your Day; indeed, We have [accordingly] forgotten you. And taste the punishment of eternity for what you used to do."

data.name: Quran3518
data.value: Only those believe in Our verses who, when they are reminded by them, fall down in prostration and exalt [Allah] with praise of their Lord, and they are not arrogant.

data.name: Quran3519
data.value: They arise from [their] beds; they supplicate their Lord in fear and aspiration, and from what We have provided them, they spend.

data.name: Quran3520
data.value: And no soul knows what has been hidden for them of comfort for eyes as reward for what they used to do.

data.name: Quran3521
data.value: Then is one who was a believer like one who was defiantly disobedient? They are not equal.

data.name: Quran3522
data.value: As for those who believed and did righteous deeds, for them will be the Gardens of Refuge as accommodation for what they used to do.

data.name: Quran3523
data.value: But as for those who defiantly disobeyed, their refuge is the Fire. Every time they wish to emerge from it, they will be returned to it while it is said to them, "Taste the punishment of the Fire which you used to deny."

data.name: Quran3524
data.value: And we will surely let them taste the nearer punishment short of the greater punishment that perhaps they will repent.

data.name: Quran3525
data.value: And who is more unjust than one who is reminded of the verses of his Lord; then he turns away from them? Indeed We, from the criminals, will take retribution.

data.name: Quran3526
data.value: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture, so do not be in doubt over his meeting. And we made the Torah guidance for the Children of Israel.

data.name: Quran3527
data.value: And We made from among them leaders guiding by Our command when they were patient and [when] they were certain of Our signs.

data.name: Quran3528
data.value: Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.

data.name: Quran3529
data.value: Has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them, [as] they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs; then do they not hear?

data.name: Quran3530
data.value: Have they not seen that We drive the water [in clouds] to barren land and bring forth thereby crops from which their livestock eat and [they] themselves? Then do they not see?

data.name: Quran3531
data.value: And they say, "When will be this conquest, if you should be truthful?"

data.name: Quran3532
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "On the Day of Conquest the belief of those who had disbelieved will not benefit them, nor will they be reprieved."

data.name: Quran3533
data.value: So turn away from them and wait. Indeed, they are waiting.

data.name: Quran3534
data.value: O Prophet, fear Allah and do not obey the disbelievers and the hypocrites. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.

data.name: Quran3535
data.value: And follow that which is revealed to you from your Lord. Indeed Allah is ever, with what you do, Acquainted.

data.name: Quran3536
data.value: And rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.

data.name: Quran3537
data.value: Allah has not made for a man two hearts in his interior. And He has not made your wives whom you declare unlawful your mothers. And he has not made your adopted sons your [true] sons. That is [merely] your saying by your mouths, but Allah says the truth, and He guides to the [right] way.

data.name: Quran3538
data.value: Call them by [the names of] their fathers; it is more just in the sight of Allah. But if you do not know their fathers - then they are [still] your brothers in religion and those entrusted to you. And there is no blame upon you for that in which you have erred but [only for] what your hearts intended. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran3539
data.value: The Prophet is more worthy of the believers than themselves, and his wives are [in the position of] their mothers. And those of [blood] relationship are more entitled [to inheritance] in the decree of Allah than the [other] believers and the emigrants, except that you may do to your close associates a kindness [through bequest]. That was in the Book inscribed.

data.name: Quran3540
data.value: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We took from the prophets their covenant and from you and from Noah and Abraham and Moses and Jesus, the son of Mary; and We took from them a solemn covenant.

data.name: Quran3541
data.value: That He may question the truthful about their truth. And He has prepared for the disbelievers a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran3542
data.value: O you who have believed, remember the favor of Allah upon you when armies came to [attack] you and We sent upon them a wind and armies [of angels] you did not see. And ever is Allah, of what you do, Seeing.

data.name: Quran3543
data.value: [Remember] when they came at you from above you and from below you, and when eyes shifted [in fear], and hearts reached the throats and you assumed about Allah [various] assumptions.

data.name: Quran3544
data.value: There the believers were tested and shaken with a severe shaking.

data.name: Quran3545
data.value: And [remember] when the hypocrites and those in whose hearts is disease said, "Allah and His Messenger did not promise us except delusion,"

data.name: Quran3546
data.value: And when a faction of them said, "O people of Yathrib, there is no stability for you [here], so return [home]." And a party of them asked permission of the Prophet, saying, "Indeed, our houses are unprotected," while they were not exposed. They did not intend except to flee.

data.name: Quran3547
data.value: And if they had been entered upon from all its [surrounding] regions and fitnah had been demanded of them, they would have done it and not hesitated over it except briefly.

data.name: Quran3548
data.value: And they had already promised Allah before not to turn their backs and flee. And ever is the promise to Allah [that about which one will be] questioned.

data.name: Quran3549
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "Never will fleeing benefit you if you should flee from death or killing; and then [if you did], you would not be given enjoyment [of life] except for a little."

data.name: Quran3550
data.value: Say, "Who is it that can protect you from Allah if He intends for you an ill or intends for you a mercy?" And they will not find for themselves besides Allah any protector or any helper.

data.name: Quran3551
data.value: Already Allah knows the hinderers among you and those [hypocrites] who say to their brothers, "Come to us," and do not go to battle, except for a few,

data.name: Quran3552
data.value: Indisposed toward you. And when fear comes, you see them looking at you, their eyes revolving like one being overcome by death. But when fear departs, they lash you with sharp tongues, indisposed toward [any] good. Those have not believed, so Allah has rendered their deeds worthless, and ever is that, for Allah, easy.

data.name: Quran3553
data.value: They think the companies have not [yet] withdrawn. And if the companies should come [again], they would wish they were in the desert among the bedouins, inquiring [from afar] about your news. And if they should be among you, they would not fight except for a little.

data.name: Quran3554
data.value: There has certainly been for you in the Messenger of Allah an excellent pattern for anyone whose hope is in Allah and the Last Day and [who] remembers Allah often.

data.name: Quran3555
data.value: And when the believers saw the companies, they said, "This is what Allah and His Messenger had promised us, and Allah and His Messenger spoke the truth." And it increased them only in faith and acceptance.

data.name: Quran3556
data.value: Among the believers are men true to what they promised Allah. Among them is he who has fulfilled his vow [to the death], and among them is he who awaits [his chance]. And they did not alter [the terms of their commitment] by any alteration -

data.name: Quran3557
data.value: That Allah may reward the truthful for their truth and punish the hypocrites if He wills or accept their repentance. Indeed, Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran3558
data.value: And Allah repelled those who disbelieved, in their rage, not having obtained any good. And sufficient was Allah for the believers in battle, and ever is Allah Powerful and Exalted in Might.

data.name: Quran3559
data.value: And He brought down those who supported them among the People of the Scripture from their fortresses and cast terror into their hearts [so that] a party you killed, and you took captive a party.

data.name: Quran3560
data.value: And He caused you to inherit their land and their homes and their properties and a land which you have not trodden. And ever is Allah, over all things, competent.

data.name: Quran3561
data.value: O Prophet, say to your wives, "If you should desire the worldly life and its adornment, then come, I will provide for you and give you a gracious release.

data.name: Quran3562
data.value: But if you should desire Allah and His Messenger and the home of the Hereafter - then indeed, Allah has prepared for the doers of good among you a great reward."
