data.name: Quran3563
data.value: O wives of the Prophet, whoever of you should commit a clear immorality - for her the punishment would be doubled two fold, and ever is that, for Allah, easy.

data.name: Quran3564
data.value: And whoever of you devoutly obeys Allah and His Messenger and does righteousness - We will give her her reward twice; and We have prepared for her a noble provision.

data.name: Quran3565
data.value: O wives of the Prophet, you are not like anyone among women. If you fear Allah, then do not be soft in speech [to men], lest he in whose heart is disease should covet, but speak with appropriate speech.

data.name: Quran3566
data.value: And abide in your houses and do not display yourselves as [was] the display of the former times of ignorance. And establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. Allah intends only to remove from you the impurity [of sin], O people of the [Prophet's] household, and to purify you with [extensive] purification.

data.name: Quran3567
data.value: And remember what is recited in your houses of the verses of Allah and wisdom. Indeed, Allah is ever Subtle and Acquainted [with all things].

data.name: Quran3568
data.value: Indeed, the Muslim men and Muslim women, the believing men and believing women, the obedient men and obedient women, the truthful men and truthful women, the patient men and patient women, the humble men and humble women, the charitable men and charitable women, the fasting men and fasting women, the men who guard their private parts and the women who do so, and the men who remember Allah often and the women who do so - for them Allah has prepared forgiveness and a great reward.

data.name: Quran3569
data.value: It is not for a believing man or a believing woman, when Allah and His Messenger have decided a matter, that they should [thereafter] have any choice about their affair. And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger has certainly strayed into clear error.

data.name: Quran3570
data.value: And [remember, O Muhammad], when you said to the one on whom Allah bestowed favor and you bestowed favor, "Keep your wife and fear Allah," while you concealed within yourself that which Allah is to disclose. And you feared the people, while Allah has more right that you fear Him. So when Zayd had no longer any need for her, We married her to you in order that there not be upon the believers any discomfort concerning the wives of their adopted sons when they no longer have need of them. And ever is the command of Allah accomplished.

data.name: Quran3571
data.value: There is not to be upon the Prophet any discomfort concerning that which Allah has imposed upon him. [This is] the established way of Allah with those [prophets] who have passed on before. And ever is the command of Allah a destiny decreed.

data.name: Quran3572
data.value: [Allah praises] those who convey the messages of Allah and fear Him and do not fear anyone but Allah. And sufficient is Allah as Accountant.

data.name: Quran3573
data.value: Muhammad is not the father of [any] one of your men, but [he is] the Messenger of Allah and last of the prophets. And ever is Allah, of all things, Knowing.

data.name: Quran3574
data.value: O you who have believed, remember Allah with much remembrance

data.name: Quran3575
data.value: And exalt Him morning and afternoon.

data.name: Quran3576
data.value: It is He who confers blessing upon you, and His angels [ask Him to do so] that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And ever is He, to the believers, Merciful.

data.name: Quran3577
data.value: Their greeting the Day they meet Him will be, "Peace." And He has prepared for them a noble reward.

data.name: Quran3578
data.value: O Prophet, indeed We have sent you as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner.

data.name: Quran3579
data.value: And one who invites to Allah, by His permission, and an illuminating lamp.

data.name: Quran3580
data.value: And give good tidings to the believers that they will have from Allah great bounty.

data.name: Quran3581
data.value: And do not obey the disbelievers and the hypocrites but do not harm them, and rely upon Allah. And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.

data.name: Quran3582
data.value: O You who have believed, when you marry believing women and then divorce them before you have touched them, then there is not for you any waiting period to count concerning them. So provide for them and give them a gracious release.

data.name: Quran3583
data.value: O Prophet, indeed We have made lawful to you your wives to whom you have given their due compensation and those your right hand possesses from what Allah has returned to you [of captives] and the daughters of your paternal uncles and the daughters of your paternal aunts and the daughters of your maternal uncles and the daughters of your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a believing woman if she gives herself to the Prophet [and] if the Prophet wishes to marry her, [this is] only for you, excluding the [other] believers. We certainly know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and those their right hands possess, [but this is for you] in order that there will be upon you no discomfort. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran3584
data.value: You, [O Muhammad], may put aside whom you will of them or take to yourself whom you will. And any that you desire of those [wives] from whom you had [temporarily] separated - there is no blame upon you [in returning her]. That is more suitable that they should be content and not grieve and that they should be satisfied with what you have given them - all of them. And Allah knows what is in your hearts. And ever is Allah Knowing and Forbearing.

data.name: Quran3585
data.value: Not lawful to you, [O Muhammad], are [any additional] women after [this], nor [is it] for you to exchange them for [other] wives, even if their beauty were to please you, except what your right hand possesses. And ever is Allah, over all things, an Observer.

data.name: Quran3586
data.value: O you who have believed, do not enter the houses of the Prophet except when you are permitted for a meal, without awaiting its readiness. But when you are invited, then enter; and when you have eaten, disperse without seeking to remain for conversation. Indeed, that [behavior] was troubling the Prophet, and he is shy of [dismissing] you. But Allah is not shy of the truth. And when you ask [his wives] for something, ask them from behind a partition. That is purer for your hearts and their hearts. And it is not [conceivable or lawful] for you to harm the Messenger of Allah or to marry his wives after him, ever. Indeed, that would be in the sight of Allah an enormity.

data.name: Quran3587
data.value: Whether you reveal a thing or conceal it, indeed Allah is ever, of all things, Knowing.

data.name: Quran3588
data.value: There is no blame upon women concerning their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their brothers' sons or their sisters' sons or their women or those their right hands possess. And fear Allah. Indeed Allah is ever, over all things, Witness.

data.name: Quran3589
data.value: Indeed, Allah confers blessing upon the Prophet, and His angels [ask Him to do so]. O you who have believed, ask [Allah to confer] blessing upon him and ask [Allah to grant him] peace.

data.name: Quran3590
data.value: Indeed, those who abuse Allah and His Messenger - Allah has cursed them in this world and the Hereafter and prepared for them a humiliating punishment.

data.name: Quran3591
data.value: And those who harm believing men and believing women for [something] other than what they have earned have certainly born upon themselves a slander and manifest sin.

data.name: Quran3592
data.value: O Prophet, tell your wives and your daughters and the women of the believers to bring down over themselves [part] of their outer garments. That is more suitable that they will be known and not be abused. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran3593
data.value: If the hypocrites and those in whose hearts is disease and those who spread rumors in al-Madinah do not cease, We will surely incite you against them; then they will not remain your neighbors therein except for a little.

data.name: Quran3594
data.value: Accursed wherever they are found, [being] seized and massacred completely.

data.name: Quran3595
data.value: [This is] the established way of Allah with those who passed on before; and you will not find in the way of Allah any change.

data.name: Quran3596
data.value: People ask you concerning the Hour. Say," Knowledge of it is only with Allah. And what may make you perceive? Perhaps the Hour is near."

data.name: Quran3597
data.value: Indeed, Allah has cursed the disbelievers and prepared for them a Blaze.

data.name: Quran3598
data.value: Abiding therein forever, they will not find a protector or a helper.

data.name: Quran3599
data.value: The Day their faces will be turned about in the Fire, they will say, "How we wish we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger."

data.name: Quran3600
data.value: And they will say, "Our Lord, indeed we obeyed our masters and our dignitaries, and they led us astray from the [right] way.

data.name: Quran3601
data.value: Our Lord, give them double the punishment and curse them with a great curse."

data.name: Quran3602
data.value: O you who have believed, be not like those who abused Moses; then Allah cleared him of what they said. And he, in the sight of Allah, was distinguished.

data.name: Quran3603
data.value: O you who have believed, fear Allah and speak words of appropriate justice.

data.name: Quran3604
data.value: He will [then] amend for you your deeds and forgive you your sins. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger has certainly attained a great attainment.

data.name: Quran3605
data.value: Indeed, we offered the Trust to the heavens and the earth and the mountains, and they declined to bear it and feared it; but man [undertook to] bear it. Indeed, he was unjust and ignorant.

data.name: Quran3606
data.value: [It was] so that Allah may punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women and the men and women who associate others with Him and that Allah may accept repentance from the believing men and believing women. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran3607
data.value: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and to Him belongs [all] praise in the Hereafter. And He is the Wise, the Acquainted.

data.name: Quran3608
data.value: He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein. And He is the Merciful, the Forgiving.

data.name: Quran3609
data.value: But those who disbelieve say, "The Hour will not come to us." Say, "Yes, by my Lord, it will surely come to you. [Allah is] the Knower of the unseen." Not absent from Him is an atom's weight within the heavens or within the earth or [what is] smaller than that or greater, except that it is in a clear register -

data.name: Quran3610
data.value: That He may reward those who believe and do righteous deeds. Those will have forgiveness and noble provision.

data.name: Quran3611
data.value: But those who strive against Our verses [seeking] to cause failure - for them will be a painful punishment of foul nature.

data.name: Quran3612
data.value: And those who have been given knowledge see that what is revealed to you from your Lord is the truth, and it guides to the path of the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy.

data.name: Quran3613
data.value: But those who disbelieve say, "Shall we direct you to a man who will inform you [that] when you have disintegrated in complete disintegration, you will [then] be [recreated] in a new creation?

data.name: Quran3614
data.value: Has he invented about Allah a lie or is there in him madness?" Rather, they who do not believe in the Hereafter will be in the punishment and [are in] extreme error.

data.name: Quran3615
data.value: Then, do they not look at what is before them and what is behind them of the heaven and earth? If We should will, We could cause the earth to swallow them or [could] let fall upon them fragments from the sky. Indeed in that is a sign for every servant turning back [to Allah].

data.name: Quran3616
data.value: And We certainly gave David from Us bounty. [We said], "O mountains, repeat [Our] praises with him, and the birds [as well]." And We made pliable for him iron,

data.name: Quran3617
data.value: [Commanding him], "Make full coats of mail and calculate [precisely] the links, and work [all of you] righteousness. Indeed I, of what you do, am Seeing."

data.name: Quran3618
data.value: And to Solomon [We subjected] the wind - its morning [journey was that of] a month - and its afternoon [journey was that of] a month, and We made flow for him a spring of [liquid] copper. And among the jinn were those who worked for him by the permission of his Lord. And whoever deviated among them from Our command - We will make him taste of the punishment of the Blaze.

data.name: Quran3619
data.value: They made for him what he willed of elevated chambers, statues, bowls like reservoirs, and stationary kettles. [We said], "Work, O family of David, in gratitude." And few of My servants are grateful.

data.name: Quran3620
data.value: And when We decreed for Solomon death, nothing indicated to the jinn his death except a creature of the earth eating his staff. But when he fell, it became clear to the jinn that if they had known the unseen, they would not have remained in humiliating punishment.

data.name: Quran3621
data.value: There was for [the tribe of] Saba' in their dwelling place a sign: two [fields of] gardens on the right and on the left. [They were told], "Eat from the provisions of your Lord and be grateful to Him. A good land [have you], and a forgiving Lord."

data.name: Quran3622
data.value: But they turned away [refusing], so We sent upon them the flood of the dam, and We replaced their two [fields of] gardens with gardens of bitter fruit, tamarisks and something of sparse lote trees.

data.name: Quran3623
data.value: [By] that We repaid them because they disbelieved. And do We [thus] repay except the ungrateful?

data.name: Quran3624
data.value: And We placed between them and the cities which We had blessed [many] visible cities. And We determined between them the [distances of] journey, [saying], "Travel between them by night or day in safety."

data.name: Quran3625
data.value: But [insolently] they said, "Our Lord, lengthen the distance between our journeys," and wronged themselves, so We made them narrations and dispersed them in total dispersion. Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.

data.name: Quran3626
data.value: And Iblees had already confirmed through them his assumption, so they followed him, except for a party of believers.

data.name: Quran3627
data.value: And he had over them no authority except [it was decreed] that We might make evident who believes in the Hereafter from who is thereof in doubt. And your Lord, over all things, is Guardian.

data.name: Quran3628
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "Invoke those you claim [as deities] besides Allah." They do not possess an atom's weight [of ability] in the heavens or on the earth, and they do not have therein any partnership [with Him], nor is there for Him from among them any assistant.

data.name: Quran3629
data.value: And intercession does not benefit with Him except for one whom He permits. [And those wait] until, when terror is removed from their hearts, they will say [to one another], "What has your Lord said?" They will say, "The truth." And He is the Most High, the Grand.

data.name: Quran3630
data.value: Say, "Who provides for you from the heavens and the earth?" Say, "Allah. And indeed, we or you are either upon guidance or in clear error."

data.name: Quran3631
data.value: Say, "You will not be asked about what we committed, and we will not be asked about what you do."

data.name: Quran3632
data.value: Say, "Our Lord will bring us together; then He will judge between us in truth. And He is the Knowing Judge."

data.name: Quran3633
data.value: Say, "Show me those whom you have attached to Him as partners. No! Rather, He [alone] is Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise."

data.name: Quran3634
data.value: And We have not sent you except comprehensively to mankind as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. But most of the people do not know.

data.name: Quran3635
data.value: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

data.name: Quran3636
data.value: Say, "For you is the appointment of a Day [when] you will not remain thereafter an hour, nor will you precede [it]."

data.name: Quran3637
data.value: And those who disbelieve say, "We will never believe in this Qur'an nor in that before it." But if you could see when the wrongdoers are made to stand before their Lord, refuting each other's words... Those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, "If not for you, we would have been believers."

data.name: Quran3638
data.value: Those who were arrogant will say to those who were oppressed, "Did we avert you from guidance after it had come to you? Rather, you were criminals."

data.name: Quran3639
data.value: Those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, "Rather, [it was your] conspiracy of night and day when you were ordering us to disbelieve in Allah and attribute to Him equals." But they will [all] confide regret when they see the punishment; and We will put shackles on the necks of those who disbelieved. Will they be recompensed except for what they used to do?

data.name: Quran3640
data.value: And We did not send into a city any warner except that its affluent said, "Indeed we, in that with which you were sent, are disbelievers."

data.name: Quran3641
data.value: And they said, "We are more [than the believers] in wealth and children, and we are not to be punished."

data.name: Quran3642
data.value: Say, "Indeed, my Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it], but most of the people do not know."

data.name: Quran3643
data.value: And it is not your wealth or your children that bring you nearer to Us in position, but it is [by being] one who has believed and done righteousness. For them there will be the double reward for what they did, and they will be in the upper chambers [of Paradise], safe [and secure].

data.name: Quran3644
data.value: And the ones who strive against Our verses to cause [them] failure - those will be brought into the punishment [to remain].

data.name: Quran3645
data.value: Say, "Indeed, my Lord extends provision for whom He wills of His servants and restricts [it] for him. But whatever thing you spend [in His cause] - He will compensate it; and He is the best of providers."

data.name: Quran3646
data.value: And [mention] the Day when He will gather them all and then say to the angels, "Did these [people] used to worship you?"

data.name: Quran3647
data.value: They will say, "Exalted are You! You, [O Allah], are our benefactor not them. Rather, they used to worship the jinn; most of them were believers in them."

data.name: Quran3648
data.value: But today you do not hold for one another [the power of] benefit or harm, and We will say to those who wronged, "Taste the punishment of the Fire, which you used to deny."

data.name: Quran3649
data.value: And when our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, they say, "This is not but a man who wishes to avert you from that which your fathers were worshipping." And they say, "This is not except a lie invented." And those who disbelieve say of the truth when it has come to them, "This is not but obvious magic."

data.name: Quran3650
data.value: And We had not given them any scriptures which they could study, and We had not sent to them before you, [O Muhammad], any warner.

data.name: Quran3651
data.value: And those before them denied, and the people of Makkah have not attained a tenth of what We had given them. But the former peoples denied My messengers, so how [terrible] was My reproach.

data.name: Quran3652
data.value: Say, "I only advise you of one [thing] - that you stand for Allah, [seeking truth] in pairs and individually, and then give thought." There is not in your companion any madness. He is only a warner to you before a severe punishment.

data.name: Quran3653
data.value: Say, "Whatever payment I might have asked of you - it is yours. My payment is only from Allah, and He is, over all things, Witness."

data.name: Quran3654
data.value: Say, "Indeed, my Lord projects the truth. Knower of the unseen."

data.name: Quran3655
data.value: Say, "The truth has come, and falsehood can neither begin [anything] nor repeat [it]."

data.name: Quran3656
data.value: Say, "If I should err, I would only err against myself. But if I am guided, it is by what my Lord reveals to me. Indeed, He is Hearing and near."

data.name: Quran3657
data.value: And if you could see when they are terrified but there is no escape, and they will be seized from a place nearby.

data.name: Quran3658
data.value: And they will [then] say, "We believe in it!" But how for them will be the taking [of faith] from a place far away?

data.name: Quran3659
data.value: And they had already disbelieved in it before and would assault the unseen from a place far away.

data.name: Quran3660
data.value: And prevention will be placed between them and what they desire, as was done with their kind before. Indeed, they were in disquieting denial.

data.name: Quran3661
data.value: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Creator of the heavens and the earth, [who] made the angels messengers having wings, two or three or four. He increases in creation what He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.

data.name: Quran3662
data.value: Whatever Allah grants to people of mercy - none can withhold it; and whatever He withholds - none can release it thereafter. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran3663
data.value: O mankind, remember the favor of Allah upon you. Is there any creator other than Allah who provides for you from the heaven and earth? There is no deity except Him, so how are you deluded?

data.name: Quran3664
data.value: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad] - already were messengers denied before you. And to Allah are returned [all] matters.

data.name: Quran3665
data.value: O mankind, indeed the promise of Allah is truth, so let not the worldly life delude you and be not deceived about Allah by the Deceiver.

data.name: Quran3666
data.value: Indeed, Satan is an enemy to you; so take him as an enemy. He only invites his party to be among the companions of the Blaze.

data.name: Quran3667
data.value: Those who disbelieve will have a severe punishment, and those who believe and do righteous deeds will have forgiveness and great reward.

data.name: Quran3668
data.value: Then is one to whom the evil of his deed has been made attractive so he considers it good [like one rightly guided]? For indeed, Allah sends astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. So do not let yourself perish over them in regret. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what they do.

data.name: Quran3669
data.value: And it is Allah who sends the winds, and they stir the clouds, and We drive them to a dead land and give life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness. Thus is the resurrection.

data.name: Quran3670
data.value: Whoever desires honor [through power] - then to Allah belongs all honor. To Him ascends good speech, and righteous work raises it. But they who plot evil deeds will have a severe punishment, and the plotting of those - it will perish.

data.name: Quran3671
data.value: And Allah created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop; then He made you mates. And no female conceives nor does she give birth except with His knowledge. And no aged person is granted [additional] life nor is his lifespan lessened but that it is in a register. Indeed, that for Allah is easy.

data.name: Quran3672
data.value: And not alike are the two bodies of water. One is fresh and sweet, palatable for drinking, and one is salty and bitter. And from each you eat tender meat and extract ornaments which you wear, and you see the ships plowing through [them] that you might seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful.

data.name: Quran3673
data.value: He causes the night to enter the day, and He causes the day to enter the night and has subjected the sun and the moon - each running [its course] for a specified term. That is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs sovereignty. And those whom you invoke other than Him do not possess [as much as] the membrane of a date seed.

data.name: Quran3674
data.value: If you invoke them, they do not hear your supplication; and if they heard, they would not respond to you. And on the Day of Resurrection they will deny your association. And none can inform you like [one] Acquainted [with all matters].

data.name: Quran3675
data.value: O mankind, you are those in need of Allah, while Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.

data.name: Quran3676
data.value: If He wills, He can do away with you and bring forth a new creation.

data.name: Quran3677
data.value: And that is for Allah not difficult.

data.name: Quran3678
data.value: And no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. And if a heavily laden soul calls [another] to [carry some of] its load, nothing of it will be carried, even if he should be a close relative. You can only warn those who fear their Lord unseen and have established prayer. And whoever purifies himself only purifies himself for [the benefit of] his soul. And to Allah is the [final] destination.

data.name: Quran3679
data.value: Not equal are the blind and the seeing,

data.name: Quran3680
data.value: Nor are the darknesses and the light,

data.name: Quran3681
data.value: Nor are the shade and the heat,

data.name: Quran3682
data.value: And not equal are the living and the dead. Indeed, Allah causes to hear whom He wills, but you cannot make hear those in the graves.

data.name: Quran3683
data.value: You, [O Muhammad], are not but a warner.

data.name: Quran3684
data.value: Indeed, We have sent you with the truth as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. And there was no nation but that there had passed within it a warner.

data.name: Quran3685
data.value: And if they deny you - then already have those before them denied. Their messengers came to them with clear proofs and written ordinances and with the enlightening Scripture.

data.name: Quran3686
data.value: Then I seized the ones who disbelieved, and how [terrible] was My reproach.

data.name: Quran3687
data.value: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky, and We produce thereby fruits of varying colors? And in the mountains are tracts, white and red of varying shades and [some] extremely black.

data.name: Quran3688
data.value: And among people and moving creatures and grazing livestock are various colors similarly. Only those fear Allah, from among His servants, who have knowledge. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Forgiving.

data.name: Quran3689
data.value: Indeed, those who recite the Book of Allah and establish prayer and spend [in His cause] out of what We have provided them, secretly and publicly, [can] expect a profit that will never perish -

data.name: Quran3690
data.value: That He may give them in full their rewards and increase for them of His bounty. Indeed, He is Forgiving and Appreciative.

data.name: Quran3691
data.value: And that which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], of the Book is the truth, confirming what was before it. Indeed, Allah, of His servants, is Acquainted and Seeing.

data.name: Quran3692
data.value: Then we caused to inherit the Book those We have chosen of Our servants; and among them is he who wrongs himself, and among them is he who is moderate, and among them is he who is foremost in good deeds by permission of Allah. That [inheritance] is what is the great bounty.

data.name: Quran3693
data.value: [For them are] gardens of perpetual residence which they will enter. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearls, and their garments therein will be silk.

data.name: Quran3694
data.value: And they will say, "Praise to Allah, who has removed from us [all] sorrow. Indeed, our Lord is Forgiving and Appreciative -

data.name: Quran3695
data.value: He who has settled us in the home of duration out of His bounty. There touches us not in it any fatigue, and there touches us not in it weariness [of mind]."

data.name: Quran3696
data.value: And for those who disbelieve will be the fire of Hell. [Death] is not decreed for them so they may die, nor will its torment be lightened for them. Thus do we recompense every ungrateful one.

data.name: Quran3697
data.value: And they will cry out therein, "Our Lord, remove us; we will do righteousness - other than what we were doing!" But did We not grant you life enough for whoever would remember therein to remember, and the warner had come to you? So taste [the punishment], for there is not for the wrongdoers any helper.

data.name: Quran3698
data.value: Indeed, Allah is Knower of the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and earth. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

data.name: Quran3699
data.value: It is He who has made you successors upon the earth. And whoever disbelieves - upon him will be [the consequence of] his disbelief. And the disbelief of the disbelievers does not increase them in the sight of their Lord except in hatred; and the disbelief of the disbelievers does not increase them except in loss.

data.name: Quran3700
data.value: Say, "Have you considered your 'partners' whom you invoke besides Allah? Show me what they have created from the earth, or have they partnership [with Him] in the heavens? Or have We given them a book so they are [standing] on evidence therefrom? [No], rather, the wrongdoers do not promise each other except delusion."

data.name: Quran3701
data.value: Indeed, Allah holds the heavens and the earth, lest they cease. And if they should cease, no one could hold them [in place] after Him. Indeed, He is Forbearing and Forgiving.

data.name: Quran3702
data.value: And they swore by Allah their strongest oaths that if a warner came to them, they would be more guided than [any] one of the [previous] nations. But when a warner came to them, it did not increase them except in aversion.

data.name: Quran3703
data.value: [Due to] arrogance in the land and plotting of evil; but the evil plot does not encompass except its own people. Then do they await except the way of the former peoples? But you will never find in the way of Allah any change, and you will never find in the way of Allah any alteration.

data.name: Quran3704
data.value: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? And they were greater than them in power. But Allah is not to be caused failure by anything in the heavens or on the earth. Indeed, He is ever Knowing and Competent.

data.name: Quran3705
data.value: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for what they have earned, He would not leave upon the earth any creature. But He defers them for a specified term. And when their time comes, then indeed Allah has ever been, of His servants, Seeing.

data.name: Quran3706
data.value: Ya, Seen.

data.name: Quran3707
data.value: By the wise Qur'an.

data.name: Quran3708
data.value: Indeed you, [O Muhammad], are from among the messengers,

data.name: Quran3709
data.value: On a straight path.

data.name: Quran3710
data.value: [This is] a revelation of the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,

data.name: Quran3711
data.value: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware.

data.name: Quran3712
data.value: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe.

data.name: Quran3713
data.value: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads [kept] aloft.

data.name: Quran3714
data.value: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see.

data.name: Quran3715
data.value: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.

data.name: Quran3716
data.value: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Merciful unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and noble reward.

data.name: Quran3717
data.value: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and what they left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register.

data.name: Quran3718
data.value: And present to them an example: the people of the city, when the messengers came to it -

data.name: Quran3719
data.value: When We sent to them two but they denied them, so We strengthened them with a third, and they said, "Indeed, we are messengers to you."

data.name: Quran3720
data.value: They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies."

data.name: Quran3721
data.value: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you,

data.name: Quran3722
data.value: And we are not responsible except for clear notification."

data.name: Quran3723
data.value: They said, "Indeed, we consider you a bad omen. If you do not desist, we will surely stone you, and there will surely touch you, from us, a painful punishment."

data.name: Quran3724
data.value: They said, "Your omen is with yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? Rather, you are a transgressing people."

data.name: Quran3725
data.value: And there came from the farthest end of the city a man, running. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers.

data.name: Quran3726
data.value: Follow those who do not ask of you [any] payment, and they are [rightly] guided.

data.name: Quran3727
data.value: And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned?

data.name: Quran3728
data.value: Should I take other than Him [false] deities [while], if the Most Merciful intends for me some adversity, their intercession will not avail me at all, nor can they save me?

data.name: Quran3729
data.value: Indeed, I would then be in manifest error.

data.name: Quran3730
data.value: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me."

data.name: Quran3731
data.value: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know

data.name: Quran3732
data.value: Of how my Lord has forgiven me and placed me among the honored."

data.name: Quran3733
data.value: And We did not send down upon his people after him any soldiers from the heaven, nor would We have done so.

data.name: Quran3734
data.value: It was not but one shout, and immediately they were extinguished.

data.name: Quran3735
data.value: How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him.

data.name: Quran3736
data.value: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them - that they to them will not return?

data.name: Quran3737
data.value: And indeed, all of them will yet be brought present before Us.

data.name: Quran3738
data.value: And a sign for them is the dead earth. We have brought it to life and brought forth from it grain, and from it they eat.

data.name: Quran3739
data.value: And We placed therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines and caused to burst forth therefrom some springs -

data.name: Quran3740
data.value: That they may eat of His fruit. And their hands have not produced it, so will they not be grateful?

data.name: Quran3741
data.value: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows and from themselves and from that which they do not know.

data.name: Quran3742
data.value: And a sign for them is the night. We remove from it [the light of] day, so they are [left] in darkness.

data.name: Quran3743
data.value: And the sun runs [on course] toward its stopping point. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.

data.name: Quran3744
data.value: And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns [appearing] like the old date stalk.

data.name: Quran3745
data.value: It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each, in an orbit, is swimming.

data.name: Quran3746
data.value: And a sign for them is that We carried their forefathers in a laden ship.

data.name: Quran3747
data.value: And We created for them from the likes of it that which they ride.

data.name: Quran3748
data.value: And if We should will, We could drown them; then no one responding to a cry would there be for them, nor would they be saved

data.name: Quran3749
data.value: Except as a mercy from Us and provision for a time.

data.name: Quran3750
data.value: But when it is said to them, "Beware of what is before you and what is behind you; perhaps you will receive mercy... "

data.name: Quran3751
data.value: And no sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord except that they are from it turning away.

data.name: Quran3752
data.value: And when it is said to them, "Spend from that which Allah has provided for you," those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Should we feed one whom, if Allah had willed, He would have fed? You are not but in clear error."

data.name: Quran3753
data.value: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

data.name: Quran3754
data.value: They do not await except one blast which will seize them while they are disputing.

data.name: Quran3755
data.value: And they will not be able [to give] any instruction, nor to their people can they return.

data.name: Quran3756
data.value: And the Horn will be blown; and at once from the graves to their Lord they will hasten.

data.name: Quran3757
data.value: They will say, "O woe to us! Who has raised us up from our sleeping place?" [The reply will be], "This is what the Most Merciful had promised, and the messengers told the truth."

data.name: Quran3758
data.value: It will not be but one blast, and at once they are all brought present before Us.

data.name: Quran3759
data.value: So today no soul will be wronged at all, and you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do.

data.name: Quran3760
data.value: Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in [joyful] occupation -

data.name: Quran3761
data.value: They and their spouses - in shade, reclining on adorned couches.

data.name: Quran3762
data.value: For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request [or wish]

data.name: Quran3763
data.value: [And] "Peace," a word from a Merciful Lord.

data.name: Quran3764
data.value: [Then He will say], "But stand apart today, you criminals.

data.name: Quran3765
data.value: Did I not enjoin upon you, O children of Adam, that you not worship Satan - [for] indeed, he is to you a clear enemy -

data.name: Quran3766
data.value: And that you worship [only] Me? This is a straight path.

data.name: Quran3767
data.value: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason?

data.name: Quran3768
data.value: This is the Hellfire which you were promised.

data.name: Quran3769
data.value: [Enter to] burn therein today for what you used to deny."

data.name: Quran3770
data.value: That Day, We will seal over their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify about what they used to earn.

data.name: Quran3771
data.value: And if We willed, We could have obliterated their eyes, and they would race to [find] the path, and how could they see?

data.name: Quran3772
data.value: And if We willed, We could have deformed them, [paralyzing them] in their places so they would not be able to proceed, nor could they return.

data.name: Quran3773
data.value: And he to whom We grant long life We reverse in creation; so will they not understand?

data.name: Quran3774
data.value: And We did not give Prophet Muhammad, knowledge of poetry, nor is it befitting for him. It is not but a message and a clear Qur'an

data.name: Quran3775
data.value: To warn whoever is alive and justify the word against the disbelievers.

data.name: Quran3776
data.value: Do they not see that We have created for them from what Our hands have made, grazing livestock, and [then] they are their owners?

data.name: Quran3777
data.value: And We have tamed them for them, so some of them they ride, and some of them they eat.

data.name: Quran3778
data.value: And for them therein are [other] benefits and drinks, so will they not be grateful?

data.name: Quran3779
data.value: But they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that perhaps they would be helped.

data.name: Quran3780
data.value: They are not able to help them, and they [themselves] are for them soldiers in attendance.

data.name: Quran3781
data.value: So let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, We know what they conceal and what they declare.

data.name: Quran3782
data.value: Does man not consider that We created him from a [mere] sperm-drop - then at once he is a clear adversary?

data.name: Quran3783
data.value: And he presents for Us an example and forgets his [own] creation. He says, "Who will give life to bones while they are disintegrated?"

data.name: Quran3784
data.value: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time; and He is, of all creation, Knowing."

data.name: Quran3785
data.value: [It is] He who made for you from the green tree, fire, and then from it you ignite.

data.name: Quran3786
data.value: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the likes of them? Yes, [it is so]; and He is the Knowing Creator.

data.name: Quran3787
data.value: His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, "Be," and it is.

data.name: Quran3788
data.value: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things, and to Him you will be returned.

data.name: Quran3789
data.value: By those [angels] lined up in rows

data.name: Quran3790
data.value: And those who drive [the clouds]

data.name: Quran3791
data.value: And those who recite the message,

data.name: Quran3792
data.value: Indeed, your God is One,

data.name: Quran3793
data.value: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises.

data.name: Quran3794
data.value: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars

data.name: Quran3795
data.value: And as protection against every rebellious devil

data.name: Quran3796
data.value: [So] they may not listen to the exalted assembly [of angels] and are pelted from every side,

data.name: Quran3797
data.value: Repelled; and for them is a constant punishment,

data.name: Quran3798
data.value: Except one who snatches [some words] by theft, but they are pursued by a burning flame, piercing [in brightness].

data.name: Quran3799
data.value: Then inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?" Indeed, We created men from sticky clay.

data.name: Quran3800
data.value: But you wonder, while they mock,

data.name: Quran3801
data.value: And when they are reminded, they remember not.

data.name: Quran3802
data.value: And when they see a sign, they ridicule

data.name: Quran3803
data.value: And say, "This is not but obvious magic.

data.name: Quran3804
data.value: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?

data.name: Quran3805
data.value: And our forefathers [as well]?"

data.name: Quran3806
data.value: Say, "Yes, and you will be [rendered] contemptible."

data.name: Quran3807
data.value: It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing.

data.name: Quran3808
data.value: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense."

data.name: Quran3809
data.value: [They will be told], "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny."

data.name: Quran3810
data.value: [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship

data.name: Quran3811
data.value: Other than Allah, and guide them to the path of Hellfire

data.name: Quran3812
data.value: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned."

data.name: Quran3813
data.value: [They will be asked], "What is [wrong] with you? Why do you not help each other?"

data.name: Quran3814
data.value: But they, that Day, are in surrender.

data.name: Quran3815
data.value: And they will approach one another blaming each other.

data.name: Quran3816
data.value: They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right."

data.name: Quran3817
data.value: The oppressors will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers,

data.name: Quran3818
data.value: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people.

data.name: Quran3819
data.value: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment].

data.name: Quran3820
data.value: And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators."

data.name: Quran3821
data.value: So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment.

data.name: Quran3822
data.value: Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals.

data.name: Quran3823
data.value: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant

data.name: Quran3824
data.value: And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet?"

data.name: Quran3825
data.value: Rather, the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.

data.name: Quran3826
data.value: Indeed, you [disbelievers] will be tasters of the painful punishment,

data.name: Quran3827
data.value: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do -

data.name: Quran3828
data.value: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

data.name: Quran3829
data.value: Those will have a provision determined -

data.name: Quran3830
data.value: Fruits; and they will be honored

data.name: Quran3831
data.value: In gardens of pleasure

data.name: Quran3832
data.value: On thrones facing one another.

data.name: Quran3833
data.value: There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring,

data.name: Quran3834
data.value: White and delicious to the drinkers;

data.name: Quran3835
data.value: No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated.

data.name: Quran3836
data.value: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances, with large, [beautiful] eyes,

data.name: Quran3837
data.value: As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected.

data.name: Quran3838
data.value: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

data.name: Quran3839
data.value: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth]

data.name: Quran3840
data.value: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe

data.name: Quran3841
data.value: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed?'"

data.name: Quran3842
data.value: He will say, "Would you [care to] look?"

data.name: Quran3843
data.value: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.

data.name: Quran3844
data.value: He will say, "By Allah, you almost ruined me.

data.name: Quran3845
data.value: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].

data.name: Quran3846
data.value: Then, are we not to die

data.name: Quran3847
data.value: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished?"

data.name: Quran3848
data.value: Indeed, this is the great attainment.

data.name: Quran3849
data.value: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.

data.name: Quran3850
data.value: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum?

data.name: Quran3851
data.value: Indeed, We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers.

data.name: Quran3852
data.value: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,

data.name: Quran3853
data.value: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.

data.name: Quran3854
data.value: And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.

data.name: Quran3855
data.value: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.

data.name: Quran3856
data.value: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire.

data.name: Quran3857
data.value: Indeed they found their fathers astray.

data.name: Quran3858
data.value: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.

data.name: Quran3859
data.value: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,

data.name: Quran3860
data.value: And We had already sent among them warners.

data.name: Quran3861
data.value: Then look how was the end of those who were warned -

data.name: Quran3862
data.value: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

data.name: Quran3863
data.value: And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders.

data.name: Quran3864
data.value: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction.

data.name: Quran3865
data.value: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]

data.name: Quran3866
data.value: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

data.name: Quran3867
data.value: "Peace upon Noah among the worlds."

data.name: Quran3868
data.value: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

data.name: Quran3869
data.value: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

data.name: Quran3870
data.value: Then We drowned the disbelievers.

data.name: Quran3871
data.value: And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,

data.name: Quran3872
data.value: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart

data.name: Quran3873
data.value: [And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?

data.name: Quran3874
data.value: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than Allah you desire?

data.name: Quran3875
data.value: Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds?"

data.name: Quran3876
data.value: And he cast a look at the stars

data.name: Quran3877
data.value: And said, "Indeed, I am [about to be] ill."

data.name: Quran3878
data.value: So they turned away from him, departing.

data.name: Quran3879
data.value: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?

data.name: Quran3880
data.value: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?"

data.name: Quran3881
data.value: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.

data.name: Quran3882
data.value: Then the people came toward him, hastening.

data.name: Quran3883
data.value: He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,

data.name: Quran3884
data.value: While Allah created you and that which you do?"

data.name: Quran3885
data.value: They said, "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire."

data.name: Quran3886
data.value: And they intended for him a plan, but We made them the most debased.

data.name: Quran3887
data.value: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.

data.name: Quran3888
data.value: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous."

data.name: Quran3889
data.value: So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy.

data.name: Quran3890
data.value: And when he reached with him [the age of] exertion, he said, "O my son, indeed I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "O my father, do as you are commanded. You will find me, if Allah wills, of the steadfast."

data.name: Quran3891
data.value: And when they had both submitted and he put him down upon his forehead,

data.name: Quran3892
data.value: We called to him, "O Abraham,

data.name: Quran3893
data.value: You have fulfilled the vision." Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

data.name: Quran3894
data.value: Indeed, this was the clear trial.

data.name: Quran3895
data.value: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,

data.name: Quran3896
data.value: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

data.name: Quran3897
data.value: "Peace upon Abraham."

data.name: Quran3898
data.value: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

data.name: Quran3899
data.value: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

data.name: Quran3900
data.value: And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous.

data.name: Quran3901
data.value: And We blessed him and Isaac. But among their descendants is the doer of good and the clearly unjust to himself.

data.name: Quran3902
data.value: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.

data.name: Quran3903
data.value: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,

data.name: Quran3904
data.value: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.

data.name: Quran3905
data.value: And We gave them the explicit Scripture,

data.name: Quran3906
data.value: And We guided them on the straight path.

data.name: Quran3907
data.value: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:

data.name: Quran3908
data.value: "Peace upon Moses and Aaron."

data.name: Quran3909
data.value: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

data.name: Quran3910
data.value: Indeed, they were of Our believing servants.

data.name: Quran3911
data.value: And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,

data.name: Quran3912
data.value: When he said to his people, "Will you not fear Allah?

data.name: Quran3913
data.value: Do you call upon Ba'l and leave the best of creators -

data.name: Quran3914
data.value: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers?"

data.name: Quran3915
data.value: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment],

data.name: Quran3916
data.value: Except the chosen servants of Allah.

data.name: Quran3917
data.value: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

data.name: Quran3918
data.value: "Peace upon Elias."

data.name: Quran3919
data.value: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

data.name: Quran3920
data.value: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

data.name: Quran3921
data.value: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.

data.name: Quran3922
data.value: [So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,

data.name: Quran3923
data.value: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].

data.name: Quran3924
data.value: Then We destroyed the others.

data.name: Quran3925
data.value: And indeed, you pass by them in the morning

data.name: Quran3926
data.value: And at night. Then will you not use reason?

data.name: Quran3927
data.value: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers.

data.name: Quran3928
data.value: [Mention] when he ran away to the laden ship.

data.name: Quran3929
data.value: And he drew lots and was among the losers.

data.name: Quran3930
data.value: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.

data.name: Quran3931
data.value: And had he not been of those who exalt Allah,

data.name: Quran3932
data.value: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.

data.name: Quran3933
data.value: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.

data.name: Quran3934
data.value: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.

data.name: Quran3935
data.value: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.

data.name: Quran3936
data.value: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.

data.name: Quran3937
data.value: So inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?

data.name: Quran3938
data.value: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?"

data.name: Quran3939
data.value: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,

data.name: Quran3940
data.value: " Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.

data.name: Quran3941
data.value: Has He chosen daughters over sons?

data.name: Quran3942
data.value: What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?

data.name: Quran3943
data.value: Then will you not be reminded?

data.name: Quran3944
data.value: Or do you have a clear authority?

data.name: Quran3945
data.value: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.

data.name: Quran3946
data.value: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].

data.name: Quran3947
data.value: Exalted is Allah above what they describe,

data.name: Quran3948
data.value: Except the chosen servants of Allah [who do not share in that sin].

data.name: Quran3949
data.value: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,

data.name: Quran3950
data.value: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him

data.name: Quran3951
data.value: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.

data.name: Quran3952
data.value: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.

data.name: Quran3953
data.value: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].

data.name: Quran3954
data.value: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah."

data.name: Quran3955
data.value: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say,

data.name: Quran3956
data.value: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,

data.name: Quran3957
data.value: We would have been the chosen servants of Allah."

data.name: Quran3958
data.value: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know.

data.name: Quran3959
data.value: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,

data.name: Quran3960
data.value: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory

data.name: Quran3961
data.value: And [that] indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome.

data.name: Quran3962
data.value: So, [O Muhammad], leave them for a time.

data.name: Quran3963
data.value: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.

data.name: Quran3964
data.value: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?

data.name: Quran3965
data.value: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.

data.name: Quran3966
data.value: And leave them for a time.

data.name: Quran3967
data.value: And see, for they are going to see.

data.name: Quran3968
data.value: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.

data.name: Quran3969
data.value: And peace upon the messengers.

data.name: Quran3970
data.value: And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran3971
data.value: Sad. By the Qur'an containing reminder...

data.name: Quran3972
data.value: But those who disbelieve are in pride and dissension.

data.name: Quran3973
data.value: How many a generation have We destroyed before them, and they [then] called out; but it was not a time for escape.

data.name: Quran3974
data.value: And they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, "This is a magician and a liar.

data.name: Quran3975
data.value: Has he made the gods [only] one God? Indeed, this is a curious thing."

data.name: Quran3976
data.value: And the eminent among them went forth, [saying], "Continue, and be patient over [the defense of] your gods. Indeed, this is a thing intended.

data.name: Quran3977
data.value: We have not heard of this in the latest religion. This is not but a fabrication.

data.name: Quran3978
data.value: Has the message been revealed to him out of [all of] us?" Rather, they are in doubt about My message. Rather, they have not yet tasted My punishment.

data.name: Quran3979
data.value: Or do they have the depositories of the mercy of your Lord, the Exalted in Might, the Bestower?

data.name: Quran3980
data.value: Or is theirs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend through [any] ways of access.

data.name: Quran3981
data.value: [They are but] soldiers [who will be] defeated there among the companies [of disbelievers].

data.name: Quran3982
data.value: The people of Noah denied before them, and [the tribe of] 'Aad and Pharaoh, the owner of stakes,

data.name: Quran3983
data.value: And [the tribe of] Thamud and the people of Lot and the companions of the thicket. Those are the companies.

data.name: Quran3984
data.value: Each of them denied the messengers, so My penalty was justified.

data.name: Quran3985
data.value: And these [disbelievers] await not but one blast [of the Horn]; for it there will be no delay.

data.name: Quran3986
data.value: And they say, "Our Lord, hasten for us our share [of the punishment] before the Day of Account"

data.name: Quran3987
data.value: Be patient over what they say and remember Our servant, David, the possessor of strength; indeed, he was one who repeatedly turned back [to Allah].

data.name: Quran3988
data.value: Indeed, We subjected the mountains [to praise] with him, exalting [Allah] in the [late] afternoon and [after] sunrise.

data.name: Quran3989
data.value: And the birds were assembled, all with him repeating [praises].

data.name: Quran3990
data.value: And We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and discernment in speech.

data.name: Quran3991
data.value: And has there come to you the news of the adversaries, when they climbed over the wall of [his] prayer chamber -

data.name: Quran3992
data.value: When they entered upon David and he was alarmed by them? They said, "Fear not. [We are] two adversaries, one of whom has wronged the other, so judge between us with truth and do not exceed [it] and guide us to the sound path.

data.name: Quran3993
data.value: Indeed this, my brother, has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe; so he said, 'Entrust her to me,' and he overpowered me in speech."

data.name: Quran3994
data.value: [David] said, "He has certainly wronged you in demanding your ewe [in addition] to his ewes. And indeed, many associates oppress one another, except for those who believe and do righteous deeds - and few are they." And David became certain that We had tried him, and he asked forgiveness of his Lord and fell down bowing [in prostration] and turned in repentance [to Allah].

data.name: Quran3995
data.value: So We forgave him that; and indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.

data.name: Quran3996
data.value: [We said], "O David, indeed We have made you a successor upon the earth, so judge between the people in truth and do not follow [your own] desire, as it will lead you astray from the way of Allah." Indeed, those who go astray from the way of Allah will have a severe punishment for having forgotten the Day of Account.

data.name: Quran3997
data.value: And We did not create the heaven and the earth and that between them aimlessly. That is the assumption of those who disbelieve, so woe to those who disbelieve from the Fire.

data.name: Quran3998
data.value: Or should we treat those who believe and do righteous deeds like corrupters in the land? Or should We treat those who fear Allah like the wicked?

data.name: Quran3999
data.value: [This is] a blessed Book which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], that they might reflect upon its verses and that those of understanding would be reminded.

data.name: Quran4000
data.value: And to David We gave Solomon. An excellent servant, indeed he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah].

data.name: Quran4001
data.value: [Mention] when there were exhibited before him in the afternoon the poised [standing] racehorses.

data.name: Quran4002
data.value: And he said, "Indeed, I gave preference to the love of good [things] over the remembrance of my Lord until the sun disappeared into the curtain [of darkness]."

data.name: Quran4003
data.value: [He said], "Return them to me," and set about striking [their] legs and necks.

data.name: Quran4004
data.value: And We certainly tried Solomon and placed on his throne a body; then he returned.

data.name: Quran4005
data.value: He said, "My Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom such as will not belong to anyone after me. Indeed, You are the Bestower."

data.name: Quran4006
data.value: So We subjected to him the wind blowing by his command, gently, wherever he directed,

data.name: Quran4007
data.value: And [also] the devils [of jinn] - every builder and diver

data.name: Quran4008
data.value: And others bound together in shackles.

data.name: Quran4009
data.value: [We said], "This is Our gift, so grant or withhold without account."

data.name: Quran4010
data.value: And indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.

data.name: Quran4011
data.value: And remember Our servant Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, Satan has touched me with hardship and torment."

data.name: Quran4012
data.value: [So he was told], "Strike [the ground] with your foot; this is a [spring for] a cool bath and drink."

data.name: Quran4013
data.value: And We granted him his family and a like [number] with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for those of understanding.

data.name: Quran4014
data.value: [We said], "And take in your hand a bunch [of grass] and strike with it and do not break your oath." Indeed, We found him patient, an excellent servant. Indeed, he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah].

data.name: Quran4015
data.value: And remember Our servants, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob - those of strength and [religious] vision.

data.name: Quran4016
data.value: Indeed, We chose them for an exclusive quality: remembrance of the home [of the Hereafter].

data.name: Quran4017
data.value: And indeed they are, to Us, among the chosen and outstanding.

data.name: Quran4018
data.value: And remember Ishmael, Elisha and Dhul-Kifl, and all are among the outstanding.

data.name: Quran4019
data.value: This is a reminder. And indeed, for the righteous is a good place of return

data.name: Quran4020
data.value: Gardens of perpetual residence, whose doors will be opened to them.

data.name: Quran4021
data.value: Reclining within them, they will call therein for abundant fruit and drink.

data.name: Quran4022
data.value: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances and of equal age.

data.name: Quran4023
data.value: This is what you, [the righteous], are promised for the Day of Account.

data.name: Quran4024
data.value: Indeed, this is Our provision; for it there is no depletion.

data.name: Quran4025
data.value: This [is so]. But indeed, for the transgressors is an evil place of return -

data.name: Quran4026
data.value: Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the resting place.

data.name: Quran4027
data.value: This - so let them taste it - is scalding water and [foul] purulence.

data.name: Quran4028
data.value: And other [punishments] of its type [in various] kinds.

data.name: Quran4029
data.value: [Its inhabitants will say], "This is a company bursting in with you. No welcome for them. Indeed, they will burn in the Fire."

data.name: Quran4030
data.value: They will say, "Nor you! No welcome for you. You, [our leaders], brought this upon us, and wretched is the settlement."

data.name: Quran4031
data.value: They will say, "Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us - increase for him double punishment in the Fire."

data.name: Quran4032
data.value: And they will say, "Why do we not see men whom we used to count among the worst?

data.name: Quran4033
data.value: Is it [because] we took them in ridicule, or has [our] vision turned away from them?"

data.name: Quran4034
data.value: Indeed, that is truth - the quarreling of the people of the Fire.

data.name: Quran4035
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "I am only a warner, and there is not any deity except Allah, the One, the Prevailing.

data.name: Quran4036
data.value: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver."

data.name: Quran4037
data.value: Say, "It is great news

data.name: Quran4038
data.value: From which you turn away.

data.name: Quran4039
data.value: I had no knowledge of the exalted assembly [of angels] when they were disputing [the creation of Adam].

data.name: Quran4040
data.value: It has not been revealed to me except that I am a clear warner."

data.name: Quran4041
data.value: [So mention] when your Lord said to the angels, "Indeed, I am going to create a human being from clay.

data.name: Quran4042
data.value: So when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."

data.name: Quran4043
data.value: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely.

data.name: Quran4044
data.value: Except Iblees; he was arrogant and became among the disbelievers.

data.name: Quran4045
data.value: [Allah] said, "O Iblees, what prevented you from prostrating to that which I created with My hands? Were you arrogant [then], or were you [already] among the haughty?"

data.name: Quran4046
data.value: He said, "I am better than him. You created me from fire and created him from clay."

data.name: Quran4047
data.value: [Allah] said, "Then get out of Paradise, for indeed, you are expelled.

data.name: Quran4048
data.value: And indeed, upon you is My curse until the Day of Recompense."

data.name: Quran4049
data.value: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."

data.name: Quran4050
data.value: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved

data.name: Quran4051
data.value: Until the Day of the time well-known."

data.name: Quran4052
data.value: [Iblees] said, "By your might, I will surely mislead them all

data.name: Quran4053
data.value: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."

data.name: Quran4054
data.value: [Allah] said, "The truth [is My oath], and the truth I say -

data.name: Quran4055
data.value: [That] I will surely fill Hell with you and those of them that follow you all together."

data.name: Quran4056
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "I do not ask you for the Qur'an any payment, and I am not of the pretentious

data.name: Quran4057
data.value: It is but a reminder to the worlds.

data.name: Quran4058
data.value: And you will surely know [the truth of] its information after a time."

data.name: Quran4059
data.value: The revelation of the Qur'an is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran4060
data.value: Indeed, We have sent down to you the Book, [O Muhammad], in truth. So worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion.

data.name: Quran4061
data.value: Unquestionably, for Allah is the pure religion. And those who take protectors besides Him [say], "We only worship them that they may bring us nearer to Allah in position." Indeed, Allah will judge between them concerning that over which they differ. Indeed, Allah does not guide he who is a liar and [confirmed] disbeliever.

data.name: Quran4062
data.value: If Allah had intended to take a son, He could have chosen from what He creates whatever He willed. Exalted is He; He is Allah, the One, the Prevailing.

data.name: Quran4063
data.value: He created the heavens and earth in truth. He wraps the night over the day and wraps the day over the night and has subjected the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term. Unquestionably, He is the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver.

data.name: Quran4064
data.value: He created you from one soul. Then He made from it its mate, and He produced for you from the grazing livestock eight mates. He creates you in the wombs of your mothers, creation after creation, within three darknesses. That is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs dominion. There is no deity except Him, so how are you averted?

data.name: Quran4065
data.value: If you disbelieve - indeed, Allah is Free from need of you. And He does not approve for His servants disbelief. And if you are grateful, He approves it for you; and no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. Then to your Lord is your return, and He will inform you about what you used to do. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

data.name: Quran4066
data.value: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon his Lord, turning to Him [alone]; then when He bestows on him a favor from Himself, he forgets Him whom he called upon before, and he attributes to Allah equals to mislead [people] from His way. Say, "Enjoy your disbelief for a little; indeed, you are of the companions of the Fire."

data.name: Quran4067
data.value: Is one who is devoutly obedient during periods of the night, prostrating and standing [in prayer], fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, [like one who does not]? Say, "Are those who know equal to those who do not know?" Only they will remember [who are] people of understanding.

data.name: Quran4068
data.value: Say, "O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord. For those who do good in this world is good, and the earth of Allah is spacious. Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account."

data.name: Quran4069
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been commanded to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion.

data.name: Quran4070
data.value: And I have been commanded to be the first [among you] of the Muslims."

data.name: Quran4071
data.value: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."

data.name: Quran4072
data.value: Say, "Allah [alone] do I worship, sincere to Him in my religion,

data.name: Quran4073
data.value: So worship what you will besides Him." Say, "Indeed, the losers are the ones who will lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, that is the manifest loss."

data.name: Quran4074
data.value: They will have canopies of fire above them and below them, canopies. By that Allah threatens His servants. O My servants, then fear Me.

data.name: Quran4075
data.value: But those who have avoided Taghut, lest they worship it, and turned back to Allah - for them are good tidings. So give good tidings to My servants

data.name: Quran4076
data.value: Who listen to speech and follow the best of it. Those are the ones Allah has guided, and those are people of understanding.

data.name: Quran4077
data.value: Then, is one who has deserved the decree of punishment [to be guided]? Then, can you save one who is in the Fire?

data.name: Quran4078
data.value: But those who have feared their Lord - for them are chambers, above them chambers built high, beneath which rivers flow. [This is] the promise of Allah. Allah does not fail in [His] promise.

data.name: Quran4079
data.value: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky and makes it flow as springs [and rivers] in the earth; then He produces thereby crops of varying colors; then they dry and you see them turned yellow; then He makes them [scattered] debris. Indeed in that is a reminder for those of understanding.

data.name: Quran4080
data.value: So is one whose breast Allah has expanded to [accept] Islam and he is upon a light from his Lord [like one whose heart rejects it]? Then woe to those whose hearts are hardened against the remembrance of Allah. Those are in manifest error.

data.name: Quran4081
data.value: Allah has sent down the best statement: a consistent Book wherein is reiteration. The skins shiver therefrom of those who fear their Lord; then their skins and their hearts relax at the remembrance of Allah. That is the guidance of Allah by which He guides whom He wills. And one whom Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide.

data.name: Quran4082
data.value: Then is he who will shield with his face the worst of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection [like one secure from it]? And it will be said to the wrongdoers, "Taste what you used to earn."

data.name: Quran4083
data.value: Those before them denied, and punishment came upon them from where they did not perceive.

data.name: Quran4084
data.value: So Allah made them taste disgrace in worldly life. But the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.

data.name: Quran4085
data.value: And We have certainly presented for the people in this Qur'an from every [kind of] example - that they might remember.

data.name: Quran4086
data.value: [It is] an Arabic Qur'an, without any deviance that they might become righteous.

data.name: Quran4087
data.value: Allah presents an example: a slave owned by quarreling partners and another belonging exclusively to one man - are they equal in comparison? Praise be to Allah! But most of them do not know.

data.name: Quran4088
data.value: Indeed, you are to die, and indeed, they are to die.

data.name: Quran4089
data.value: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, before your Lord, will dispute.

data.name: Quran4090
data.value: So who is more unjust than one who lies about Allah and denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell a residence for the disbelievers?

data.name: Quran4091
data.value: And the one who has brought the truth and [they who] believed in it - those are the righteous.

data.name: Quran4092
data.value: They will have whatever they desire with their Lord. That is the reward of the doers of good -

data.name: Quran4093
data.value: That Allah may remove from them the worst of what they did and reward them their due for the best of what they used to do.

data.name: Quran4094
data.value: Is not Allah sufficient for His Servant [Prophet Muhammad]? And [yet], they threaten you with those [they worship] other than Him. And whoever Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide.

data.name: Quran4095
data.value: And whoever Allah guides - for him there is no misleader. Is not Allah Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution?

data.name: Quran4096
data.value: And if you asked them, "Who created the heavens and the earth?" they would surely say, "Allah." Say, "Then have you considered what you invoke besides Allah? If Allah intended me harm, are they removers of His harm; or if He intended me mercy, are they withholders of His mercy?" Say, "Sufficient for me is Allah; upon Him [alone] rely the [wise] reliers."

data.name: Quran4097
data.value: Say, "O my people, work according to your position, [for] indeed, I am working; and you are going to know

data.name: Quran4098
data.value: To whom will come a torment disgracing him and on whom will descend an enduring punishment."

data.name: Quran4099
data.value: Indeed, We sent down to you the Book for the people in truth. So whoever is guided - it is for [the benefit of] his soul; and whoever goes astray only goes astray to its detriment. And you are not a manager over them.

data.name: Quran4100
data.value: Allah takes the souls at the time of their death, and those that do not die [He takes] during their sleep. Then He keeps those for which He has decreed death and releases the others for a specified term. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.

data.name: Quran4101
data.value: Or have they taken other than Allah as intercessors? Say, "Even though they do not possess [power over] anything, nor do they reason?"

data.name: Quran4102
data.value: Say, "To Allah belongs [the right to allow] intercession entirely. To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. Then to Him you will be returned."

data.name: Quran4103
data.value: And when Allah is mentioned alone, the hearts of those who do not believe in the Hereafter shrink with aversion, but when those [worshipped] other than Him are mentioned, immediately they rejoice.

data.name: Quran4104
data.value: Say, "O Allah, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, You will judge between your servants concerning that over which they used to differ."

data.name: Quran4105
