data.value: And if those who did wrong had all that is in the earth entirely and the like of it with it, they would [attempt to] ransom themselves thereby from the worst of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection. And there will appear to them from Allah that which they had not taken into account.

data.name: Quran4106
data.value: And there will appear to them the evils they had earned, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.

data.name: Quran4107
data.value: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon Us; then when We bestow on him a favor from Us, he says, "I have only been given it because of [my] knowledge." Rather, it is a trial, but most of them do not know.

data.name: Quran4108
data.value: Those before them had already said it, but they were not availed by what they used to earn.

data.name: Quran4109
data.value: And the evil consequences of what they earned struck them. And those who have wronged of these [people] will be afflicted by the evil consequences of what they earned; and they will not cause failure.

data.name: Quran4110
data.value: Do they not know that Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]? Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.

data.name: Quran4111
data.value: Say, "O My servants who have transgressed against themselves [by sinning], do not despair of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful."

data.name: Quran4112
data.value: And return [in repentance] to your Lord and submit to Him before the punishment comes upon you; then you will not be helped.

data.name: Quran4113
data.value: And follow the best of what was revealed to you from your Lord before the punishment comes upon you suddenly while you do not perceive,

data.name: Quran4114
data.value: Lest a soul should say, "Oh [how great is] my regret over what I neglected in regard to Allah and that I was among the mockers."

data.name: Quran4115
data.value: Or [lest] it say, "If only Allah had guided me, I would have been among the righteous."

data.name: Quran4116
data.value: Or [lest] it say when it sees the punishment, "If only I had another turn so I could be among the doers of good."

data.name: Quran4117
data.value: But yes, there had come to you My verses, but you denied them and were arrogant, and you were among the disbelievers.

data.name: Quran4118
data.value: And on the Day of Resurrection you will see those who lied about Allah [with] their faces blackened. Is there not in Hell a residence for the arrogant?

data.name: Quran4119
data.value: And Allah will save those who feared Him by their attainment; no evil will touch them, nor will they grieve.

data.name: Quran4120
data.value: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is, over all things, Disposer of affairs.

data.name: Quran4121
data.value: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. And they who disbelieve in the verses of Allah - it is those who are the losers.

data.name: Quran4122
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "Is it other than Allah that you order me to worship, O ignorant ones?"

data.name: Quran4123
data.value: And it was already revealed to you and to those before you that if you should associate [anything] with Allah, your work would surely become worthless, and you would surely be among the losers."

data.name: Quran4124
data.value: Rather, worship [only] Allah and be among the grateful.

data.name: Quran4125
data.value: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal, while the earth entirely will be [within] His grip on the Day of Resurrection, and the heavens will be folded in His right hand. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.

data.name: Quran4126
data.value: And the Horn will be blown, and whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth will fall dead except whom Allah wills. Then it will be blown again, and at once they will be standing, looking on.

data.name: Quran4127
data.value: And the earth will shine with the light of its Lord, and the record [of deeds] will be placed, and the prophets and the witnesses will be brought, and it will be judged between them in truth, and they will not be wronged.

data.name: Quran4128
data.value: And every soul will be fully compensated [for] what it did; and He is most knowing of what they do.

data.name: Quran4129
data.value: And those who disbelieved will be driven to Hell in groups until, when they reach it, its gates are opened and its keepers will say, "Did there not come to you messengers from yourselves, reciting to you the verses of your Lord and warning you of the meeting of this Day of yours?" They will say, "Yes, but the word of punishment has come into effect upon the disbelievers.

data.name: Quran4130
data.value: [To them] it will be said, "Enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and wretched is the residence of the arrogant."

data.name: Quran4131
data.value: But those who feared their Lord will be driven to Paradise in groups until, when they reach it while its gates have been opened and its keepers say, "Peace be upon you; you have become pure; so enter it to abide eternally therein," [they will enter].

data.name: Quran4132
data.value: And they will say, "Praise to Allah, who has fulfilled for us His promise and made us inherit the earth [so] we may settle in Paradise wherever we will. And excellent is the reward of [righteous] workers."

data.name: Quran4133
data.value: And you will see the angels surrounding the Throne, exalting [Allah] with praise of their Lord. And it will be judged between them in truth, and it will be said, "[All] praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds."

data.name: Quran4134
data.value: Ha, Meem.

data.name: Quran4135
data.value: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.

data.name: Quran4136
data.value: The forgiver of sin, acceptor of repentance, severe in punishment, owner of abundance. There is no deity except Him; to Him is the destination.

data.name: Quran4137
data.value: No one disputes concerning the signs of Allah except those who disbelieve, so be not deceived by their [uninhibited] movement throughout the land.

data.name: Quran4138
data.value: The people of Noah denied before them and the [disbelieving] factions after them, and every nation intended [a plot] for their messenger to seize him, and they disputed by [using] falsehood to [attempt to] invalidate thereby the truth. So I seized them, and how [terrible] was My penalty.

data.name: Quran4139
data.value: And thus has the word of your Lord come into effect upon those who disbelieved that they are companions of the Fire.

data.name: Quran4140
data.value: Those [angels] who carry the Throne and those around it exalt [Allah] with praise of their Lord and believe in Him and ask forgiveness for those who have believed, [saying], "Our Lord, You have encompassed all things in mercy and knowledge, so forgive those who have repented and followed Your way and protect them from the punishment of Hellfire.

data.name: Quran4141
data.value: Our Lord, and admit them to gardens of perpetual residence which You have promised them and whoever was righteous among their fathers, their spouses and their offspring. Indeed, it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran4142
data.value: And protect them from the evil consequences [of their deeds]. And he whom You protect from evil consequences that Day - You will have given him mercy. And that is the great attainment."

data.name: Quran4143
data.value: Indeed, those who disbelieve will be addressed, "The hatred of Allah for you was [even] greater than your hatred of yourselves [this Day in Hell] when you were invited to faith, but you refused."

data.name: Quran4144
data.value: They will say, "Our Lord, You made us lifeless twice and gave us life twice, and we have confessed our sins. So is there to an exit any way?"

data.name: Quran4145
data.value: [They will be told], "That is because, when Allah was called upon alone, you disbelieved; but if others were associated with Him, you believed. So the judgement is with Allah, the Most High, the Grand."

data.name: Quran4146
data.value: It is He who shows you His signs and sends down to you from the sky, provision. But none will remember except he who turns back [in repentance].

data.name: Quran4147
data.value: So invoke Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, although the disbelievers dislike it.

data.name: Quran4148
data.value: [He is] the Exalted above [all] degrees, Owner of the Throne; He places the inspiration of His command upon whom He wills of His servants to warn of the Day of Meeting.

data.name: Quran4149
data.value: The Day they come forth nothing concerning them will be concealed from Allah. To whom belongs [all] sovereignty this Day? To Allah, the One, the Prevailing.

data.name: Quran4150
data.value: This Day every soul will be recompensed for what it earned. No injustice today! Indeed, Allah is swift in account.

data.name: Quran4151
data.value: And warn them, [O Muhammad], of the Approaching Day, when hearts are at the throats, filled [with distress]. For the wrongdoers there will be no devoted friend and no intercessor [who is] obeyed.

data.name: Quran4152
data.value: He knows that which deceives the eyes and what the breasts conceal.

data.name: Quran4153
data.value: And Allah judges with truth, while those they invoke besides Him judge not with anything. Indeed, Allah - He is the Hearing, the Seeing.

data.name: Quran4154
data.value: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those who were before them? They were greater than them in strength and in impression on the land, but Allah seized them for their sins. And they had not from Allah any protector.

data.name: Quran4155
data.value: That was because their messengers were coming to them with clear proofs, but they disbelieved, so Allah seized them. Indeed, He is Powerful and severe in punishment.

data.name: Quran4156
data.value: And We did certainly send Moses with Our signs and a clear authority

data.name: Quran4157
data.value: To Pharaoh, Haman and Qarun; but they said, "[He is] a magician and a liar."

data.name: Quran4158
data.value: And when he brought them the truth from Us, they said, "Kill the sons of those who have believed with him and keep their women alive." But the plan of the disbelievers is not except in error.

data.name: Quran4159
data.value: And Pharaoh said, "Let me kill Moses and let him call upon his Lord. Indeed, I fear that he will change your religion or that he will cause corruption in the land."

data.name: Quran4160
data.value: But Moses said, "Indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant one who does not believe in the Day of Account."

data.name: Quran4161
data.value: And a believing man from the family of Pharaoh who concealed his faith said, "Do you kill a man [merely] because he says, 'My Lord is Allah' while he has brought you clear proofs from your Lord? And if he should be lying, then upon him is [the consequence of] his lie; but if he should be truthful, there will strike you some of what he promises you. Indeed, Allah does not guide one who is a transgressor and a liar.

data.name: Quran4162
data.value: O my people, sovereignty is yours today, [your being] dominant in the land. But who would protect us from the punishment of Allah if it came to us?" Pharaoh said, "I do not show you except what I see, and I do not guide you except to the way of right conduct."

data.name: Quran4163
data.value: And he who believed said, "O my people, indeed I fear for you [a fate] like the day of the companies -

data.name: Quran4164
data.value: Like the custom of the people of Noah and of 'Aad and Thamud and those after them. And Allah wants no injustice for [His] servants.

data.name: Quran4165
data.value: And O my people, indeed I fear for you the Day of Calling -

data.name: Quran4166
data.value: The Day you will turn your backs fleeing; there is not for you from Allah any protector. And whoever Allah leaves astray - there is not for him any guide.

data.name: Quran4167
data.value: And Joseph had already come to you before with clear proofs, but you remained in doubt of that which he brought to you, until when he died, you said, 'Never will Allah send a messenger after him.' Thus does Allah leave astray he who is a transgressor and skeptic."

data.name: Quran4168
data.value: Those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah without an authority having come to them - great is hatred [of them] in the sight of Allah and in the sight of those who have believed. Thus does Allah seal over every heart [belonging to] an arrogant tyrant.

data.name: Quran4169
data.value: And Pharaoh said, "O Haman, construct for me a tower that I might reach the ways -

data.name: Quran4170
data.value: The ways into the heavens - so that I may look at the deity of Moses; but indeed, I think he is a liar." And thus was made attractive to Pharaoh the evil of his deed, and he was averted from the [right] way. And the plan of Pharaoh was not except in ruin.

data.name: Quran4171
data.value: And he who believed said, "O my people, follow me, I will guide you to the way of right conduct.

data.name: Quran4172
data.value: O my people, this worldly life is only [temporary] enjoyment, and indeed, the Hereafter - that is the home of [permanent] settlement.

data.name: Quran4173
data.value: Whoever does an evil deed will not be recompensed except by the like thereof; but whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - those will enter Paradise, being given provision therein without account.

data.name: Quran4174
data.value: And O my people, how is it that I invite you to salvation while you invite me to the Fire?

data.name: Quran4175
data.value: You invite me to disbelieve in Allah and associate with Him that of which I have no knowledge, and I invite you to the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver.

data.name: Quran4176
data.value: Assuredly, that to which you invite me has no [response to a] supplication in this world or in the Hereafter; and indeed, our return is to Allah, and indeed, the transgressors will be companions of the Fire.

data.name: Quran4177
data.value: And you will remember what I [now] say to you, and I entrust my affair to Allah. Indeed, Allah is Seeing of [His] servants."

data.name: Quran4178
data.value: So Allah protected him from the evils they plotted, and the people of Pharaoh were enveloped by the worst of punishment -

data.name: Quran4179
data.value: The Fire, they are exposed to it morning and evening. And the Day the Hour appears [it will be said], "Make the people of Pharaoh enter the severest punishment."

data.name: Quran4180
data.value: And [mention] when they will argue within the Fire, and the weak will say to those who had been arrogant, "Indeed, we were [only] your followers, so will you relieve us of a share of the Fire?"

data.name: Quran4181
data.value: Those who had been arrogant will say, "Indeed, all [of us] are in it. Indeed, Allah has judged between the servants."

data.name: Quran4182
data.value: And those in the Fire will say to the keepers of Hell, "Supplicate your Lord to lighten for us a day from the punishment."

data.name: Quran4183
data.value: They will say, "Did there not come to you your messengers with clear proofs?" They will say, "Yes." They will reply, "Then supplicate [yourselves], but the supplication of the disbelievers is not except in error."

data.name: Quran4184
data.value: Indeed, We will support Our messengers and those who believe during the life of this world and on the Day when the witnesses will stand -

data.name: Quran4185
data.value: The Day their excuse will not benefit the wrongdoers, and they will have the curse, and they will have the worst home.

data.name: Quran4186
data.value: And We had certainly given Moses guidance, and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit the Scripture

data.name: Quran4187
data.value: As guidance and a reminder for those of understanding.

data.name: Quran4188
data.value: So be patient, [O Muhammad]. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And ask forgiveness for your sin and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord in the evening and the morning.

data.name: Quran4189
data.value: Indeed, those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah without [any] authority having come to them - there is not within their breasts except pride, [the extent of] which they cannot reach. So seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, it is He who is the Hearing, the Seeing.

data.name: Quran4190
data.value: The creation of the heavens and earth is greater than the creation of mankind, but most of the people do not know.

data.name: Quran4191
data.value: And not equal are the blind and the seeing, nor are those who believe and do righteous deeds and the evildoer. Little do you remember.

data.name: Quran4192
data.value: Indeed, the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - but most of the people do not believe.

data.name: Quran4193
data.value: And your Lord says, "Call upon Me; I will respond to you." Indeed, those who disdain My worship will enter Hell [rendered] contemptible.

data.name: Quran4194
data.value: It is Allah who made for you the night that you may rest therein and the day giving sight. Indeed, Allah is full of bounty to the people, but most of the people are not grateful.

data.name: Quran4195
data.value: That is Allah, your Lord, Creator of all things; there is no deity except Him, so how are you deluded?

data.name: Quran4196
data.value: Thus were those [before you] deluded who were rejecting the signs of Allah.

data.name: Quran4197
data.value: It is Allah who made for you the earth a place of settlement and the sky a ceiling and formed you and perfected your forms and provided you with good things. That is Allah, your Lord; then blessed is Allah, Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran4198
data.value: He is the Ever-Living; there is no deity except Him, so call upon Him, [being] sincere to Him in religion. [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran4199
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been forbidden to worship those you call upon besides Allah once the clear proofs have come to me from my Lord, and I have been commanded to submit to the Lord of the worlds."

data.name: Quran4200
data.value: It is He who created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot; then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you] that you reach your [time of] maturity, then [further] that you become elders. And among you is he who is taken in death before [that], so that you reach a specified term; and perhaps you will use reason.

data.name: Quran4201
data.value: He it is who gives life and causes death; and when He decrees a matter, He but says to it, "Be," and it is.

data.name: Quran4202
data.value: Do you not consider those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah - how are they averted?

data.name: Quran4203
data.value: Those who deny the Book and that with which We sent Our messengers - they are going to know,

data.name: Quran4204
data.value: When the shackles are around their necks and the chains; they will be dragged

data.name: Quran4205
data.value: In boiling water; then in the Fire they will be filled [with flame].

data.name: Quran4206
data.value: Then it will be said to them, "Where is that which you used to associate [with Him in worship]

data.name: Quran4207
data.value: Other than Allah?" They will say, "They have departed from us; rather, we did not used to invoke previously anything." Thus does Allah put astray the disbelievers.

data.name: Quran4208
data.value: [The angels will say], "That was because you used to exult upon the earth without right and you used to behave insolently.

data.name: Quran4209
data.value: Enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and wretched is the residence of the arrogant."

data.name: Quran4210
data.value: So be patient, [O Muhammad]; indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And whether We show you some of what We have promised them or We take you in death, it is to Us they will be returned.

data.name: Quran4211
data.value: And We have already sent messengers before you. Among them are those [whose stories] We have related to you, and among them are those [whose stories] We have not related to you. And it was not for any messenger to bring a sign [or verse] except by permission of Allah. So when the command of Allah comes, it will be concluded in truth, and the falsifiers will thereupon lose [all].

data.name: Quran4212
data.value: It is Allah who made for you the grazing animals upon which you ride, and some of them you eat.

data.name: Quran4213
data.value: And for you therein are [other] benefits and that you may realize upon them a need which is in your breasts; and upon them and upon ships you are carried.

data.name: Quran4214
data.value: And He shows you His signs. So which of the signs of Allah do you deny?

data.name: Quran4215
data.value: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? They were more numerous than themselves and greater in strength and in impression on the land, but they were not availed by what they used to earn.

data.name: Quran4216
data.value: And when their messengers came to them with clear proofs, they [merely] rejoiced in what they had of knowledge, but they were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.

data.name: Quran4217
data.value: And when they saw Our punishment, they said," We believe in Allah alone and disbelieve in that which we used to associate with Him."

data.name: Quran4218
data.value: But never did their faith benefit them once they saw Our punishment. [It is] the established way of Allah which has preceded among His servants. And the disbelievers thereupon lost [all].

data.name: Quran4219
data.value: Ha, Meem.

data.name: Quran4220
data.value: [This is] a revelation from the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful -

data.name: Quran4221
data.value: A Book whose verses have been detailed, an Arabic Qur'an for a people who know,

data.name: Quran4222
data.value: As a giver of good tidings and a warner; but most of them turn away, so they do not hear.

data.name: Quran4223
data.value: And they say, "Our hearts are within coverings from that to which you invite us, and in our ears is deafness, and between us and you is a partition, so work; indeed, we are working."

data.name: Quran4224
data.value: Say, O [Muhammad], "I am only a man like you to whom it has been revealed that your god is but one God; so take a straight course to Him and seek His forgiveness." And woe to those who associate others with Allah -

data.name: Quran4225
data.value: Those who do not give zakah, and in the Hereafter they are disbelievers.

data.name: Quran4226
data.value: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them is a reward uninterrupted.

data.name: Quran4227
data.value: Say, "Do you indeed disbelieve in He who created the earth in two days and attribute to Him equals? That is the Lord of the worlds."

data.name: Quran4228
data.value: And He placed on the earth firmly set mountains over its surface, and He blessed it and determined therein its [creatures'] sustenance in four days without distinction - for [the information] of those who ask.

data.name: Quran4229
data.value: Then He directed Himself to the heaven while it was smoke and said to it and to the earth, "Come [into being], willingly or by compulsion." They said, "We have come willingly."

data.name: Quran4230
data.value: And He completed them as seven heavens within two days and inspired in each heaven its command. And We adorned the nearest heaven with lamps and as protection. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.

data.name: Quran4231
data.value: But if they turn away, then say, "I have warned you of a thunderbolt like the thunderbolt [that struck] 'Aad and Thamud.

data.name: Quran4232
data.value: [That occurred] when the messengers had come to them before them and after them, [saying], "Worship not except Allah." They said, "If our Lord had willed, He would have sent down the angels, so indeed we, in that with which you have been sent, are disbelievers."

data.name: Quran4233
data.value: As for 'Aad, they were arrogant upon the earth without right and said, "Who is greater than us in strength?" Did they not consider that Allah who created them was greater than them in strength? But they were rejecting Our signs.

data.name: Quran4234
data.value: So We sent upon them a screaming wind during days of misfortune to make them taste the punishment of disgrace in the worldly life; but the punishment of the Hereafter is more disgracing, and they will not be helped.

data.name: Quran4235
data.value: And as for Thamud, We guided them, but they preferred blindness over guidance, so the thunderbolt of humiliating punishment seized them for what they used to earn.

data.name: Quran4236
data.value: And We saved those who believed and used to fear Allah.

data.name: Quran4237
data.value: And [mention, O Muhammad], the Day when the enemies of Allah will be gathered to the Fire while they are [driven] assembled in rows,

data.name: Quran4238
data.value: Until, when they reach it, their hearing and their eyes and their skins will testify against them of what they used to do.

data.name: Quran4239
data.value: And they will say to their skins, "Why have you testified against us?" They will say, "We were made to speak by Allah, who has made everything speak; and He created you the first time, and to Him you are returned.

data.name: Quran4240
data.value: And you were not covering yourselves, lest your hearing testify against you or your sight or your skins, but you assumed that Allah does not know much of what you do.

data.name: Quran4241
data.value: And that was your assumption which you assumed about your Lord. It has brought you to ruin, and you have become among the losers."

data.name: Quran4242
data.value: So [even] if they are patient, the Fire is a residence for them; and if they ask to appease [Allah], they will not be of those who are allowed to appease.

data.name: Quran4243
data.value: And We appointed for them companions who made attractive to them what was before them and what was behind them [of sin], and the word has come into effect upon them among nations which had passed on before them of jinn and men. Indeed, they [all] were losers.

data.name: Quran4244
data.value: And those who disbelieve say, "Do not listen to this Qur'an and speak noisily during [the recitation of] it that perhaps you will overcome."

data.name: Quran4245
data.value: But We will surely cause those who disbelieve to taste a severe punishment, and We will surely recompense them for the worst of what they had been doing.

data.name: Quran4246
data.value: That is the recompense of the enemies of Allah - the Fire. For them therein is the home of eternity as recompense for what they, of Our verses, were rejecting.

data.name: Quran4247
data.value: And those who disbelieved will [then] say, "Our Lord, show us those who misled us of the jinn and men [so] we may put them under our feet that they will be among the lowest."

data.name: Quran4248
data.value: Indeed, those who have said, "Our Lord is Allah " and then remained on a right course - the angels will descend upon them, [saying], "Do not fear and do not grieve but receive good tidings of Paradise, which you were promised.

data.name: Quran4249
data.value: We [angels] were your allies in worldly life and [are so] in the Hereafter. And you will have therein whatever your souls desire, and you will have therein whatever you request [or wish]

data.name: Quran4250
data.value: As accommodation from a [Lord who is] Forgiving and Merciful."

data.name: Quran4251
data.value: And who is better in speech than one who invites to Allah and does righteousness and says, "Indeed, I am of the Muslims."

data.name: Quran4252
data.value: And not equal are the good deed and the bad. Repel [evil] by that [deed] which is better; and thereupon the one whom between you and him is enmity [will become] as though he was a devoted friend.

data.name: Quran4253
data.value: But none is granted it except those who are patient, and none is granted it except one having a great portion [of good].

data.name: Quran4254
data.value: And if there comes to you from Satan an evil suggestion, then seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

data.name: Quran4255
data.value: And of His signs are the night and day and the sun and moon. Do not prostrate to the sun or to the moon, but prostate to Allah, who created them, if it should be Him that you worship.

data.name: Quran4256
data.value: But if they are arrogant - then those who are near your Lord exalt Him by night and by day, and they do not become weary.

data.name: Quran4257
data.value: And of His signs is that you see the earth stilled, but when We send down upon it rain, it quivers and grows. Indeed, He who has given it life is the Giver of Life to the dead. Indeed, He is over all things competent.

data.name: Quran4258
data.value: Indeed, those who inject deviation into Our verses are not concealed from Us. So, is he who is cast into the Fire better or he who comes secure on the Day of Resurrection? Do whatever you will; indeed, He is Seeing of what you do.

data.name: Quran4259
data.value: Indeed, those who disbelieve in the message after it has come to them... And indeed, it is a mighty Book.

data.name: Quran4260
data.value: Falsehood cannot approach it from before it or from behind it; [it is] a revelation from a [Lord who is] Wise and Praiseworthy.

data.name: Quran4261
data.value: Nothing is said to you, [O Muhammad], except what was already said to the messengers before you. Indeed, your Lord is a possessor of forgiveness and a possessor of painful penalty.

data.name: Quran4262
data.value: And if We had made it a non-Arabic Qur'an, they would have said, "Why are its verses not explained in detail [in our language]? Is it a foreign [recitation] and an Arab [messenger]?" Say, "It is, for those who believe, a guidance and cure." And those who do not believe - in their ears is deafness, and it is upon them blindness. Those are being called from a distant place.

data.name: Quran4263
data.value: And We had already given Moses the Scripture, but it came under disagreement. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed they are, concerning the Qur'an, in disquieting doubt.

data.name: Quran4264
data.value: Whoever does righteousness - it is for his [own] soul; and whoever does evil [does so] against it. And your Lord is not ever unjust to [His] servants.

data.name: Quran4265
data.value: To him [alone] is attributed knowledge of the Hour. And fruits emerge not from their coverings nor does a female conceive or give birth except with His knowledge. And the Day He will call to them, "Where are My 'partners'?" they will say, "We announce to You that there is [no longer] among us any witness [to that]."

data.name: Quran4266
data.value: And lost from them will be those they were invoking before, and they will be certain that they have no place of escape.

data.name: Quran4267
data.value: Man is not weary of supplication for good [things], but if evil touches him, he is hopeless and despairing.

data.name: Quran4268
data.value: And if We let him taste mercy from Us after an adversity which has touched him, he will surely say, "This is [due] to me, and I do not think the Hour will occur; and [even] if I should be returned to my Lord, indeed, for me there will be with Him the best." But We will surely inform those who disbelieved about what they did, and We will surely make them taste a massive punishment.

data.name: Quran4269
data.value: And when We bestow favor upon man, he turns away and distances himself; but when evil touches him, then he is full of extensive supplication.

data.name: Quran4270
data.value: Say, "Have you considered: if the Qur'an is from Allah and you disbelieved in it, who would be more astray than one who is in extreme dissension?"

data.name: Quran4271
data.value: We will show them Our signs in the horizons and within themselves until it becomes clear to them that it is the truth. But is it not sufficient concerning your Lord that He is, over all things, a Witness?

data.name: Quran4272
data.value: Unquestionably, they are in doubt about the meeting with their Lord. Unquestionably He is, of all things, encompassing.

data.name: Quran4273
data.value: Ha, Meem.

data.name: Quran4274
data.value: 'Ayn, Seen, Qaf.

data.name: Quran4275
data.value: Thus has He revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and to those before you - Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran4276
data.value: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and He is the Most High, the Most Great.

data.name: Quran4277
data.value: The heavens almost break from above them, and the angels exalt [Allah] with praise of their Lord and ask forgiveness for those on earth. Unquestionably, it is Allah who is the Forgiving, the Merciful.

data.name: Quran4278
data.value: And those who take as allies other than Him - Allah is [yet] Guardian over them; and you, [O Muhammad], are not over them a manager.

data.name: Quran4279
data.value: And thus We have revealed to you an Arabic Qur'an that you may warn the Mother of Cities [Makkah] and those around it and warn of the Day of Assembly, about which there is no doubt. A party will be in Paradise and a party in the Blaze.

data.name: Quran4280
data.value: And if Allah willed, He could have made them [of] one religion, but He admits whom He wills into His mercy. And the wrongdoers have not any protector or helper.

data.name: Quran4281
data.value: Or have they taken protectors [or allies] besides him? But Allah - He is the Protector, and He gives life to the dead, and He is over all things competent.

data.name: Quran4282
data.value: And in anything over which you disagree - its ruling is [to be referred] to Allah. [Say], "That is Allah, my Lord; upon Him I have relied, and to Him I turn back."

data.name: Quran4283
data.value: [He is] Creator of the heavens and the earth. He has made for you from yourselves, mates, and among the cattle, mates; He multiplies you thereby. There is nothing like unto Him, and He is the Hearing, the Seeing.

data.name: Quran4284
data.value: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. He extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. Indeed He is, of all things, Knowing.

data.name: Quran4285
data.value: He has ordained for you of religion what He enjoined upon Noah and that which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and what We enjoined upon Abraham and Moses and Jesus - to establish the religion and not be divided therein. Difficult for those who associate others with Allah is that to which you invite them. Allah chooses for Himself whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back [to Him].

data.name: Quran4286
data.value: And they did not become divided until after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord [postponing the penalty] until a specified time, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed, those who were granted inheritance of the Scripture after them are, concerning it, in disquieting doubt.

data.name: Quran4287
data.value: So to that [religion of Allah] invite, [O Muhammad], and remain on a right course as you are commanded and do not follow their inclinations but say, "I have believed in what Allah has revealed of the Qur'an, and I have been commanded to do justice among you. Allah is our Lord and your Lord. For us are our deeds, and for you your deeds. There is no [need for] argument between us and you. Allah will bring us together, and to Him is the [final] destination."

data.name: Quran4288
data.value: And those who argue concerning Allah after He has been responded to - their argument is invalid with their Lord, and upon them is [His] wrath, and for them is a severe punishment.

data.name: Quran4289
data.value: It is Allah who has sent down the Book in truth and [also] the balance. And what will make you perceive? Perhaps the Hour is near.

data.name: Quran4290
data.value: Those who do not believe in it are impatient for it, but those who believe are fearful of it and know that it is the truth. Unquestionably, those who dispute concerning the Hour are in extreme error.

data.name: Quran4291
data.value: Allah is Subtle with His servants; He gives provisions to whom He wills. And He is the Powerful, the Exalted in Might.

data.name: Quran4292
data.value: Whoever desires the harvest of the Hereafter - We increase for him in his harvest. And whoever desires the harvest of this world - We give him thereof, but there is not for him in the Hereafter any share.

data.name: Quran4293
data.value: Or have they other deities who have ordained for them a religion to which Allah has not consented? But if not for the decisive word, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed, the wrongdoers will have a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran4294
data.value: You will see the wrongdoers fearful of what they have earned, and it will [certainly] befall them. And those who have believed and done righteous deeds will be in lush regions of the gardens [in Paradise] having whatever they will in the presence of their Lord. That is what is the great bounty.

data.name: Quran4295
data.value: It is that of which Allah gives good tidings to His servants who believe and do righteous deeds. Say, [O Muhammad], "I do not ask you for this message any payment [but] only good will through kinship." And whoever commits a good deed - We will increase for him good therein. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Appreciative.

data.name: Quran4296
data.value: Or do they say, "He has invented about Allah a lie"? But if Allah willed, He could seal over your heart. And Allah eliminates falsehood and establishes the truth by His words. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

data.name: Quran4297
data.value: And it is He who accepts repentance from his servants and pardons misdeeds, and He knows what you do.

data.name: Quran4298
data.value: And He answers [the supplication of] those who have believed and done righteous deeds and increases [for] them from His bounty. But the disbelievers will have a severe punishment.

data.name: Quran4299
data.value: And if Allah had extended [excessively] provision for His servants, they would have committed tyranny throughout the earth. But He sends [it] down in an amount which He wills. Indeed He is, of His servants, Acquainted and Seeing.

data.name: Quran4300
data.value: And it is He who sends down the rain after they had despaired and spreads His mercy. And He is the Protector, the Praiseworthy.

data.name: Quran4301
data.value: And of his signs is the creation of the heavens and earth and what He has dispersed throughout them of creatures. And He, for gathering them when He wills, is competent.

data.name: Quran4302
data.value: And whatever strikes you of disaster - it is for what your hands have earned; but He pardons much.

data.name: Quran4303
data.value: And you will not cause failure [to Allah] upon the earth. And you have not besides Allah any protector or helper.

data.name: Quran4304
data.value: And of His signs are the ships in the sea, like mountains.

data.name: Quran4305
data.value: If He willed, He could still the wind, and they would remain motionless on its surface. Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.

data.name: Quran4306
data.value: Or He could destroy them for what they earned; but He pardons much.

data.name: Quran4307
data.value: And [that is so] those who dispute concerning Our signs may know that for them there is no place of escape.

data.name: Quran4308
data.value: So whatever thing you have been given - it is but [for] enjoyment of the worldly life. But what is with Allah is better and more lasting for those who have believed and upon their Lord rely

data.name: Quran4309
data.value: And those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, and when they are angry, they forgive,

data.name: Quran4310
data.value: And those who have responded to their lord and established prayer and whose affair is [determined by] consultation among themselves, and from what We have provided them, they spend.

data.name: Quran4311
data.value: And those who, when tyranny strikes them, they defend themselves,

data.name: Quran4312
data.value: And the retribution for an evil act is an evil one like it, but whoever pardons and makes reconciliation - his reward is [due] from Allah. Indeed, He does not like wrongdoers.

data.name: Quran4313
data.value: And whoever avenges himself after having been wronged - those have not upon them any cause [for blame].

data.name: Quran4314
data.value: The cause is only against the ones who wrong the people and tyrannize upon the earth without right. Those will have a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran4315
data.value: And whoever is patient and forgives - indeed, that is of the matters [requiring] determination.

data.name: Quran4316
data.value: And he whom Allah sends astray - for him there is no protector beyond Him. And you will see the wrongdoers, when they see the punishment, saying, "Is there for return [to the former world] any way?"

data.name: Quran4317
data.value: And you will see them being exposed to the Fire, humbled from humiliation, looking from [behind] a covert glance. And those who had believed will say, "Indeed, the [true] losers are the ones who lost themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, the wrongdoers are in an enduring punishment."

data.name: Quran4318
data.value: And there will not be for them any allies to aid them other than Allah. And whoever Allah sends astray - for him there is no way.

data.name: Quran4319
data.value: Respond to your Lord before a Day comes from Allah of which there is no repelling. No refuge will you have that day, nor for you will there be any denial.

data.name: Quran4320
data.value: But if they turn away - then We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], over them as a guardian; upon you is only [the duty of] notification. And indeed, when We let man taste mercy from us, he rejoices in it; but if evil afflicts him for what his hands have put forth, then indeed, man is ungrateful.

data.name: Quran4321
data.value: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth; He creates what he wills. He gives to whom He wills female [children], and He gives to whom He wills males.

data.name: Quran4322
data.value: Or He makes them [both] males and females, and He renders whom He wills barren. Indeed, He is Knowing and Competent.

data.name: Quran4323
data.value: And it is not for any human being that Allah should speak to him except by revelation or from behind a partition or that He sends a messenger to reveal, by His permission, what He wills. Indeed, He is Most High and Wise.

data.name: Quran4324
data.value: And thus We have revealed to you an inspiration of Our command. You did not know what is the Book or [what is] faith, but We have made it a light by which We guide whom We will of Our servants. And indeed, [O Muhammad], you guide to a straight path -

data.name: Quran4325
data.value: The path of Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Unquestionably, to Allah do [all] matters evolve.

data.name: Quran4326
data.value: Ha, Meem.

data.name: Quran4327
data.value: By the clear Book,

data.name: Quran4328
data.value: Indeed, We have made it an Arabic Qur'an that you might understand.

data.name: Quran4329
data.value: And indeed it is, in the Mother of the Book with Us, exalted and full of wisdom.

data.name: Quran4330
data.value: Then should We turn the message away, disregarding you, because you are a transgressing people?

data.name: Quran4331
data.value: And how many a prophet We sent among the former peoples,

data.name: Quran4332
data.value: But there would not come to them a prophet except that they used to ridicule him.

data.name: Quran4333
data.value: And We destroyed greater than them in [striking] power, and the example of the former peoples has preceded.

data.name: Quran4334
data.value: And if you should ask them, "Who has created the heavens and the earth?" they would surely say, "They were created by the Exalted in Might, the Knowing."

data.name: Quran4335
data.value: [The one] who has made for you the earth a bed and made for you upon it roads that you might be guided

data.name: Quran4336
data.value: And who sends down rain from the sky in measured amounts, and We revive thereby a dead land - thus will you be brought forth -

data.name: Quran4337
data.value: And who created the species, all of them, and has made for you of ships and animals those which you mount.

data.name: Quran4338
data.value: That you may settle yourselves upon their backs and then remember the favor of your Lord when you have settled upon them and say. "Exalted is He who has subjected this to us, and we could not have [otherwise] subdued it.

data.name: Quran4339
data.value: And indeed we, to our Lord, will [surely] return."

data.name: Quran4340
data.value: But they have attributed to Him from His servants a portion. Indeed, man is clearly ungrateful.

data.name: Quran4341
data.value: Or has He taken, out of what He has created, daughters and chosen you for [having] sons?

data.name: Quran4342
data.value: And when one of them is given good tidings of that which he attributes to the Most Merciful in comparison, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief.

data.name: Quran4343
data.value: So is one brought up in ornaments while being during conflict unevident [attributed to Allah]?

data.name: Quran4344
data.value: And they have made the angels, who are servants of the Most Merciful, females. Did they witness their creation? Their testimony will be recorded, and they will be questioned.

data.name: Quran4345
data.value: And they said, "If the Most Merciful had willed, we would not have worshipped them." They have of that no knowledge. They are not but falsifying.

data.name: Quran4346
data.value: Or have We given them a book before the Qur'an to which they are adhering?

data.name: Quran4347
data.value: Rather, they say, "Indeed, we found our fathers upon a religion, and we are in their footsteps [rightly] guided."

data.name: Quran4348
data.value: And similarly, We did not send before you any warner into a city except that its affluent said, "Indeed, we found our fathers upon a religion, and we are, in their footsteps, following."

data.name: Quran4349
data.value: [Each warner] said, "Even if I brought you better guidance than that [religion] upon which you found your fathers?" They said, "Indeed we, in that with which you were sent, are disbelievers."

data.name: Quran4350
data.value: So we took retribution from them; then see how was the end of the deniers.

data.name: Quran4351
data.value: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham said to his father and his people, "Indeed, I am disassociated from that which you worship

data.name: Quran4352
data.value: Except for He who created me; and indeed, He will guide me."

data.name: Quran4353
data.value: And he made it a word remaining among his descendants that they might return [to it].

data.name: Quran4354
data.value: However, I gave enjoyment to these [people of Makkah] and their fathers until there came to them the truth and a clear Messenger.

data.name: Quran4355
data.value: But when the truth came to them, they said, "This is magic, and indeed we are, concerning it, disbelievers."

data.name: Quran4356
data.value: And they said, "Why was this Qur'an not sent down upon a great man from [one of] the two cities?"

data.name: Quran4357
data.value: Do they distribute the mercy of your Lord? It is We who have apportioned among them their livelihood in the life of this world and have raised some of them above others in degrees [of rank] that they may make use of one another for service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than whatever they accumulate.

data.name: Quran4358
data.value: And if it were not that the people would become one community [of disbelievers], We would have made for those who disbelieve in the Most Merciful - for their houses - ceilings and stairways of silver upon which to mount

data.name: Quran4359
data.value: And for their houses - doors and couches [of silver] upon which to recline

data.name: Quran4360
data.value: And gold ornament. But all that is not but the enjoyment of worldly life. And the Hereafter with your Lord is for the righteous.

data.name: Quran4361
data.value: And whoever is blinded from remembrance of the Most Merciful - We appoint for him a devil, and he is to him a companion.

data.name: Quran4362
data.value: And indeed, the devils avert them from the way [of guidance] while they think that they are [rightly] guided

data.name: Quran4363
data.value: Until, when he comes to Us [at Judgement], he says [to his companion], "Oh, I wish there was between me and you the distance between the east and west - how wretched a companion."

data.name: Quran4364
data.value: And never will it benefit you that Day, when you have wronged, that you are [all] sharing in the punishment.

data.name: Quran4365
data.value: Then will you make the deaf hear, [O Muhammad], or guide the blind or he who is in clear error?

data.name: Quran4366
data.value: And whether [or not] We take you away [in death], indeed, We will take retribution upon them.

data.name: Quran4367
data.value: Or whether [or not] We show you that which We have promised them, indeed, We are Perfect in Ability.

data.name: Quran4368
data.value: So adhere to that which is revealed to you. Indeed, you are on a straight path.

data.name: Quran4369
data.value: And indeed, it is a remembrance for you and your people, and you [all] are going to be questioned.

data.name: Quran4370
data.value: And ask those We sent before you of Our messengers; have We made besides the Most Merciful deities to be worshipped?

data.name: Quran4371
data.value: And certainly did We send Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his establishment, and he said, "Indeed, I am the messenger of the Lord of the worlds."

data.name: Quran4372
data.value: But when he brought them Our signs, at once they laughed at them.

data.name: Quran4373
data.value: And We showed them not a sign except that it was greater than its sister, and We seized them with affliction that perhaps they might return [to faith].

data.name: Quran4374
data.value: And they said [to Moses], "O magician, invoke for us your Lord by what He has promised you. Indeed, we will be guided."

data.name: Quran4375
data.value: But when We removed from them the affliction, at once they broke their word.

data.name: Quran4376
data.value: And Pharaoh called out among his people; he said, "O my people, does not the kingdom of Egypt belong to me, and these rivers flowing beneath me; then do you not see?

data.name: Quran4377
data.value: Or am I [not] better than this one who is insignificant and hardly makes himself clear?

data.name: Quran4378
data.value: Then why have there not been placed upon him bracelets of gold or come with him the angels in conjunction?"

data.name: Quran4379
data.value: So he bluffed his people, and they obeyed him. Indeed, they were [themselves] a people defiantly disobedient [of Allah].

data.name: Quran4380
data.value: And when they angered Us, We took retribution from them and drowned them all.

data.name: Quran4381
data.value: And We made them a precedent and an example for the later peoples.

data.name: Quran4382
data.value: And when the son of Mary was presented as an example, immediately your people laughed aloud.

data.name: Quran4383
data.value: And they said, "Are your gods better, or is he?" They did not present the comparison except for [mere] argument. But, [in fact], they are a people prone to dispute.

data.name: Quran4384
data.value: Jesus was not but a servant upon whom We bestowed favor, and We made him an example for the Children of Israel.

data.name: Quran4385
data.value: And if We willed, We could have made [instead] of you angels succeeding [one another] on the earth.

data.name: Quran4386
data.value: And indeed, Jesus will be [a sign for] knowledge of the Hour, so be not in doubt of it, and follow Me. This is a straight path.

data.name: Quran4387
data.value: And never let Satan avert you. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy.

data.name: Quran4388
data.value: And when Jesus brought clear proofs, he said, "I have come to you with wisdom and to make clear to you some of that over which you differ, so fear Allah and obey me.

data.name: Quran4389
data.value: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. This is a straight path."

data.name: Quran4390
data.value: But the denominations from among them differed [and separated], so woe to those who have wronged from the punishment of a painful Day.

data.name: Quran4391
data.value: Are they waiting except for the Hour to come upon them suddenly while they perceive not?

data.name: Quran4392
data.value: Close friends, that Day, will be enemies to each other, except for the righteous

data.name: Quran4393
data.value: [To whom Allah will say], "O My servants, no fear will there be concerning you this Day, nor will you grieve,

data.name: Quran4394
data.value: [You] who believed in Our verses and were Muslims.

data.name: Quran4395
data.value: Enter Paradise, you and your kinds, delighted."

data.name: Quran4396
data.value: Circulated among them will be plates and vessels of gold. And therein is whatever the souls desire and [what] delights the eyes, and you will abide therein eternally.

data.name: Quran4397
data.value: And that is Paradise which you are made to inherit for what you used to do.

data.name: Quran4398
data.value: For you therein is much fruit from which you will eat.

data.name: Quran4399
data.value: Indeed, the criminals will be in the punishment of Hell, abiding eternally.

data.name: Quran4400
data.value: It will not be allowed to subside for them, and they, therein, are in despair.

data.name: Quran4401
data.value: And We did not wrong them, but it was they who were the wrongdoers.

data.name: Quran4402
data.value: And they will call, "O Malik, let your Lord put an end to us!" He will say, "Indeed, you will remain."

data.name: Quran4403
data.value: We had certainly brought you the truth, but most of you, to the truth, were averse.

data.name: Quran4404
data.value: Or have they devised [some] affair? But indeed, We are devising [a plan].

data.name: Quran4405
data.value: Or do they think that We hear not their secrets and their private conversations? Yes, [We do], and Our messengers are with them recording.

data.name: Quran4406
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "If the Most Merciful had a son, then I would be the first of [his] worshippers."

data.name: Quran4407
data.value: Exalted is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe.

data.name: Quran4408
data.value: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised.

data.name: Quran4409
data.value: And it is Allah who is [the only] deity in the heaven, and on the earth [the only] deity. And He is the Wise, the Knowing.

data.name: Quran4410
data.value: And blessed is He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them and with whom is knowledge of the Hour and to whom you will be returned.

data.name: Quran4411
data.value: And those they invoke besides Him do not possess [power of] intercession; but only those who testify to the truth [can benefit], and they know.

data.name: Quran4412
data.value: And if you asked them who created them, they would surely say, "Allah." So how are they deluded?

data.name: Quran4413
data.value: And [Allah acknowledges] his saying, "O my Lord, indeed these are a people who do not believe."

data.name: Quran4414
data.value: So turn aside from them and say, "Peace." But they are going to know.

data.name: Quran4415
data.value: Ha, Meem.

data.name: Quran4416
data.value: By the clear Book,

data.name: Quran4417
data.value: Indeed, We sent it down during a blessed night. Indeed, We were to warn [mankind].

data.name: Quran4418
data.value: On that night is made distinct every precise matter -

data.name: Quran4419
data.value: [Every] matter [proceeding] from Us. Indeed, We were to send [a messenger]

data.name: Quran4420
data.value: As mercy from your Lord. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

data.name: Quran4421
data.value: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them, if you would be certain.

data.name: Quran4422
data.value: There is no deity except Him; He gives life and causes death. [He is] your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers.

data.name: Quran4423
data.value: But they are in doubt, amusing themselves.

data.name: Quran4424
data.value: Then watch for the Day when the sky will bring a visible smoke.

data.name: Quran4425
data.value: Covering the people; this is a painful torment.

data.name: Quran4426
data.value: [They will say], "Our Lord, remove from us the torment; indeed, we are believers."

data.name: Quran4427
data.value: How will there be for them a reminder [at that time]? And there had come to them a clear Messenger.

data.name: Quran4428
data.value: Then they turned away from him and said, "[He was] taught [and is] a madman."

data.name: Quran4429
data.value: Indeed, We will remove the torment for a little. Indeed, you [disbelievers] will return [to disbelief].

data.name: Quran4430
data.value: The Day We will strike with the greatest assault, indeed, We will take retribution.

data.name: Quran4431
data.value: And We had already tried before them the people of Pharaoh, and there came to them a noble messenger,

data.name: Quran4432
data.value: [Saying], "Render to me the servants of Allah. Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger,"

data.name: Quran4433
data.value: And [saying], "Be not haughty with Allah. Indeed, I have come to you with clear authority.

data.name: Quran4434
data.value: And indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me.

data.name: Quran4435
data.value: But if you do not believe me, then leave me alone."

data.name: Quran4436
data.value: And [finally] he called to his Lord that these were a criminal people.

data.name: Quran4437
data.value: [Allah said], "Then set out with My servants by night. Indeed, you are to be pursued.

data.name: Quran4438
data.value: And leave the sea in stillness. Indeed, they are an army to be drowned."

data.name: Quran4439
data.value: How much they left behind of gardens and springs

data.name: Quran4440
data.value: And crops and noble sites

data.name: Quran4441
data.value: And comfort wherein they were amused.

data.name: Quran4442
data.value: Thus. And We caused to inherit it another people.

data.name: Quran4443
data.value: And the heaven and earth wept not for them, nor were they reprieved.

data.name: Quran4444
data.value: And We certainly saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment -

data.name: Quran4445
data.value: From Pharaoh. Indeed, he was a haughty one among the transgressors.

data.name: Quran4446
data.value: And We certainly chose them by knowledge over [all] the worlds.

data.name: Quran4447
data.value: And We gave them of signs that in which there was a clear trial.

data.name: Quran4448
data.value: Indeed, these [disbelievers] are saying,

data.name: Quran4449
data.value: "There is not but our first death, and we will not be resurrected.

data.name: Quran4450
data.value: Then bring [back] our forefathers, if you should be truthful."

data.name: Quran4451
data.value: Are they better or the people of Tubba' and those before them? We destroyed them, [for] indeed, they were criminals.

data.name: Quran4452
data.value: And We did not create the heavens and earth and that between them in play.

data.name: Quran4453
data.value: We did not create them except in truth, but most of them do not know.

data.name: Quran4454
data.value: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is the appointed time for them all -

data.name: Quran4455
data.value: The Day when no relation will avail a relation at all, nor will they be helped -

data.name: Quran4456
data.value: Except those [believers] on whom Allah has mercy. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

data.name: Quran4457
data.value: Indeed, the tree of zaqqum

data.name: Quran4458
data.value: Is food for the sinful.

data.name: Quran4459
data.value: Like murky oil, it boils within bellies

data.name: Quran4460
data.value: Like the boiling of scalding water.

data.name: Quran4461
data.value: [It will be commanded], "Seize him and drag him into the midst of the Hellfire,

data.name: Quran4462
data.value: Then pour over his head from the torment of scalding water."

data.name: Quran4463
data.value: [It will be said], "Taste! Indeed, you are the honored, the noble!

data.name: Quran4464
data.value: Indeed, this is what you used to dispute."

data.name: Quran4465
data.value: Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place;

data.name: Quran4466
data.value: Within gardens and springs,

data.name: Quran4467
data.value: Wearing [garments of] fine silk and brocade, facing each other.

data.name: Quran4468
data.value: Thus. And We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

data.name: Quran4469
data.value: They will call therein for every [kind of] fruit - safe and secure.

data.name: Quran4470
data.value: They will not taste death therein except the first death, and He will have protected them from the punishment of Hellfire

data.name: Quran4471
data.value: As bounty from your Lord. That is what is the great attainment.

data.name: Quran4472
data.value: And indeed, We have eased the Qur'an in your tongue that they might be reminded.

data.name: Quran4473
data.value: So watch, [O Muhammad]; indeed, they are watching [for your end].

data.name: Quran4474
data.value: Ha, Meem.

data.name: Quran4475
data.value: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran4476
data.value: Indeed, within the heavens and earth are signs for the believers.

data.name: Quran4477
data.value: And in the creation of yourselves and what He disperses of moving creatures are signs for people who are certain [in faith].

data.name: Quran4478
data.value: And [in] the alternation of night and day and [in] what Allah sends down from the sky of provision and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness and [in His] directing of the winds are signs for a people who reason.

data.name: Quran4479
data.value: These are the verses of Allah which We recite to you in truth. Then in what statement after Allah and His verses will they believe?

data.name: Quran4480
data.value: Woe to every sinful liar

data.name: Quran4481
data.value: Who hears the verses of Allah recited to him, then persists arrogantly as if he had not heard them. So give him tidings of a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran4482
data.value: And when he knows anything of Our verses, he takes them in ridicule. Those will have a humiliating punishment.

data.name: Quran4483
data.value: Before them is Hell, and what they had earned will not avail them at all nor what they had taken besides Allah as allies. And they will have a great punishment.

data.name: Quran4484
data.value: This [Qur'an] is guidance. And those who have disbelieved in the verses of their Lord will have a painful punishment of foul nature.

data.name: Quran4485
data.value: It is Allah who subjected to you the sea so that ships may sail upon it by His command and that you may seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful.

data.name: Quran4486
data.value: And He has subjected to you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth - all from Him. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.

data.name: Quran4487
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], to those who have believed that they [should] forgive those who expect not the days of Allah so that He may recompense a people for what they used to earn.

data.name: Quran4488
data.value: Whoever does a good deed - it is for himself; and whoever does evil - it is against the self. Then to your Lord you will be returned.

data.name: Quran4489
data.value: And We did certainly give the Children of Israel the Scripture and judgement and prophethood, and We provided them with good things and preferred them over the worlds.

data.name: Quran4490
data.value: And We gave them clear proofs of the matter [of religion]. And they did not differ except after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.

data.name: Quran4491
data.value: Then We put you, [O Muhammad], on an ordained way concerning the matter [of religion]; so follow it and do not follow the inclinations of those who do not know.

data.name: Quran4492
data.value: Indeed, they will never avail you against Allah at all. And indeed, the wrongdoers are allies of one another; but Allah is the protector of the righteous.

data.name: Quran4493
data.value: This [Qur'an] is enlightenment for mankind and guidance and mercy for a people who are certain [in faith].

data.name: Quran4494
data.value: Or do those who commit evils think We will make them like those who have believed and done righteous deeds - [make them] equal in their life and their death? Evil is that which they judge.

data.name: Quran4495
data.value: And Allah created the heavens and earth in truth and so that every soul may be recompensed for what it has earned, and they will not be wronged.

data.name: Quran4496
data.value: Have you seen he who has taken as his god his [own] desire, and Allah has sent him astray due to knowledge and has set a seal upon his hearing and his heart and put over his vision a veil? So who will guide him after Allah? Then will you not be reminded?

data.name: Quran4497
data.value: And they say, "There is not but our worldly life; we die and live, and nothing destroys us except time." And they have of that no knowledge; they are only assuming.

data.name: Quran4498
data.value: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, their argument is only that they say, "Bring [back] our forefathers, if you should be truthful."

data.name: Quran4499
data.value: Say, "Allah causes you to live, then causes you to die; then He will assemble you for the Day of Resurrection, about which there is no doubt, but most of the people do not know."

data.name: Quran4500
data.value: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And the Day the Hour appears - that Day the falsifiers will lose.

data.name: Quran4501
data.value: And you will see every nation kneeling [from fear]. Every nation will be called to its record [and told], "Today you will be recompensed for what you used to do.

data.name: Quran4502
data.value: This, Our record, speaks about you in truth. Indeed, We were having transcribed whatever you used to do."

data.name: Quran4503
data.value: So as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, their Lord will admit them into His mercy. That is what is the clear attainment.

data.name: Quran4504
data.value: But as for those who disbelieved, [it will be said], "Were not Our verses recited to you, but you were arrogant and became a people of criminals?

data.name: Quran4505
data.value: And when it was said, 'Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth and the Hour [is coming] - no doubt about it,' you said, 'We know not what is the Hour. We assume only assumption, and we are not convinced.' "

data.name: Quran4506
data.value: And the evil consequences of what they did will appear to them, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.

data.name: Quran4507
data.value: And it will be said, "Today We will forget you as you forgot the meeting of this Day of yours, and your refuge is the Fire, and for you there are no helpers.

data.name: Quran4508
data.value: That is because you took the verses of Allah in ridicule, and worldly life deluded you." So that Day they will not be removed from it, nor will they be asked to appease [Allah].

data.name: Quran4509
data.value: Then, to Allah belongs [all] praise - Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran4510
data.value: And to Him belongs [all] grandeur within the heavens and the earth, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran4511
data.value: Ha, Meem.

data.name: Quran4512
data.value: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran4513
data.value: We did not create the heavens and earth and what is between them except in truth and [for] a specified term. But those who disbelieve, from that of which they are warned, are turning away.

data.name: Quran4514
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "Have you considered that which you invoke besides Allah? Show me what they have created of the earth; or did they have partnership in [creation of] the heavens? Bring me a scripture [revealed] before this or a [remaining] trace of knowledge, if you should be truthful."

data.name: Quran4515
data.value: And who is more astray than he who invokes besides Allah those who will not respond to him until the Day of Resurrection, and they, of their invocation, are unaware.

data.name: Quran4516
data.value: And when the people are gathered [that Day], they [who were invoked] will be enemies to them, and they will be deniers of their worship.

data.name: Quran4517
data.value: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who disbelieve say of the truth when it has come to them, "This is obvious magic."

data.name: Quran4518
data.value: Or do they say, "He has invented it?" Say, "If I have invented it, you will not possess for me [the power of protection] from Allah at all. He is most knowing of that in which you are involved. Sufficient is He as Witness between me and you, and He is the Forgiving the Merciful."

data.name: Quran4519
data.value: Say, "I am not something original among the messengers, nor do I know what will be done with me or with you. I only follow that which is revealed to me, and I am not but a clear warner."

data.name: Quran4520
data.value: Say, "Have you considered: if the Qur'an was from Allah, and you disbelieved in it while a witness from the Children of Israel has testified to something similar and believed while you were arrogant...?" Indeed, Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

data.name: Quran4521
data.value: And those who disbelieve say of those who believe, "If it had [truly] been good, they would not have preceded us to it." And when they are not guided by it, they will say, "This is an ancient falsehood."

data.name: Quran4522
data.value: And before it was the scripture of Moses to lead and as a mercy. And this is a confirming Book in an Arabic tongue to warn those who have wronged and as good tidings to the doers of good.

data.name: Quran4523
data.value: Indeed, those who have said, "Our Lord is Allah," and then remained on a right course - there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve.

data.name: Quran4524
data.value: Those are the companions of Paradise, abiding eternally therein as reward for what they used to do.

data.name: Quran4525
data.value: And We have enjoined upon man, to his parents, good treatment. His mother carried him with hardship and gave birth to him with hardship, and his gestation and weaning [period] is thirty months. [He grows] until, when he reaches maturity and reaches [the age of] forty years, he says, "My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to work righteousness of which You will approve and make righteous for me my offspring. Indeed, I have repented to You, and indeed, I am of the Muslims."

data.name: Quran4526
data.value: Those are the ones from whom We will accept the best of what they did and overlook their misdeeds, [their being] among the companions of Paradise. [That is] the promise of truth which they had been promised.

data.name: Quran4527
data.value: But one who says to his parents, "Uff to you; do you promise me that I will be brought forth [from the earth] when generations before me have already passed on [into oblivion]?" while they call to Allah for help [and to their son], "Woe to you! Believe! Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth." But he says, "This is not but legends of the former people" -

data.name: Quran4528
data.value: Those are the ones upon whom the word has come into effect, [who will be] among nations which had passed on before them of jinn and men. Indeed, they [all] were losers.

data.name: Quran4529
data.value: And for all there are degrees [of reward and punishment] for what they have done, and [it is] so that He may fully compensate them for their deeds, and they will not be wronged.

data.name: Quran4530
data.value: And the Day those who disbelieved are exposed to the Fire [it will be said], "You exhausted your pleasures during your worldly life and enjoyed them, so this Day you will be awarded the punishment of [extreme] humiliation because you were arrogant upon the earth without right and because you were defiantly disobedient."

data.name: Quran4531
data.value: And mention, [O Muhammad], the brother of 'Aad, when he warned his people in the [region of] al-Ahqaf - and warners had already passed on before him and after him - [saying], "Do not worship except Allah. Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."

data.name: Quran4532
data.value: They said, "Have you come to delude us away from our gods? Then bring us what you promise us, if you should be of the truthful."

data.name: Quran4533
data.value: He said, "Knowledge [of its time] is only with Allah, and I convey to you that with which I was sent; but I see you [to be] a people behaving ignorantly."

data.name: Quran4534
data.value: And when they saw it as a cloud approaching their valleys, they said, "This is a cloud bringing us rain!" Rather, it is that for which you were impatient: a wind, within it a painful punishment,

data.name: Quran4535
data.value: Destroying everything by command of its Lord. And they became so that nothing was seen [of them] except their dwellings. Thus do We recompense the criminal people.

data.name: Quran4536
data.value: And We had certainly established them in such as We have not established you, and We made for them hearing and vision and hearts. But their hearing and vision and hearts availed them not from anything [of the punishment] when they were [continually] rejecting the signs of Allah; and they were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.

data.name: Quran4537
data.value: And We have already destroyed what surrounds you of [those] cities, and We have diversified the signs [or verses] that perhaps they might return [from disbelief].

data.name: Quran4538
data.value: Then why did those they took besides Allah as deities by which to approach [Him] not aid them? But they had strayed from them. And that was their falsehood and what they were inventing.

data.name: Quran4539
data.value: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We directed to you a few of the jinn, listening to the Qur'an. And when they attended it, they said, "Listen quietly." And when it was concluded, they went back to their people as warners.

data.name: Quran4540
data.value: They said, "O our people, indeed we have heard a [recited] Book revealed after Moses confirming what was before it which guides to the truth and to a straight path.

data.name: Quran4541
data.value: O our people, respond to the Messenger of Allah and believe in him; Allah will forgive for you your sins and protect you from a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran4542
data.value: But he who does not respond to the Caller of Allah will not cause failure [to Him] upon earth, and he will not have besides Him any protectors. Those are in manifest error."

data.name: Quran4543
data.value: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and earth and did not fail in their creation, is able to give life to the dead? Yes. Indeed, He is over all things competent.

data.name: Quran4544
data.value: And the Day those who disbelieved are exposed to the Fire [it will be said], "Is this not the truth?" They will say, "Yes, by our Lord." He will say, "Then taste the punishment because you used to disbelieve."

data.name: Quran4545
data.value: So be patient, [O Muhammad], as were those of determination among the messengers and do not be impatient for them. It will be - on the Day they see that which they are promised - as though they had not remained [in the world] except an hour of a day. [This is] notification. And will [any] be destroyed except the defiantly disobedient people?

data.name: Quran4546
data.value: Those who disbelieve and avert [people] from the way of Allah - He will waste their deeds.

data.name: Quran4547
data.value: And those who believe and do righteous deeds and believe in what has been sent down upon Muhammad - and it is the truth from their Lord - He will remove from them their misdeeds and amend their condition.

data.name: Quran4548
data.value: That is because those who disbelieve follow falsehood, and those who believe follow the truth from their Lord. Thus does Allah present to the people their comparisons.

data.name: Quran4549
data.value: So when you meet those who disbelieve [in battle], strike [their] necks until, when you have inflicted slaughter upon them, then secure their bonds, and either [confer] favor afterwards or ransom [them] until the war lays down its burdens. That [is the command]. And if Allah had willed, He could have taken vengeance upon them [Himself], but [He ordered armed struggle] to test some of you by means of others. And those who are killed in the cause of Allah - never will He waste their deeds.

data.name: Quran4550
data.value: He will guide them and amend their condition

data.name: Quran4551
data.value: And admit them to Paradise, which He has made known to them.

data.name: Quran4552
data.value: O you who have believed, if you support Allah, He will support you and plant firmly your feet.

data.name: Quran4553
data.value: But those who disbelieve - for them is misery, and He will waste their deeds.

data.name: Quran4554
data.value: That is because they disliked what Allah revealed, so He rendered worthless their deeds.

data.name: Quran4555
data.value: Have they not traveled through the land and seen how was the end of those before them? Allah destroyed [everything] over them, and for the disbelievers is something comparable.

data.name: Quran4556
data.value: That is because Allah is the protector of those who have believed and because the disbelievers have no protector.

data.name: Quran4557
data.value: Indeed, Allah will admit those who have believed and done righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow, but those who disbelieve enjoy themselves and eat as grazing livestock eat, and the Fire will be a residence for them.

data.name: Quran4558
data.value: And how many a city was stronger than your city [Makkah] which drove you out? We destroyed them; and there was no helper for them.

data.name: Quran4559
