data.value: So is he who is on clear evidence from his Lord like him to whom the evil of his work has been made attractive and they follow their [own] desires?

data.name: Quran4560
data.value: Is the description of Paradise, which the righteous are promised, wherein are rivers of water unaltered, rivers of milk the taste of which never changes, rivers of wine delicious to those who drink, and rivers of purified honey, in which they will have from all [kinds of] fruits and forgiveness from their Lord, like [that of] those who abide eternally in the Fire and are given to drink scalding water that will sever their intestines?

data.name: Quran4561
data.value: And among them, [O Muhammad], are those who listen to you, until when they depart from you, they say to those who were given knowledge, "What has he said just now?" Those are the ones of whom Allah has sealed over their hearts and who have followed their [own] desires.

data.name: Quran4562
data.value: And those who are guided - He increases them in guidance and gives them their righteousness.

data.name: Quran4563
data.value: Then do they await except that the Hour should come upon them unexpectedly? But already there have come [some of] its indications. Then what good to them, when it has come, will be their remembrance?

data.name: Quran4564
data.value: So know, [O Muhammad], that there is no deity except Allah and ask forgiveness for your sin and for the believing men and believing women. And Allah knows of your movement and your resting place.

data.name: Quran4565
data.value: Those who believe say, "Why has a surah not been sent down? But when a precise surah is revealed and fighting is mentioned therein, you see those in whose hearts is hypocrisy looking at you with a look of one overcome by death. And more appropriate for them [would have been]

data.name: Quran4566
data.value: Obedience and good words. And when the matter [of fighting] was determined, if they had been true to Allah, it would have been better for them.

data.name: Quran4567
data.value: So would you perhaps, if you turned away, cause corruption on earth and sever your [ties of] relationship?

data.name: Quran4568
data.value: Those [who do so] are the ones that Allah has cursed, so He deafened them and blinded their vision.

data.name: Quran4569
data.value: Then do they not reflect upon the Qur'an, or are there locks upon [their] hearts?

data.name: Quran4570
data.value: Indeed, those who reverted back [to disbelief] after guidance had become clear to them - Satan enticed them and prolonged hope for them.

data.name: Quran4571
data.value: That is because they said to those who disliked what Allah sent down, "We will obey you in part of the matter." And Allah knows what they conceal.

data.name: Quran4572
data.value: Then how [will it be] when the angels take them in death, striking their faces and their backs?

data.name: Quran4573
data.value: That is because they followed what angered Allah and disliked [what earns] His pleasure, so He rendered worthless their deeds.

data.name: Quran4574
data.value: Or do those in whose hearts is disease think that Allah would never expose their [feelings of] hatred?

data.name: Quran4575
data.value: And if We willed, We could show them to you, and you would know them by their mark; but you will surely know them by the tone of [their] speech. And Allah knows your deeds.

data.name: Quran4576
data.value: And We will surely test you until We make evident those who strive among you [for the cause of Allah] and the patient, and We will test your affairs.

data.name: Quran4577
data.value: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of Allah and opposed the Messenger after guidance had become clear to them - never will they harm Allah at all, and He will render worthless their deeds.

data.name: Quran4578
data.value: O you who have believed, obey Allah and obey the Messenger and do not invalidate your deeds.

data.name: Quran4579
data.value: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of Allah and then died while they were disbelievers - never will Allah forgive them.

data.name: Quran4580
data.value: So do not weaken and call for peace while you are superior; and Allah is with you and will never deprive you of [the reward of] your deeds.

data.name: Quran4581
data.value: [This] worldly life is only amusement and diversion. And if you believe and fear Allah, He will give you your rewards and not ask you for your properties.

data.name: Quran4582
data.value: If He should ask you for them and press you, you would withhold, and He would expose your unwillingness.

data.name: Quran4583
data.value: Here you are - those invited to spend in the cause of Allah - but among you are those who withhold [out of greed]. And whoever withholds only withholds [benefit] from himself; and Allah is the Free of need, while you are the needy. And if you turn away, He will replace you with another people; then they will not be the likes of you.

data.name: Quran4584
data.value: Indeed, We have given you, [O Muhammad], a clear conquest

data.name: Quran4585
data.value: That Allah may forgive for you what preceded of your sin and what will follow and complete His favor upon you and guide you to a straight path

data.name: Quran4586
data.value: And [that] Allah may aid you with a mighty victory.

data.name: Quran4587
data.value: It is He who sent down tranquillity into the hearts of the believers that they would increase in faith along with their [present] faith. And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth, and ever is Allah Knowing and Wise.

data.name: Quran4588
data.value: [And] that He may admit the believing men and the believing women to gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein eternally and remove from them their misdeeds - and ever is that, in the sight of Allah, a great attainment -

data.name: Quran4589
data.value: And [that] He may punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women, and the polytheist men and polytheist women - those who assume about Allah an assumption of evil nature. Upon them is a misfortune of evil nature; and Allah has become angry with them and has cursed them and prepared for them Hell, and evil it is as a destination.

data.name: Quran4590
data.value: And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.

data.name: Quran4591
data.value: Indeed, We have sent you as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner

data.name: Quran4592
data.value: That you [people] may believe in Allah and His Messenger and honor him and respect the Prophet and exalt Allah morning and afternoon.

data.name: Quran4593
data.value: Indeed, those who pledge allegiance to you, [O Muhammad] - they are actually pledging allegiance to Allah. The hand of Allah is over their hands. So he who breaks his word only breaks it to the detriment of himself. And he who fulfills that which he has promised Allah - He will give him a great reward.

data.name: Quran4594
data.value: Those who remained behind of the bedouins will say to you, "Our properties and our families occupied us, so ask forgiveness for us." They say with their tongues what is not within their hearts. Say, "Then who could prevent Allah at all if He intended for you harm or intended for you benefit? Rather, ever is Allah, with what you do, Acquainted.

data.name: Quran4595
data.value: But you thought that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families, ever, and that was made pleasing in your hearts. And you assumed an assumption of evil and became a people ruined."

data.name: Quran4596
data.value: And whoever has not believed in Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers a Blaze.

data.name: Quran4597
data.value: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran4598
data.value: Those who remained behind will say when you set out toward the war booty to take it, "Let us follow you." They wish to change the words of Allah. Say, "Never will you follow us. Thus did Allah say before." So they will say, "Rather, you envy us." But [in fact] they were not understanding except a little.

data.name: Quran4599
data.value: Say to those who remained behind of the bedouins, "You will be called to [face] a people of great military might; you may fight them, or they will submit. So if you obey, Allah will give you a good reward; but if you turn away as you turned away before, He will punish you with a painful punishment."

data.name: Quran4600
data.value: There is not upon the blind any guilt or upon the lame any guilt or upon the ill any guilt [for remaining behind]. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger - He will admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow; but whoever turns away - He will punish him with a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran4601
data.value: Certainly was Allah pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you, [O Muhammad], under the tree, and He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down tranquillity upon them and rewarded them with an imminent conquest

data.name: Quran4602
data.value: And much war booty which they will take. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.

data.name: Quran4603
data.value: Allah has promised you much booty that you will take [in the future] and has hastened for you this [victory] and withheld the hands of people from you - that it may be a sign for the believers and [that] He may guide you to a straight path.

data.name: Quran4604
data.value: And [He promises] other [victories] that you were [so far] unable to [realize] which Allah has already encompassed. And ever is Allah, over all things, competent.

data.name: Quran4605
data.value: And if those [Makkans] who disbelieve had fought you, they would have turned their backs [in flight]. Then they would not find a protector or a helper.

data.name: Quran4606
data.value: [This is] the established way of Allah which has occurred before. And never will you find in the way of Allah any change.

data.name: Quran4607
data.value: And it is He who withheld their hands from you and your hands from them within [the area of] Makkah after He caused you to overcome them. And ever is Allah of what you do, Seeing.

data.name: Quran4608
data.value: They are the ones who disbelieved and obstructed you from al-Masjid al-Haram while the offering was prevented from reaching its place of sacrifice. And if not for believing men and believing women whom you did not know - that you might trample them and there would befall you because of them dishonor without [your] knowledge - [you would have been permitted to enter Makkah]. [This was so] that Allah might admit to His mercy whom He willed. If they had been apart [from them], We would have punished those who disbelieved among them with painful punishment

data.name: Quran4609
data.value: When those who disbelieved had put into their hearts chauvinism - the chauvinism of the time of ignorance. But Allah sent down His tranquillity upon His Messenger and upon the believers and imposed upon them the word of righteousness, and they were more deserving of it and worthy of it. And ever is Allah, of all things, Knowing.

data.name: Quran4610
data.value: Certainly has Allah showed to His Messenger the vision in truth. You will surely enter al-Masjid al-Haram, if Allah wills, in safety, with your heads shaved and [hair] shortened, not fearing [anyone]. He knew what you did not know and has arranged before that a conquest near [at hand].

data.name: Quran4611
data.value: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion. And sufficient is Allah as Witness.

data.name: Quran4612
data.value: Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah; and those with him are forceful against the disbelievers, merciful among themselves. You see them bowing and prostrating [in prayer], seeking bounty from Allah and [His] pleasure. Their mark is on their faces from the trace of prostration. That is their description in the Torah. And their description in the Gospel is as a plant which produces its offshoots and strengthens them so they grow firm and stand upon their stalks, delighting the sowers - so that Allah may enrage by them the disbelievers. Allah has promised those who believe and do righteous deeds among them forgiveness and a great reward.

data.name: Quran4613
data.value: O you who have believed, do not put [yourselves] before Allah and His Messenger but fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing.

data.name: Quran4614
data.value: O you who have believed, do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet or be loud to him in speech like the loudness of some of you to others, lest your deeds become worthless while you perceive not.

data.name: Quran4615
data.value: Indeed, those who lower their voices before the Messenger of Allah - they are the ones whose hearts Allah has tested for righteousness. For them is forgiveness and great reward.

data.name: Quran4616
data.value: Indeed, those who call you, [O Muhammad], from behind the chambers - most of them do not use reason.

data.name: Quran4617
data.value: And if they had been patient until you [could] come out to them, it would have been better for them. But Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran4618
data.value: O you who have believed, if there comes to you a disobedient one with information, investigate, lest you harm a people out of ignorance and become, over what you have done, regretful.

data.name: Quran4619
data.value: And know that among you is the Messenger of Allah. If he were to obey you in much of the matter, you would be in difficulty, but Allah has endeared to you the faith and has made it pleasing in your hearts and has made hateful to you disbelief, defiance and disobedience. Those are the [rightly] guided.

data.name: Quran4620
data.value: [It is] as bounty from Allah and favor. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.

data.name: Quran4621
data.value: And if two factions among the believers should fight, then make settlement between the two. But if one of them oppresses the other, then fight against the one that oppresses until it returns to the ordinance of Allah. And if it returns, then make settlement between them in justice and act justly. Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly.

data.name: Quran4622
data.value: The believers are but brothers, so make settlement between your brothers. And fear Allah that you may receive mercy.

data.name: Quran4623
data.value: O you who have believed, let not a people ridicule [another] people; perhaps they may be better than them; nor let women ridicule [other] women; perhaps they may be better than them. And do not insult one another and do not call each other by [offensive] nicknames. Wretched is the name of disobedience after [one's] faith. And whoever does not repent - then it is those who are the wrongdoers.

data.name: Quran4624
data.value: O you who have believed, avoid much [negative] assumption. Indeed, some assumption is sin. And do not spy or backbite each other. Would one of you like to eat the flesh of his brother when dead? You would detest it. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is Accepting of repentance and Merciful.

data.name: Quran4625
data.value: O mankind, indeed We have created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another. Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted.

data.name: Quran4626
data.value: The bedouins say, "We have believed." Say, "You have not [yet] believed; but say [instead], 'We have submitted,' for faith has not yet entered your hearts. And if you obey Allah and His Messenger, He will not deprive you from your deeds of anything. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."

data.name: Quran4627
data.value: The believers are only the ones who have believed in Allah and His Messenger and then doubt not but strive with their properties and their lives in the cause of Allah. It is those who are the truthful.

data.name: Quran4628
data.value: Say, "Would you acquaint Allah with your religion while Allah knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and Allah is Knowing of all things?"

data.name: Quran4629
data.value: They consider it a favor to you that they have accepted Islam. Say, "Do not consider your Islam a favor to me. Rather, Allah has conferred favor upon you that He has guided you to the faith, if you should be truthful."

data.name: Quran4630
data.value: Indeed, Allah knows the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Seeing of what you do.

data.name: Quran4631
data.value: Qaf. By the honored Qur'an...

data.name: Quran4632
data.value: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.

data.name: Quran4633
data.value: When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant return."

data.name: Quran4634
data.value: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record.

data.name: Quran4635
data.value: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition.

data.name: Quran4636
data.value: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts?

data.name: Quran4637
data.value: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind,

data.name: Quran4638
data.value: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allah].

data.name: Quran4639
data.value: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest

data.name: Quran4640
data.value: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers -

data.name: Quran4641
data.value: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the resurrection.

data.name: Quran4642
data.value: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud

data.name: Quran4643
data.value: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot

data.name: Quran4644
data.value: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubba'. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.

data.name: Quran4645
data.value: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation.

data.name: Quran4646
data.value: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein

data.name: Quran4647
data.value: When the two receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left.

data.name: Quran4648
data.value: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].

data.name: Quran4649
data.value: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid.

data.name: Quran4650
data.value: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.

data.name: Quran4651
data.value: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.

data.name: Quran4652
data.value: [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover, so your sight, this Day, is sharp."

data.name: Quran4653
data.value: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."

data.name: Quran4654
data.value: [Allah will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever,

data.name: Quran4655
data.value: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter,

data.name: Quran4656
data.value: Who made [as equal] with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment."

data.name: Quran4657
data.value: His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error."

data.name: Quran4658
data.value: [Allah] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning.

data.name: Quran4659
data.value: The word will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants."

data.name: Quran4660
data.value: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more,"

data.name: Quran4661
data.value: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far,

data.name: Quran4662
data.value: [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to Allah] and keeper [of His covenant]

data.name: Quran4663
data.value: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].

data.name: Quran4664
data.value: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."

data.name: Quran4665
data.value: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more.

data.name: Quran4666
data.value: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape?

data.name: Quran4667
data.value: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].

data.name: Quran4668
data.value: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness.

data.name: Quran4669
data.value: So be patient, [O Muhammad], over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting,

data.name: Quran4670
data.value: And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration.

data.name: Quran4671
data.value: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near -

data.name: Quran4672
data.value: The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves].

data.name: Quran4673
data.value: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination

data.name: Quran4674
data.value: On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us.

data.name: Quran4675
data.value: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur'an whoever fears My threat.

data.name: Quran4676
data.value: By those [winds] scattering [dust] dispersing

data.name: Quran4677
data.value: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]

data.name: Quran4678
data.value: And those [ships] sailing with ease

data.name: Quran4679
data.value: And those [angels] apportioning [each] matter,

data.name: Quran4680
data.value: Indeed, what you are promised is true.

data.name: Quran4681
data.value: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.

data.name: Quran4682
data.value: By the heaven containing pathways,

data.name: Quran4683
data.value: Indeed, you are in differing speech.

data.name: Quran4684
data.value: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded.

data.name: Quran4685
data.value: Destroyed are the falsifiers

data.name: Quran4686
data.value: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless.

data.name: Quran4687
data.value: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense?"

data.name: Quran4688
data.value: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire

data.name: Quran4689
data.value: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient."

data.name: Quran4690
data.value: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs,

data.name: Quran4691
data.value: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good.

data.name: Quran4692
data.value: They used to sleep but little of the night,

data.name: Quran4693
data.value: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness,

data.name: Quran4694
data.value: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived.

data.name: Quran4695
data.value: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]

data.name: Quran4696
data.value: And in yourselves. Then will you not see?

data.name: Quran4697
data.value: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.

data.name: Quran4698
data.value: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking.

data.name: Quran4699
data.value: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham? -

data.name: Quran4700
data.value: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown.

data.name: Quran4701
data.value: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf

data.name: Quran4702
data.value: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"

data.name: Quran4703
data.value: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy.

data.name: Quran4704
data.value: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman!"

data.name: Quran4705
data.value: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."

data.name: Quran4706
data.value: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"

data.name: Quran4707
data.value: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

data.name: Quran4708
data.value: To send down upon them stones of clay,

data.name: Quran4709
data.value: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."

data.name: Quran4710
data.value: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.

data.name: Quran4711
data.value: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.

data.name: Quran4712
data.value: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.

data.name: Quran4713
data.value: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.

data.name: Quran4714
data.value: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman."

data.name: Quran4715
data.value: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.

data.name: Quran4716
data.value: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.

data.name: Quran4717
data.value: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.

data.name: Quran4718
data.value: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."

data.name: Quran4719
data.value: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.

data.name: Quran4720
data.value: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.

data.name: Quran4721
data.value: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.

data.name: Quran4722
data.value: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.

data.name: Quran4723
data.value: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.

data.name: Quran4724
data.value: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember.

data.name: Quran4725
data.value: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

data.name: Quran4726
data.value: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

data.name: Quran4727
data.value: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman."

data.name: Quran4728
data.value: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.

data.name: Quran4729
data.value: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed.

data.name: Quran4730
data.value: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers.

data.name: Quran4731
data.value: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.

data.name: Quran4732
data.value: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.

data.name: Quran4733
data.value: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.

data.name: Quran4734
data.value: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me.

data.name: Quran4735
data.value: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised.

data.name: Quran4736
data.value: By the mount

data.name: Quran4737
data.value: And [by] a Book inscribed

data.name: Quran4738
data.value: In parchment spread open

data.name: Quran4739
data.value: And [by] the frequented House

data.name: Quran4740
data.value: And [by] the heaven raised high

data.name: Quran4741
data.value: And [by] the sea filled [with fire],

data.name: Quran4742
data.value: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.

data.name: Quran4743
data.value: Of it there is no preventer.

data.name: Quran4744
data.value: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion

data.name: Quran4745
data.value: And the mountains will pass on, departing -

data.name: Quran4746
data.value: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,

data.name: Quran4747
data.value: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves.

data.name: Quran4748
data.value: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],

data.name: Quran4749
data.value: "This is the Fire which you used to deny.

data.name: Quran4750
data.value: Then is this magic, or do you not see?

data.name: Quran4751
data.value: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do."

data.name: Quran4752
data.value: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure,

data.name: Quran4753
data.value: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.

data.name: Quran4754
data.value: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."

data.name: Quran4755
data.value: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

data.name: Quran4756
data.value: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained.

data.name: Quran4757
data.value: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire.

data.name: Quran4758
data.value: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin.

data.name: Quran4759
data.value: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.

data.name: Quran4760
data.value: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

data.name: Quran4761
data.value: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah].

data.name: Quran4762
data.value: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.

data.name: Quran4763
data.value: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful."

data.name: Quran4764
data.value: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.

data.name: Quran4765
data.value: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time?"

data.name: Quran4766
data.value: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."

data.name: Quran4767
data.value: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?

data.name: Quran4768
data.value: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.

data.name: Quran4769
data.value: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.

data.name: Quran4770
data.value: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?

data.name: Quran4771
data.value: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.

data.name: Quran4772
data.value: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?

data.name: Quran4773
data.value: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority.

data.name: Quran4774
data.value: Or has He daughters while you have sons?

data.name: Quran4775
data.value: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

data.name: Quran4776
data.value: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

data.name: Quran4777
data.value: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.

data.name: Quran4778
data.value: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.

data.name: Quran4779
data.value: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."

data.name: Quran4780
data.value: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -

data.name: Quran4781
data.value: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.

data.name: Quran4782
data.value: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.

data.name: Quran4783
data.value: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise.

data.name: Quran4784
data.value: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.

data.name: Quran4785
data.value: By the star when it descends,

data.name: Quran4786
data.value: Your companion [Muhammad] has not strayed, nor has he erred,

data.name: Quran4787
data.value: Nor does he speak from [his own] inclination.

data.name: Quran4788
data.value: It is not but a revelation revealed,

data.name: Quran4789
data.value: Taught to him by one intense in strength -

data.name: Quran4790
data.value: One of soundness. And he rose to [his] true form

data.name: Quran4791
data.value: While he was in the higher [part of the] horizon.

data.name: Quran4792
data.value: Then he approached and descended

data.name: Quran4793
data.value: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer.

data.name: Quran4794
data.value: And he revealed to His Servant what he revealed.

data.name: Quran4795
data.value: The heart did not lie [about] what it saw.

data.name: Quran4796
data.value: So will you dispute with him over what he saw?

data.name: Quran4797
data.value: And he certainly saw him in another descent

data.name: Quran4798
data.value: At the Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary -

data.name: Quran4799
data.value: Near it is the Garden of Refuge -

data.name: Quran4800
data.value: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered [it].

data.name: Quran4801
data.value: The sight [of the Prophet] did not swerve, nor did it transgress [its limit].

data.name: Quran4802
data.value: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord.

data.name: Quran4803
data.value: So have you considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza?

data.name: Quran4804
data.value: And Manat, the third - the other one?

data.name: Quran4805
data.value: Is the male for you and for Him the female?

data.name: Quran4806
data.value: That, then, is an unjust division.

data.name: Quran4807
data.value: They are not but [mere] names you have named them - you and your forefathers - for which Allah has sent down no authority. They follow not except assumption and what [their] souls desire, and there has already come to them from their Lord guidance.

data.name: Quran4808
data.value: Or is there for man whatever he wishes?

data.name: Quran4809
data.value: Rather, to Allah belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

data.name: Quran4810
data.value: And how many angels there are in the heavens whose intercession will not avail at all except [only] after Allah has permitted [it] to whom He wills and approves.

data.name: Quran4811
data.value: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names,

data.name: Quran4812
data.value: And they have thereof no knowledge. They follow not except assumption, and indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all.

data.name: Quran4813
data.value: So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life.

data.name: Quran4814
data.value: That is their sum of knowledge. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of who is guided.

data.name: Quran4815
data.value: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth - that He may recompense those who do evil with [the penalty of] what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best [reward] -

data.name: Quran4816
data.value: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, only [committing] slight ones. Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness. He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not claim yourselves to be pure; He is most knowing of who fears Him.

data.name: Quran4817
data.value: Have you seen the one who turned away

data.name: Quran4818
data.value: And gave a little and [then] refrained?

data.name: Quran4819
data.value: Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees?

data.name: Quran4820
data.value: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses

data.name: Quran4821
data.value: And [of] Abraham, who fulfilled [his obligations] -

data.name: Quran4822
data.value: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another

data.name: Quran4823
data.value: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives

data.name: Quran4824
data.value: And that his effort is going to be seen -

data.name: Quran4825
data.value: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense

data.name: Quran4826
data.value: And that to your Lord is the finality

data.name: Quran4827
data.value: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep

data.name: Quran4828
data.value: And that it is He who causes death and gives life

data.name: Quran4829
data.value: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female -

data.name: Quran4830
data.value: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted

data.name: Quran4831
data.value: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation

data.name: Quran4832
data.value: And that it is He who enriches and suffices

data.name: Quran4833
data.value: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius

data.name: Quran4834
data.value: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad

data.name: Quran4835
data.value: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them] -

data.name: Quran4836
data.value: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.

data.name: Quran4837
data.value: And the overturned towns He hurled down

data.name: Quran4838
data.value: And covered them by that which He covered.

data.name: Quran4839
data.value: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?

data.name: Quran4840
data.value: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners.

data.name: Quran4841
data.value: The Approaching Day has approached.

data.name: Quran4842
data.value: Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover.

data.name: Quran4843
data.value: Then at this statement do you wonder?

data.name: Quran4844
data.value: And you laugh and do not weep

data.name: Quran4845
data.value: While you are proudly sporting?

data.name: Quran4846
data.value: So prostrate to Allah and worship [Him].

data.name: Quran4847
data.value: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].

data.name: Quran4848
data.value: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic."

data.name: Quran4849
data.value: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.

data.name: Quran4850
data.value: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -

data.name: Quran4851
data.value: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].

data.name: Quran4852
data.value: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,

data.name: Quran4853
data.value: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,

data.name: Quran4854
data.value: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."

data.name: Quran4855
data.value: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.

data.name: Quran4856
data.value: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."

data.name: Quran4857
data.value: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down

data.name: Quran4858
data.value: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.

data.name: Quran4859
data.value: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,

data.name: Quran4860
data.value: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.

data.name: Quran4861
data.value: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?

data.name: Quran4862
data.value: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

data.name: Quran4863
data.value: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

data.name: Quran4864
data.value: 'Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

data.name: Quran4865
data.value: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,

data.name: Quran4866
data.value: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.

data.name: Quran4867
data.value: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

data.name: Quran4868
data.value: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

data.name: Quran4869
data.value: Thamud denied the warning

data.name: Quran4870
data.value: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.

data.name: Quran4871
data.value: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."

data.name: Quran4872
data.value: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.

data.name: Quran4873
data.value: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.

data.name: Quran4874
data.value: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].

data.name: Quran4875
data.value: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].

data.name: Quran4876
data.value: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

data.name: Quran4877
data.value: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.

data.name: Quran4878
data.value: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

data.name: Quran4879
data.value: The people of Lot denied the warning.

data.name: Quran4880
data.value: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn

data.name: Quran4881
data.value: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.

data.name: Quran4882
data.value: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.

data.name: Quran4883
data.value: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."

data.name: Quran4884
data.value: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.

data.name: Quran4885
data.value: So taste My punishment and warning.

data.name: Quran4886
data.value: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

data.name: Quran4887
data.value: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.

data.name: Quran4888
data.value: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.

data.name: Quran4889
data.value: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture?

data.name: Quran4890
data.value: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?

data.name: Quran4891
data.value: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat].

data.name: Quran4892
data.value: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.

data.name: Quran4893
data.value: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.

data.name: Quran4894
data.value: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."

data.name: Quran4895
data.value: Indeed, all things We created with predestination.

data.name: Quran4896
data.value: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.

data.name: Quran4897
data.value: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember?

data.name: Quran4898
data.value: And everything they did is in written records.

data.name: Quran4899
data.value: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.

data.name: Quran4900
data.value: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers,

data.name: Quran4901
data.value: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.

data.name: Quran4902
data.value: The Most Merciful

data.name: Quran4903
data.value: Taught the Qur'an,

data.name: Quran4904
data.value: Created man,

data.name: Quran4905
data.value: [And] taught him eloquence.

data.name: Quran4906
data.value: The sun and the moon [move] by precise calculation,

data.name: Quran4907
data.value: And the stars and trees prostrate.

data.name: Quran4908
data.value: And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance

data.name: Quran4909
data.value: That you not transgress within the balance.

data.name: Quran4910
data.value: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance.

data.name: Quran4911
data.value: And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures.

data.name: Quran4912
data.value: Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]

data.name: Quran4913
data.value: And grain having husks and scented plants.

data.name: Quran4914
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4915
data.value: He created man from clay like [that of] pottery.

data.name: Quran4916
data.value: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire.

data.name: Quran4917
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4918
data.value: [He is] Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets.

data.name: Quran4919
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4920
data.value: He released the two seas, meeting [side by side];

data.name: Quran4921
data.value: Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses.

data.name: Quran4922
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4923
data.value: From both of them emerge pearl and coral.

data.name: Quran4924
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4925
data.value: And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.

data.name: Quran4926
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4927
data.value: Everyone upon the earth will perish,

data.name: Quran4928
data.value: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.

data.name: Quran4929
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4930
data.value: Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is bringing about a matter.

data.name: Quran4931
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4932
data.value: We will attend to you, O prominent beings.

data.name: Quran4933
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4934
data.value: O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority [from Allah].

data.name: Quran4935
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4936
data.value: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves.

data.name: Quran4937
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4938
data.value: And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil -

data.name: Quran4939
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

data.name: Quran4940
data.value: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.

data.name: Quran4941
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4942
data.value: The criminals will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.

data.name: Quran4943
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4944
data.value: This is Hell, which the criminals deny.

data.name: Quran4945
data.value: They will go around between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree].

data.name: Quran4946
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4947
data.value: But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens -

data.name: Quran4948
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

data.name: Quran4949
data.value: Having [spreading] branches.

data.name: Quran4950
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4951
data.value: In both of them are two springs, flowing.

data.name: Quran4952
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4953
data.value: In both of them are of every fruit, two kinds.

data.name: Quran4954
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4955
data.value: [They are] reclining on beds whose linings are of silk brocade, and the fruit of the two gardens is hanging low.

data.name: Quran4956
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4957
data.value: In them are women limiting [their] glances, untouched before them by man or jinni -

data.name: Quran4958
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

data.name: Quran4959
data.value: As if they were rubies and coral.

data.name: Quran4960
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4961
data.value: Is the reward for good [anything] but good?

data.name: Quran4962
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4963
data.value: And below them both [in excellence] are two [other] gardens -

data.name: Quran4964
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

data.name: Quran4965
data.value: Dark green [in color].

data.name: Quran4966
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4967
data.value: In both of them are two springs, spouting.

data.name: Quran4968
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4969
data.value: In both of them are fruit and palm trees and pomegranates.

data.name: Quran4970
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4971
data.value: In them are good and beautiful women -

data.name: Quran4972
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

data.name: Quran4973
data.value: Fair ones reserved in pavilions -

data.name: Quran4974
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

data.name: Quran4975
data.value: Untouched before them by man or jinni -

data.name: Quran4976
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

data.name: Quran4977
data.value: Reclining on green cushions and beautiful fine carpets.

data.name: Quran4978
data.value: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

data.name: Quran4979
data.value: Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.

data.name: Quran4980
data.value: When the Occurrence occurs,

data.name: Quran4981
data.value: There is, at its occurrence, no denial.

data.name: Quran4982
data.value: It will bring down [some] and raise up [others].

data.name: Quran4983
data.value: When the earth is shaken with convulsion

data.name: Quran4984
data.value: And the mountains are broken down, crumbling

data.name: Quran4985
data.value: And become dust dispersing.

data.name: Quran4986
data.value: And you become [of] three kinds:

data.name: Quran4987
data.value: Then the companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?

data.name: Quran4988
data.value: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?

data.name: Quran4989
data.value: And the forerunners, the forerunners -

data.name: Quran4990
data.value: Those are the ones brought near [to Allah]

data.name: Quran4991
data.value: In the Gardens of Pleasure,

data.name: Quran4992
data.value: A [large] company of the former peoples

data.name: Quran4993
data.value: And a few of the later peoples,

data.name: Quran4994
data.value: On thrones woven [with ornament],

data.name: Quran4995
data.value: Reclining on them, facing each other.

data.name: Quran4996
data.value: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal

data.name: Quran4997
data.value: With vessels, pitchers and a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring -

data.name: Quran4998
data.value: No headache will they have therefrom, nor will they be intoxicated -

data.name: Quran4999
data.value: And fruit of what they select

data.name: Quran5000
data.value: And the meat of fowl, from whatever they desire.

data.name: Quran5001
data.value: And [for them are] fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes,

data.name: Quran5002
data.value: The likenesses of pearls well-protected,

data.name: Quran5003
data.value: As reward for what they used to do.

data.name: Quran5004
data.value: They will not hear therein ill speech or commission of sin -

data.name: Quran5005
data.value: Only a saying: "Peace, peace."

data.name: Quran5006
data.value: The companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?

data.name: Quran5007
data.value: [They will be] among lote trees with thorns removed

data.name: Quran5008
data.value: And [banana] trees layered [with fruit]

data.name: Quran5009
data.value: And shade extended

data.name: Quran5010
data.value: And water poured out

data.name: Quran5011
data.value: And fruit, abundant [and varied],

data.name: Quran5012
data.value: Neither limited [to season] nor forbidden,

data.name: Quran5013
data.value: And [upon] beds raised high.

data.name: Quran5014
data.value: Indeed, We have produced the women of Paradise in a [new] creation

data.name: Quran5015
data.value: And made them virgins,

data.name: Quran5016
data.value: Devoted [to their husbands] and of equal age,

data.name: Quran5017
data.value: For the companions of the right [who are]

data.name: Quran5018
data.value: A company of the former peoples

data.name: Quran5019
data.value: And a company of the later peoples.

data.name: Quran5020
data.value: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?

data.name: Quran5021
data.value: [They will be] in scorching fire and scalding water

data.name: Quran5022
data.value: And a shade of black smoke,

data.name: Quran5023
data.value: Neither cool nor beneficial.

data.name: Quran5024
data.value: Indeed they were, before that, indulging in affluence,

data.name: Quran5025
data.value: And they used to persist in the great violation,

data.name: Quran5026
data.value: And they used to say, "When we die and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?

data.name: Quran5027
data.value: And our forefathers [as well]?"

data.name: Quran5028
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, the former and the later peoples

data.name: Quran5029
data.value: Are to be gathered together for the appointment of a known Day."

data.name: Quran5030
data.value: Then indeed you, O those astray [who are] deniers,

data.name: Quran5031
data.value: Will be eating from trees of zaqqum

data.name: Quran5032
data.value: And filling with it your bellies

data.name: Quran5033
data.value: And drinking on top of it from scalding water

data.name: Quran5034
data.value: And will drink as the drinking of thirsty camels.

data.name: Quran5035
data.value: That is their accommodation on the Day of Recompense.

data.name: Quran5036
data.value: We have created you, so why do you not believe?

data.name: Quran5037
data.value: Have you seen that which you emit?

data.name: Quran5038
data.value: Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator?

data.name: Quran5039
data.value: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone

data.name: Quran5040
data.value: In that We will change your likenesses and produce you in that [form] which you do not know.

data.name: Quran5041
data.value: And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember?

data.name: Quran5042
data.value: And have you seen that [seed] which you sow?

data.name: Quran5043
data.value: Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower?

data.name: Quran5044
data.value: If We willed, We could make it [dry] debris, and you would remain in wonder,

data.name: Quran5045
data.value: [Saying], "Indeed, we are [now] in debt;

data.name: Quran5046
data.value: Rather, we have been deprived."

data.name: Quran5047
data.value: And have you seen the water that you drink?

data.name: Quran5048
data.value: Is it you who brought it down from the clouds, or is it We who bring it down?

data.name: Quran5049
data.value: If We willed, We could make it bitter, so why are you not grateful?

data.name: Quran5050
data.value: And have you seen the fire that you ignite?

data.name: Quran5051
data.value: Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the producer?

data.name: Quran5052
data.value: We have made it a reminder and provision for the travelers,

data.name: Quran5053
data.value: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

data.name: Quran5054
data.value: Then I swear by the setting of the stars,

data.name: Quran5055
data.value: And indeed, it is an oath - if you could know - [most] great.

data.name: Quran5056
data.value: Indeed, it is a noble Qur'an

data.name: Quran5057
data.value: In a Register well-protected;

data.name: Quran5058
data.value: None touch it except the purified.

data.name: Quran5059
data.value: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran5060
data.value: Then is it to this statement that you are indifferent

data.name: Quran5061
data.value: And make [the thanks for] your provision that you deny [the Provider]?

data.name: Quran5062
data.value: Then why, when the soul at death reaches the throat

data.name: Quran5063
data.value: And you are at that time looking on -

data.name: Quran5064
data.value: And Our angels are nearer to him than you, but you do not see -

data.name: Quran5065
data.value: Then why do you not, if you are not to be recompensed,

data.name: Quran5066
data.value: Bring it back, if you should be truthful?

data.name: Quran5067
data.value: And if the deceased was of those brought near to Allah,

data.name: Quran5068
data.value: Then [for him is] rest and bounty and a garden of pleasure.

data.name: Quran5069
data.value: And if he was of the companions of the right,

data.name: Quran5070
data.value: Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right."

data.name: Quran5071
data.value: But if he was of the deniers [who were] astray,

data.name: Quran5072
data.value: Then [for him is] accommodation of scalding water

data.name: Quran5073
data.value: And burning in Hellfire

data.name: Quran5074
data.value: Indeed, this is the true certainty,

data.name: Quran5075
data.value: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

data.name: Quran5076
data.value: Whatever is in the heavens and earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran5077
data.value: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. He gives life and causes death, and He is over all things competent.

data.name: Quran5078
data.value: He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing.

data.name: Quran5079
data.value: It is He who created the heavens and earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne. He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein; and He is with you wherever you are. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing.

data.name: Quran5080
data.value: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. And to Allah are returned [all] matters.

data.name: Quran5081
data.value: He causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night, and he is Knowing of that within the breasts.

data.name: Quran5082
data.value: Believe in Allah and His Messenger and spend out of that in which He has made you successors. For those who have believed among you and spent, there will be a great reward.

data.name: Quran5083
data.value: And why do you not believe in Allah while the Messenger invites you to believe in your Lord and He has taken your covenant, if you should [truly] be believers?

data.name: Quran5084
data.value: It is He who sends down upon His Servant [Muhammad] verses of clear evidence that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And indeed, Allah is to you Kind and Merciful.

data.name: Quran5085
data.value: And why do you not spend in the cause of Allah while to Allah belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth? Not equal among you are those who spent before the conquest [of Makkah] and fought [and those who did so after it]. Those are greater in degree than they who spent afterwards and fought. But to all Allah has promised the best [reward]. And Allah, with what you do, is Acquainted.

data.name: Quran5086
data.value: Who is it that would loan Allah a goodly loan so He will multiply it for him and he will have a noble reward?

data.name: Quran5087
data.value: On the Day you see the believing men and believing women, their light proceeding before them and on their right, [it will be said], "Your good tidings today are [of] gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide eternally." That is what is the great attainment.

data.name: Quran5088
data.value: On the [same] Day the hypocrite men and hypocrite women will say to those who believed, "Wait for us that we may acquire some of your light." It will be said, "Go back behind you and seek light." And a wall will be placed between them with a door, its interior containing mercy, but on the outside of it is torment.

data.name: Quran5089
data.value: The hypocrites will call to the believers, "Were we not with you?" They will say, "Yes, but you afflicted yourselves and awaited [misfortune for us] and doubted, and wishful thinking deluded you until there came the command of Allah. And the Deceiver deceived you concerning Allah.

data.name: Quran5090
data.value: So today no ransom will be taken from you or from those who disbelieved. Your refuge is the Fire. It is most worthy of you, and wretched is the destination.

data.name: Quran5091
data.value: Has the time not come for those who have believed that their hearts should become humbly submissive at the remembrance of Allah and what has come down of the truth? And let them not be like those who were given the Scripture before, and a long period passed over them, so their hearts hardened; and many of them are defiantly disobedient.

data.name: Quran5092
data.value: Know that Allah gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. We have made clear to you the signs; perhaps you will understand.

data.name: Quran5093
data.value: Indeed, the men who practice charity and the women who practice charity and [they who] have loaned Allah a goodly loan - it will be multiplied for them, and they will have a noble reward.

data.name: Quran5094
data.value: And those who have believed in Allah and His messengers - those are [in the ranks of] the supporters of truth and the martyrs, with their Lord. For them is their reward and their light. But those who have disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of Hellfire.

data.name: Quran5095
data.value: Know that the life of this world is but amusement and diversion and adornment and boasting to one another and competition in increase of wealth and children - like the example of a rain whose [resulting] plant growth pleases the tillers; then it dries and you see it turned yellow; then it becomes [scattered] debris. And in the Hereafter is severe punishment and forgiveness from Allah and approval. And what is the worldly life except the enjoyment of delusion.

data.name: Quran5096
data.value: Race toward forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden whose width is like the width of the heavens and earth, prepared for those who believed in Allah and His messengers. That is the bounty of Allah which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.

data.name: Quran5097
data.value: No disaster strikes upon the earth or among yourselves except that it is in a register before We bring it into being - indeed that, for Allah, is easy -

data.name: Quran5098
data.value: In order that you not despair over what has eluded you and not exult [in pride] over what He has given you. And Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful -

data.name: Quran5099
data.value: [Those] who are stingy and enjoin upon people stinginess. And whoever turns away - then indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.

data.name: Quran5100
data.value: We have already sent Our messengers with clear evidences and sent down with them the Scripture and the balance that the people may maintain [their affairs] in justice. And We sent down iron, wherein is great military might and benefits for the people, and so that Allah may make evident those who support Him and His messengers unseen. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.

data.name: Quran5101
data.value: And We have already sent Noah and Abraham and placed in their descendants prophethood and scripture; and among them is he who is guided, but many of them are defiantly disobedient.

data.name: Quran5102
data.value: Then We sent following their footsteps Our messengers and followed [them] with Jesus, the son of Mary, and gave him the Gospel. And We placed in the hearts of those who followed him compassion and mercy and monasticism, which they innovated; We did not prescribe it for them except [that they did so] seeking the approval of Allah. But they did not observe it with due observance. So We gave the ones who believed among them their reward, but many of them are defiantly disobedient.

data.name: Quran5103
data.value: O you who have believed, fear Allah and believe in His Messenger; He will [then] give you a double portion of His mercy and make for you a light by which you will walk and forgive you; and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran5104
data.value: [This is] so that the People of the Scripture may know that they are not able [to obtain] anything from the bounty of Allah and that [all] bounty is in the hand of Allah; He gives it to whom He wills. And Allah is the possessor of great bounty.

data.name: Quran5105
data.value: Certainly has Allah heard the speech of the one who argues with you, [O Muhammad], concerning her husband and directs her complaint to Allah. And Allah hears your dialogue; indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.

data.name: Quran5106
data.value: Those who pronounce thihar among you [to separate] from their wives - they are not [consequently] their mothers. Their mothers are none but those who gave birth to them. And indeed, they are saying an objectionable statement and a falsehood. But indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving.

data.name: Quran5107
data.value: And those who pronounce thihar from their wives and then [wish to] go back on what they said - then [there must be] the freeing of a slave before they touch one another. That is what you are admonished thereby; and Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

data.name: Quran5108
data.value: And he who does not find [a slave] - then a fast for two months consecutively before they touch one another; and he who is unable - then the feeding of sixty poor persons. That is for you to believe [completely] in Allah and His Messenger; and those are the limits [set by] Allah. And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran5109
data.value: Indeed, those who oppose Allah and His Messenger are abased as those before them were abased. And We have certainly sent down verses of clear evidence. And for the disbelievers is a humiliating punishment.

data.name: Quran5110
data.value: On the Day when Allah will resurrect them all and inform them of what they did. Allah had enumerated it, while they forgot it; and Allah is, over all things, Witness.

data.name: Quran5111
data.value: Have you not considered that Allah knows what is in the heavens and what is on the earth? There is in no private conversation three but that He is the fourth of them, nor are there five but that He is the sixth of them - and no less than that and no more except that He is with them [in knowledge] wherever they are. Then He will inform them of what they did, on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing.

data.name: Quran5112
data.value: Have you not considered those who were forbidden from private conversation, then they return to that which they were forbidden and converse among themselves about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger? And when they come to you, they greet you with that [word] by which Allah does not greet you and say among themselves, "Why does Allah not punish us for what we say?" Sufficient for them is Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the destination.

data.name: Quran5113
data.value: O you who have believed, when you converse privately, do not converse about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger but converse about righteousness and piety. And fear Allah, to whom you will be gathered.

data.name: Quran5114
data.value: Private conversation is only from Satan that he may grieve those who have believed, but he will not harm them at all except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely.

data.name: Quran5115
data.value: O you who have believed, when you are told, "Space yourselves" in assemblies, then make space; Allah will make space for you. And when you are told, "Arise," then arise; Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

data.name: Quran5116
data.value: O you who have believed, when you [wish to] privately consult the Messenger, present before your consultation a charity. That is better for you and purer. But if you find not [the means] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran5117
data.value: Have you feared to present before your consultation charities? Then when you do not and Allah has forgiven you, then [at least] establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

data.name: Quran5118
data.value: Have you not considered those who make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry? They are neither of you nor of them, and they swear to untruth while they know [they are lying].

data.name: Quran5119
data.value: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing.

data.name: Quran5120
data.value: They took their [false] oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah, and for them is a humiliating punishment.

data.name: Quran5121
data.value: Never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally

data.name: Quran5122
data.value: On the Day Allah will resurrect them all, and they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they are [standing] on something. Unquestionably, it is they who are the liars.

data.name: Quran5123
data.value: Satan has overcome them and made them forget the remembrance of Allah. Those are the party of Satan. Unquestionably, the party of Satan - they will be the losers.

data.name: Quran5124
data.value: Indeed, the ones who oppose Allah and His Messenger - those will be among the most humbled.

data.name: Quran5125
data.value: Allah has written, "I will surely overcome, I and My messengers." Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.

data.name: Quran5126
data.value: You will not find a people who believe in Allah and the Last Day having affection for those who oppose Allah and His Messenger, even if they were their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their kindred. Those - He has decreed within their hearts faith and supported them with spirit from Him. And We will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him - those are the party of Allah. Unquestionably, the party of Allah - they are the successful.

data.name: Quran5127
data.value: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran5128
data.value: It is He who expelled the ones who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture from their homes at the first gathering. You did not think they would leave, and they thought that their fortresses would protect them from Allah; but [the decree of] Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and He cast terror into their hearts [so] they destroyed their houses by their [own] hands and the hands of the believers. So take warning, O people of vision.

data.name: Quran5129
data.value: And if not that Allah had decreed for them evacuation, He would have punished them in [this] world, and for them in the Hereafter is the punishment of the Fire.

data.name: Quran5130
data.value: That is because they opposed Allah and His Messenger. And whoever opposes Allah - then indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.

data.name: Quran5131
data.value: Whatever you have cut down of [their] palm trees or left standing on their trunks - it was by permission of Allah and so He would disgrace the defiantly disobedient.

data.name: Quran5132
data.value: And what Allah restored [of property] to His Messenger from them - you did not spur for it [in an expedition] any horses or camels, but Allah gives His messengers power over whom He wills, and Allah is over all things competent.

data.name: Quran5133
data.value: And what Allah restored to His Messenger from the people of the towns - it is for Allah and for the Messenger and for [his] near relatives and orphans and the [stranded] traveler - so that it will not be a perpetual distribution among the rich from among you. And whatever the Messenger has given you - take; and what he has forbidden you - refrain from. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.

data.name: Quran5134
data.value: For the poor emigrants who were expelled from their homes and their properties, seeking bounty from Allah and [His] approval and supporting Allah and His Messenger, [there is also a share]. Those are the truthful.

data.name: Quran5135
data.value: And [also for] those who were settled in al-Madinah and [adopted] the faith before them. They love those who emigrated to them and find not any want in their breasts of what the emigrants were given but give [them] preference over themselves, even though they are in privation. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful.

data.name: Quran5136
data.value: And [there is a share for] those who came after them, saying, "Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith and put not in our hearts [any] resentment toward those who have believed. Our Lord, indeed You are Kind and Merciful."

data.name: Quran5137
data.value: Have you not considered those who practice hypocrisy, saying to their brothers who have disbelieved among the People of the Scripture, "If you are expelled, we will surely leave with you, and we will not obey, in regard to you, anyone - ever; and if you are fought, we will surely aid you." But Allah testifies that they are liars.

data.name: Quran5138
data.value: If they are expelled, they will not leave with them, and if they are fought, they will not aid them. And [even] if they should aid them, they will surely turn their backs; then [thereafter] they will not be aided.

data.name: Quran5139
data.value: You [believers] are more fearful within their breasts than Allah. That is because they are a people who do not understand.

data.name: Quran5140
data.value: They will not fight you all except within fortified cities or from behind walls. Their violence among themselves is severe. You think they are together, but their hearts are diverse. That is because they are a people who do not reason.

data.name: Quran5141
data.value: [Theirs is] like the example of those shortly before them: they tasted the bad consequence of their affair, and they will have a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran5142
data.value: [The hypocrites are] like the example of Satan when he says to man, "Disbelieve." But when he disbelieves, he says, "Indeed, I am disassociated from you. Indeed, I fear Allah, Lord of the worlds."

data.name: Quran5143
data.value: So the outcome for both of them is that they will be in the Fire, abiding eternally therein. And that is the recompense of the wrong-doers.

data.name: Quran5144
data.value: O you who have believed, fear Allah. And let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow - and fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

data.name: Quran5145
data.value: And be not like those who forgot Allah, so He made them forget themselves. Those are the defiantly disobedient.

data.name: Quran5146
data.value: Not equal are the companions of the Fire and the companions of Paradise. The companions of Paradise - they are the attainers [of success].

data.name: Quran5147
data.value: If We had sent down this Qur'an upon a mountain, you would have seen it humbled and coming apart from fear of Allah. And these examples We present to the people that perhaps they will give thought.

data.name: Quran5148
data.value: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed. He is the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

data.name: Quran5149
data.value: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection, the Bestower of Faith, the Overseer, the Exalted in Might, the Compeller, the Superior. Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.

data.name: Quran5150
