data.value: He is Allah, the Creator, the Inventor, the Fashioner; to Him belong the best names. Whatever is in the heavens and earth is exalting Him. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran5151
data.value: O you who have believed, do not take My enemies and your enemies as allies, extending to them affection while they have disbelieved in what came to you of the truth, having driven out the Prophet and yourselves [only] because you believe in Allah, your Lord. If you have come out for jihad in My cause and seeking means to My approval, [take them not as friends]. You confide to them affection, but I am most knowing of what you have concealed and what you have declared. And whoever does it among you has certainly strayed from the soundness of the way.

data.name: Quran5152
data.value: If they gain dominance over you, they would be to you as enemies and extend against you their hands and their tongues with evil, and they wish you would disbelieve.

data.name: Quran5153
data.value: Never will your relatives or your children benefit you; the Day of Resurrection He will judge between you. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing.

data.name: Quran5154
data.value: There has already been for you an excellent pattern in Abraham and those with him, when they said to their people, "Indeed, we are disassociated from you and from whatever you worship other than Allah. We have denied you, and there has appeared between us and you animosity and hatred forever until you believe in Allah alone" except for the saying of Abraham to his father, "I will surely ask forgiveness for you, but I have not [power to do] for you anything against Allah. Our Lord, upon You we have relied, and to You we have returned, and to You is the destination.

data.name: Quran5155
data.value: Our Lord, make us not [objects of] torment for the disbelievers and forgive us, our Lord. Indeed, it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise."

data.name: Quran5156
data.value: There has certainly been for you in them an excellent pattern for anyone whose hope is in Allah and the Last Day. And whoever turns away - then indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.

data.name: Quran5157
data.value: Perhaps Allah will put, between you and those to whom you have been enemies among them, affection. And Allah is competent, and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran5158
data.value: Allah does not forbid you from those who do not fight you because of religion and do not expel you from your homes - from being righteous toward them and acting justly toward them. Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly.

data.name: Quran5159
data.value: Allah only forbids you from those who fight you because of religion and expel you from your homes and aid in your expulsion - [forbids] that you make allies of them. And whoever makes allies of them, then it is those who are the wrongdoers.

data.name: Quran5160
data.value: O you who have believed, when the believing women come to you as emigrants, examine them. Allah is most knowing as to their faith. And if you know them to be believers, then do not return them to the disbelievers; they are not lawful [wives] for them, nor are they lawful [husbands] for them. But give the disbelievers what they have spent. And there is no blame upon you if you marry them when you have given them their due compensation. And hold not to marriage bonds with disbelieving women, but ask for what you have spent and let them ask for what they have spent. That is the judgement of Allah; He judges between you. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.

data.name: Quran5161
data.value: And if you have lost any of your wives to the disbelievers and you subsequently obtain [something], then give those whose wives have gone the equivalent of what they had spent. And fear Allah, in whom you are believers.

data.name: Quran5162
data.value: O Prophet, when the believing women come to you pledging to you that they will not associate anything with Allah, nor will they steal, nor will they commit unlawful sexual intercourse, nor will they kill their children, nor will they bring forth a slander they have invented between their arms and legs, nor will they disobey you in what is right - then accept their pledge and ask forgiveness for them of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran5163
data.value: O you who have believed, do not make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry. They have despaired of [reward in] the Hereafter just as the disbelievers have despaired of [meeting] the inhabitants of the graves.

data.name: Quran5164
data.value: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran5165
data.value: O you who have believed, why do you say what you do not do?

data.name: Quran5166
data.value: Great is hatred in the sight of Allah that you say what you do not do.

data.name: Quran5167
data.value: Indeed, Allah loves those who fight in His cause in a row as though they are a [single] structure joined firmly.

data.name: Quran5168
data.value: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Moses said to his people, "O my people, why do you harm me while you certainly know that I am the messenger of Allah to you?" And when they deviated, Allah caused their hearts to deviate. And Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people.

data.name: Quran5169
data.value: And [mention] when Jesus, the son of Mary, said, "O children of Israel, indeed I am the messenger of Allah to you confirming what came before me of the Torah and bringing good tidings of a messenger to come after me, whose name is Ahmad." But when he came to them with clear evidences, they said, "This is obvious magic."

data.name: Quran5170
data.value: And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah untruth while he is being invited to Islam. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

data.name: Quran5171
data.value: They want to extinguish the light of Allah with their mouths, but Allah will perfect His light, although the disbelievers dislike it.

data.name: Quran5172
data.value: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion, although those who associate others with Allah dislike it.

data.name: Quran5173
data.value: O you who have believed, shall I guide you to a transaction that will save you from a painful punishment?

data.name: Quran5174
data.value: [It is that] you believe in Allah and His Messenger and strive in the cause of Allah with your wealth and your lives. That is best for you, if you should know.

data.name: Quran5175
data.value: He will forgive for you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow and pleasant dwellings in gardens of perpetual residence. That is the great attainment.

data.name: Quran5176
data.value: And [you will obtain] another [favor] that you love - victory from Allah and an imminent conquest; and give good tidings to the believers.

data.name: Quran5177
data.value: O you who have believed, be supporters of Allah, as when Jesus, the son of Mary, said to the disciples, "Who are my supporters for Allah?" The disciples said, "We are supporters of Allah." And a faction of the Children of Israel believed and a faction disbelieved. So We supported those who believed against their enemy, and they became dominant.

data.name: Quran5178
data.value: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth is exalting Allah, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran5179
data.value: It is He who has sent among the unlettered a Messenger from themselves reciting to them His verses and purifying them and teaching them the Book and wisdom - although they were before in clear error -

data.name: Quran5180
data.value: And [to] others of them who have not yet joined them. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran5181
data.value: That is the bounty of Allah, which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.

data.name: Quran5182
data.value: The example of those who were entrusted with the Torah and then did not take it on is like that of a donkey who carries volumes [of books]. Wretched is the example of the people who deny the signs of Allah. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

data.name: Quran5183
data.value: Say, "O you who are Jews, if you claim that you are allies of Allah, excluding the [other] people, then wish for death, if you should be truthful."

data.name: Quran5184
data.value: But they will not wish for it, ever, because of what their hands have put forth. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers.

data.name: Quran5185
data.value: Say, "Indeed, the death from which you flee - indeed, it will meet you. Then you will be returned to the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, and He will inform you about what you used to do."

data.name: Quran5186
data.value: O you who have believed, when [the adhan] is called for the prayer on the day of Jumu'ah [Friday], then proceed to the remembrance of Allah and leave trade. That is better for you, if you only knew.

data.name: Quran5187
data.value: And when the prayer has been concluded, disperse within the land and seek from the bounty of Allah, and remember Allah often that you may succeed.

data.name: Quran5188
data.value: But when they saw a transaction or a diversion, [O Muhammad], they rushed to it and left you standing. Say, "What is with Allah is better than diversion and than a transaction, and Allah is the best of providers."

data.name: Quran5189
data.value: When the hypocrites come to you, [O Muhammad], they say, "We testify that you are the Messenger of Allah." And Allah knows that you are His Messenger, and Allah testifies that the hypocrites are liars.

data.name: Quran5190
data.value: They have taken their oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing.

data.name: Quran5191
data.value: That is because they believed, and then they disbelieved; so their hearts were sealed over, and they do not understand.

data.name: Quran5192
data.value: And when you see them, their forms please you, and if they speak, you listen to their speech. [They are] as if they were pieces of wood propped up - they think that every shout is against them. They are the enemy, so beware of them. May Allah destroy them; how are they deluded?

data.name: Quran5193
data.value: And when it is said to them, "Come, the Messenger of Allah will ask forgiveness for you," they turn their heads aside and you see them evading while they are arrogant.

data.name: Quran5194
data.value: It is all the same for them whether you ask forgiveness for them or do not ask forgiveness for them; never will Allah forgive them. Indeed, Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people.

data.name: Quran5195
data.value: They are the ones who say, "Do not spend on those who are with the Messenger of Allah until they disband." And to Allah belongs the depositories of the heavens and the earth, but the hypocrites do not understand.

data.name: Quran5196
data.value: They say, "If we return to al-Madinah, the more honored [for power] will surely expel therefrom the more humble." And to Allah belongs [all] honor, and to His Messenger, and to the believers, but the hypocrites do not know.

data.name: Quran5197
data.value: O you who have believed, let not your wealth and your children divert you from remembrance of Allah. And whoever does that - then those are the losers.

data.name: Quran5198
data.value: And spend [in the way of Allah] from what We have provided you before death approaches one of you and he says, "My Lord, if only You would delay me for a brief term so I would give charity and be among the righteous."

data.name: Quran5199
data.value: But never will Allah delay a soul when its time has come. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

data.name: Quran5200
data.value: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth is exalting Allah. To Him belongs dominion, and to Him belongs [all] praise, and He is over all things competent.

data.name: Quran5201
data.value: It is He who created you, and among you is the disbeliever, and among you is the believer. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing.

data.name: Quran5202
data.value: He created the heavens and earth in truth and formed you and perfected your forms; and to Him is the [final] destination.

data.name: Quran5203
data.value: He knows what is within the heavens and earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare. And Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts.

data.name: Quran5204
data.value: Has there not come to you the news of those who disbelieved before? So they tasted the bad consequence of their affair, and they will have a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran5205
data.value: That is because their messengers used to come to them with clear evidences, but they said, "Shall human beings guide us?" and disbelieved and turned away. And Allah dispensed [with them]; and Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy.

data.name: Quran5206
data.value: Those who disbelieve have claimed that they will never be resurrected. Say, "Yes, by my Lord, you will surely be resurrected; then you will surely be informed of what you did. And that, for Allah, is easy."

data.name: Quran5207
data.value: So believe in Allah and His Messenger and the Qur'an which We have sent down. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

data.name: Quran5208
data.value: The Day He will assemble you for the Day of Assembly - that is the Day of Deprivation. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will remove from him his misdeeds and admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. That is the great attainment.

data.name: Quran5209
data.value: But the ones who disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of the Fire, abiding eternally therein; and wretched is the destination.

data.name: Quran5210
data.value: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah. And whoever believes in Allah - He will guide his heart. And Allah is Knowing of all things.

data.name: Quran5211
data.value: And obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon Our Messenger is only [the duty of] clear notification.

data.name: Quran5212
data.value: Allah - there is no deity except Him. And upon Allah let the believers rely.

data.name: Quran5213
data.value: O you who have believed, indeed, among your wives and your children are enemies to you, so beware of them. But if you pardon and overlook and forgive - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran5214
data.value: Your wealth and your children are but a trial, and Allah has with Him a great reward.

data.name: Quran5215
data.value: So fear Allah as much as you are able and listen and obey and spend [in the way of Allah]; it is better for your selves. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful.

data.name: Quran5216
data.value: If you loan Allah a goodly loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you. And Allah is Most Appreciative and Forbearing.

data.name: Quran5217
data.value: Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.name: Quran5218
data.value: O Prophet, when you [Muslims] divorce women, divorce them for [the commencement of] their waiting period and keep count of the waiting period, and fear Allah, your Lord. Do not turn them out of their [husbands'] houses, nor should they [themselves] leave [during that period] unless they are committing a clear immorality. And those are the limits [set by] Allah. And whoever transgresses the limits of Allah has certainly wronged himself. You know not; perhaps Allah will bring about after that a [different] matter.

data.name: Quran5219
data.value: And when they have [nearly] fulfilled their term, either retain them according to acceptable terms or part with them according to acceptable terms. And bring to witness two just men from among you and establish the testimony for [the acceptance of] Allah. That is instructed to whoever should believe in Allah and the Last day. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out

data.name: Quran5220
data.value: And will provide for him from where he does not expect. And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him. Indeed, Allah will accomplish His purpose. Allah has already set for everything a [decreed] extent.

data.name: Quran5221
data.value: And those who no longer expect menstruation among your women - if you doubt, then their period is three months, and [also for] those who have not menstruated. And for those who are pregnant, their term is until they give birth. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him of his matter ease.

data.name: Quran5222
data.value: That is the command of Allah, which He has sent down to you; and whoever fears Allah - He will remove for him his misdeeds and make great for him his reward.

data.name: Quran5223
data.value: Lodge them [in a section] of where you dwell out of your means and do not harm them in order to oppress them. And if they should be pregnant, then spend on them until they give birth. And if they breastfeed for you, then give them their payment and confer among yourselves in the acceptable way; but if you are in discord, then there may breastfeed for the father another woman.

data.name: Quran5224
data.value: Let a man of wealth spend from his wealth, and he whose provision is restricted - let him spend from what Allah has given him. Allah does not charge a soul except [according to] what He has given it. Allah will bring about, after hardship, ease.

data.name: Quran5225
data.value: And how many a city was insolent toward the command of its Lord and His messengers, so We took it to severe account and punished it with a terrible punishment.

data.name: Quran5226
data.value: And it tasted the bad consequence of its affair, and the outcome of its affair was loss.

data.name: Quran5227
data.value: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment; so fear Allah, O you of understanding who have believed. Allah has sent down to you the Qur'an.

data.name: Quran5228
data.value: [He sent] a Messenger [Muhammad] reciting to you the distinct verses of Allah that He may bring out those who believe and do righteous deeds from darknesses into the light. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will admit him into gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein forever. Allah will have perfected for him a provision.

data.name: Quran5229
data.value: It is Allah who has created seven heavens and of the earth, the like of them. [His] command descends among them so you may know that Allah is over all things competent and that Allah has encompassed all things in knowledge.

data.name: Quran5230
data.value: O Prophet, why do you prohibit [yourself from] what Allah has made lawful for you, seeking the approval of your wives? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran5231
data.value: Allah has already ordained for you [Muslims] the dissolution of your oaths. And Allah is your protector, and He is the Knowing, the Wise.

data.name: Quran5232
data.value: And [remember] when the Prophet confided to one of his wives a statement; and when she informed [another] of it and Allah showed it to him, he made known part of it and ignored a part. And when he informed her about it, she said, "Who told you this?" He said, "I was informed by the Knowing, the Acquainted."

data.name: Quran5233
data.value: If you two [wives] repent to Allah, [it is best], for your hearts have deviated. But if you cooperate against him - then indeed Allah is his protector, and Gabriel and the righteous of the believers and the angels, moreover, are [his] assistants.

data.name: Quran5234
data.value: Perhaps his Lord, if he divorced you [all], would substitute for him wives better than you - submitting [to Allah], believing, devoutly obedient, repentant, worshipping, and traveling - [ones] previously married and virgins.

data.name: Quran5235
data.value: O you who have believed, protect yourselves and your families from a Fire whose fuel is people and stones, over which are [appointed] angels, harsh and severe; they do not disobey Allah in what He commands them but do what they are commanded.

data.name: Quran5236
data.value: O you who have disbelieved, make no excuses that Day. You will only be recompensed for what you used to do.

data.name: Quran5237
data.value: O you who have believed, repent to Allah with sincere repentance. Perhaps your Lord will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you into gardens beneath which rivers flow [on] the Day when Allah will not disgrace the Prophet and those who believed with him. Their light will proceed before them and on their right; they will say, "Our Lord, perfect for us our light and forgive us. Indeed, You are over all things competent."

data.name: Quran5238
data.value: O Prophet, strive against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be harsh upon them. And their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the destination.

data.name: Quran5239
data.value: Allah presents an example of those who disbelieved: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. They were under two of Our righteous servants but betrayed them, so those prophets did not avail them from Allah at all, and it was said, "Enter the Fire with those who enter."

data.name: Quran5240
data.value: And Allah presents an example of those who believed: the wife of Pharaoh, when she said, "My Lord, build for me near You a house in Paradise and save me from Pharaoh and his deeds and save me from the wrongdoing people."

data.name: Quran5241
data.value: And [the example of] Mary, the daughter of 'Imran, who guarded her chastity, so We blew into [her garment] through Our angel, and she believed in the words of her Lord and His scriptures and was of the devoutly obedient.

data.name: Quran5242
data.value: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent -

data.name: Quran5243
data.value: [He] who created death and life to test you [as to] which of you is best in deed - and He is the Exalted in Might, the Forgiving -

data.name: Quran5244
data.value: [And] who created seven heavens in layers. You do not see in the creation of the Most Merciful any inconsistency. So return [your] vision [to the sky]; do you see any breaks?

data.name: Quran5245
data.value: Then return [your] vision twice again. [Your] vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued.

data.name: Quran5246
data.value: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made [from] them what is thrown at the devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze.

data.name: Quran5247
data.value: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord is the punishment of Hell, and wretched is the destination.

data.name: Quran5248
data.value: When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up.

data.name: Quran5249
data.value: It almost bursts with rage. Every time a company is thrown into it, its keepers ask them, "Did there not come to you a warner?"

data.name: Quran5250
data.value: They will say," Yes, a warner had come to us, but we denied and said, 'Allah has not sent down anything. You are not but in great error.'"

data.name: Quran5251
data.value: And they will say, "If only we had been listening or reasoning, we would not be among the companions of the Blaze."

data.name: Quran5252
data.value: And they will admit their sin, so [it is] alienation for the companions of the Blaze.

data.name: Quran5253
data.value: Indeed, those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and great reward.

data.name: Quran5254
data.value: And conceal your speech or publicize it; indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

data.name: Quran5255
data.value: Does He who created not know, while He is the Subtle, the Acquainted?

data.name: Quran5256
data.value: It is He who made the earth tame for you - so walk among its slopes and eat of His provision - and to Him is the resurrection.

data.name: Quran5257
data.value: Do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway?

data.name: Quran5258
data.value: Or do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not send against you a storm of stones? Then you would know how [severe] was My warning.

data.name: Quran5259
data.value: And already had those before them denied, and how [terrible] was My reproach.

data.name: Quran5260
data.value: Do they not see the birds above them with wings outspread and [sometimes] folded in? None holds them [aloft] except the Most Merciful. Indeed He is, of all things, Seeing.

data.name: Quran5261
data.value: Or who is it that could be an army for you to aid you other than the Most Merciful? The disbelievers are not but in delusion.

data.name: Quran5262
data.value: Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision? But they have persisted in insolence and aversion.

data.name: Quran5263
data.value: Then is one who walks fallen on his face better guided or one who walks erect on a straight path?

data.name: Quran5264
data.value: Say, "It is He who has produced you and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful."

data.name: Quran5265
data.value: Say, "It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered."

data.name: Quran5266
data.value: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

data.name: Quran5267
data.value: Say, "The knowledge is only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner."

data.name: Quran5268
data.value: But when they see it approaching, the faces of those who disbelieve will be distressed, and it will be said, "This is that for which you used to call."

data.name: Quran5269
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "Have you considered: whether Allah should cause my death and those with me or have mercy upon us, who can protect the disbelievers from a painful punishment?"

data.name: Quran5270
data.value: Say, "He is the Most Merciful; we have believed in Him, and upon Him we have relied. And you will [come to] know who it is that is in clear error."

data.name: Quran5271
data.value: Say, "Have you considered: if your water was to become sunken [into the earth], then who could bring you flowing water?"

data.name: Quran5272
data.value: Nun. By the pen and what they inscribe,

data.name: Quran5273
data.value: You are not, [O Muhammad], by the favor of your Lord, a madman.

data.name: Quran5274
data.value: And indeed, for you is a reward uninterrupted.

data.name: Quran5275
data.value: And indeed, you are of a great moral character.

data.name: Quran5276
data.value: So you will see and they will see

data.name: Quran5277
data.value: Which of you is the afflicted [by a devil].

data.name: Quran5278
data.value: Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has gone astray from His way, and He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided.

data.name: Quran5279
data.value: Then do not obey the deniers.

data.name: Quran5280
data.value: They wish that you would soften [in your position], so they would soften [toward you].

data.name: Quran5281
data.value: And do not obey every worthless habitual swearer

data.name: Quran5282
data.value: [And] scorner, going about with malicious gossip -

data.name: Quran5283
data.value: A preventer of good, transgressing and sinful,

data.name: Quran5284
data.value: Cruel, moreover, and an illegitimate pretender.

data.name: Quran5285
data.value: Because he is a possessor of wealth and children,

data.name: Quran5286
data.value: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

data.name: Quran5287
data.value: We will brand him upon the snout.

data.name: Quran5288
data.value: Indeed, We have tried them as We tried the companions of the garden, when they swore to cut its fruit in the [early] morning

data.name: Quran5289
data.value: Without making exception.

data.name: Quran5290
data.value: So there came upon the garden an affliction from your Lord while they were asleep.

data.name: Quran5291
data.value: And it became as though reaped.

data.name: Quran5292
data.value: And they called one another at morning,

data.name: Quran5293
data.value: [Saying], "Go early to your crop if you would cut the fruit."

data.name: Quran5294
data.value: So they set out, while lowering their voices,

data.name: Quran5295
data.value: [Saying], "There will surely not enter it today upon you [any] poor person."

data.name: Quran5296
data.value: And they went early in determination, [assuming themselves] able.

data.name: Quran5297
data.value: But when they saw it, they said, "Indeed, we are lost;

data.name: Quran5298
data.value: Rather, we have been deprived."

data.name: Quran5299
data.value: The most moderate of them said, "Did I not say to you, 'Why do you not exalt [Allah]?' "

data.name: Quran5300
data.value: They said, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."

data.name: Quran5301
data.value: Then they approached one another, blaming each other.

data.name: Quran5302
data.value: They said, "O woe to us; indeed we were transgressors.

data.name: Quran5303
data.value: Perhaps our Lord will substitute for us [one] better than it. Indeed, we are toward our Lord desirous."

data.name: Quran5304
data.value: Such is the punishment [of this world]. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.

data.name: Quran5305
data.value: Indeed, for the righteous with their Lord are the Gardens of Pleasure.

data.name: Quran5306
data.value: Then will We treat the Muslims like the criminals?

data.name: Quran5307
data.value: What is [the matter] with you? How do you judge?

data.name: Quran5308
data.value: Or do you have a scripture in which you learn

data.name: Quran5309
data.value: That indeed for you is whatever you choose?

data.name: Quran5310
data.value: Or do you have oaths [binding] upon Us, extending until the Day of Resurrection, that indeed for you is whatever you judge?

data.name: Quran5311
data.value: Ask them which of them, for that [claim], is responsible.

data.name: Quran5312
data.value: Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners, if they should be truthful.

data.name: Quran5313
data.value: The Day the shin will be uncovered and they are invited to prostration but the disbelievers will not be able,

data.name: Quran5314
data.value: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. And they used to be invited to prostration while they were sound.

data.name: Quran5315
data.value: So leave Me, [O Muhammad], with [the matter of] whoever denies the Qur'an. We will progressively lead them [to punishment] from where they do not know.

data.name: Quran5316
data.value: And I will give them time. Indeed, My plan is firm.

data.name: Quran5317
data.value: Or do you ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

data.name: Quran5318
data.value: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

data.name: Quran5319
data.value: Then be patient for the decision of your Lord, [O Muhammad], and be not like the companion of the fish when he called out while he was distressed.

data.name: Quran5320
data.value: If not that a favor from his Lord overtook him, he would have been thrown onto the naked shore while he was censured.

data.name: Quran5321
data.value: And his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous.

data.name: Quran5322
data.value: And indeed, those who disbelieve would almost make you slip with their eyes when they hear the message, and they say, "Indeed, he is mad."

data.name: Quran5323
data.value: But it is not except a reminder to the worlds.

data.name: Quran5324
data.value: The Inevitable Reality -

data.name: Quran5325
data.value: What is the Inevitable Reality?

data.name: Quran5326
data.value: And what can make you know what is the Inevitable Reality?

data.name: Quran5327
data.value: Thamud and 'Aad denied the Striking Calamity.

data.name: Quran5328
data.value: So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering [blast].

data.name: Quran5329
data.value: And as for 'Aad, they were destroyed by a screaming, violent wind

data.name: Quran5330
data.value: Which Allah imposed upon them for seven nights and eight days in succession, so you would see the people therein fallen as if they were hollow trunks of palm trees.

data.name: Quran5331
data.value: Then do you see of them any remains?

data.name: Quran5332
data.value: And there came Pharaoh and those before him and the overturned cities with sin.

data.name: Quran5333
data.value: And they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a seizure exceeding [in severity].

data.name: Quran5334
data.value: Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship

data.name: Quran5335
data.value: That We might make it for you a reminder and [that] a conscious ear would be conscious of it.

data.name: Quran5336
data.value: Then when the Horn is blown with one blast

data.name: Quran5337
data.value: And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow -

data.name: Quran5338
data.value: Then on that Day, the Resurrection will occur,

data.name: Quran5339
data.value: And the heaven will split [open], for that Day it is infirm.

data.name: Quran5340
data.value: And the angels are at its edges. And there will bear the Throne of your Lord above them, that Day, eight [of them].

data.name: Quran5341
data.value: That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement]; not hidden among you is anything concealed.

data.name: Quran5342
data.value: So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record!

data.name: Quran5343
data.value: Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account."

data.name: Quran5344
data.value: So he will be in a pleasant life -

data.name: Quran5345
data.value: In an elevated garden,

data.name: Quran5346
data.value: Its [fruit] to be picked hanging near.

data.name: Quran5347
data.value: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you put forth in the days past."

data.name: Quran5348
data.value: But as for he who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "Oh, I wish I had not been given my record

data.name: Quran5349
data.value: And had not known what is my account.

data.name: Quran5350
data.value: I wish my death had been the decisive one.

data.name: Quran5351
data.value: My wealth has not availed me.

data.name: Quran5352
data.value: Gone from me is my authority."

data.name: Quran5353
data.value: [Allah will say], "Seize him and shackle him.

data.name: Quran5354
data.value: Then into Hellfire drive him.

data.name: Quran5355
data.value: Then into a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him."

data.name: Quran5356
data.value: Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great,

data.name: Quran5357
data.value: Nor did he encourage the feeding of the poor.

data.name: Quran5358
data.value: So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend

data.name: Quran5359
data.value: Nor any food except from the discharge of wounds;

data.name: Quran5360
data.value: None will eat it except the sinners.

data.name: Quran5361
data.value: So I swear by what you see

data.name: Quran5362
data.value: And what you do not see

data.name: Quran5363
data.value: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is the word of a noble Messenger.

data.name: Quran5364
data.value: And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe.

data.name: Quran5365
data.value: Nor the word of a soothsayer; little do you remember.

data.name: Quran5366
data.value: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran5367
data.value: And if Muhammad had made up about Us some [false] sayings,

data.name: Quran5368
data.value: We would have seized him by the right hand;

data.name: Quran5369
data.value: Then We would have cut from him the aorta.

data.name: Quran5370
data.value: And there is no one of you who could prevent [Us] from him.

data.name: Quran5371
data.value: And indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder for the righteous.

data.name: Quran5372
data.value: And indeed, We know that among you are deniers.

data.name: Quran5373
data.value: And indeed, it will be [a cause of] regret upon the disbelievers.

data.name: Quran5374
data.value: And indeed, it is the truth of certainty.

data.name: Quran5375
data.value: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

data.name: Quran5376
data.value: A supplicant asked for a punishment bound to happen

data.name: Quran5377
data.value: To the disbelievers; of it there is no preventer.

data.name: Quran5378
data.value: [It is] from Allah, owner of the ways of ascent.

data.name: Quran5379
data.value: The angels and the Spirit will ascend to Him during a Day the extent of which is fifty thousand years.

data.name: Quran5380
data.value: So be patient with gracious patience.

data.name: Quran5381
data.value: Indeed, they see it [as] distant,

data.name: Quran5382
data.value: But We see it [as] near.

data.name: Quran5383
data.value: On the Day the sky will be like murky oil,

data.name: Quran5384
data.value: And the mountains will be like wool,

data.name: Quran5385
data.value: And no friend will ask [anything of] a friend,

data.name: Quran5386
data.value: They will be shown each other. The criminal will wish that he could be ransomed from the punishment of that Day by his children

data.name: Quran5387
data.value: And his wife and his brother

data.name: Quran5388
data.value: And his nearest kindred who shelter him

data.name: Quran5389
data.value: And whoever is on earth entirely [so] then it could save him.

data.name: Quran5390
data.value: No! Indeed, it is the Flame [of Hell],

data.name: Quran5391
data.value: A remover of exteriors.

data.name: Quran5392
data.value: It invites he who turned his back [on truth] and went away [from obedience]

data.name: Quran5393
data.value: And collected [wealth] and hoarded.

data.name: Quran5394
data.value: Indeed, mankind was created anxious:

data.name: Quran5395
data.value: When evil touches him, impatient,

data.name: Quran5396
data.value: And when good touches him, withholding [of it],

data.name: Quran5397
data.value: Except the observers of prayer -

data.name: Quran5398
data.value: Those who are constant in their prayer

data.name: Quran5399
data.value: And those within whose wealth is a known right

data.name: Quran5400
data.value: For the petitioner and the deprived -

data.name: Quran5401
data.value: And those who believe in the Day of Recompense

data.name: Quran5402
data.value: And those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord -

data.name: Quran5403
data.value: Indeed, the punishment of their Lord is not that from which one is safe -

data.name: Quran5404
data.value: And those who guard their private parts

data.name: Quran5405
data.value: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they are not to be blamed -

data.name: Quran5406
data.value: But whoever seeks beyond that, then they are the transgressors -

data.name: Quran5407
data.value: And those who are to their trusts and promises attentive

data.name: Quran5408
data.value: And those who are in their testimonies upright

data.name: Quran5409
data.value: And those who [carefully] maintain their prayer:

data.name: Quran5410
data.value: They will be in gardens, honored.

data.name: Quran5411
data.value: So what is [the matter] with those who disbelieve, hastening [from] before you, [O Muhammad],

data.name: Quran5412
data.value: [To sit] on [your] right and [your] left in separate groups?

data.name: Quran5413
data.value: Does every person among them aspire to enter a garden of pleasure?

data.name: Quran5414
data.value: No! Indeed, We have created them from that which they know.

data.name: Quran5415
data.value: So I swear by the Lord of [all] risings and settings that indeed We are able

data.name: Quran5416
data.value: To replace them with better than them; and We are not to be outdone.

data.name: Quran5417
data.value: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised -

data.name: Quran5418
data.value: The Day they will emerge from the graves rapidly as if they were, toward an erected idol, hastening.

data.name: Quran5419
data.value: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. That is the Day which they had been promised.

data.name: Quran5420
data.value: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment."

data.name: Quran5421
data.value: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner,

data.name: Quran5422
data.value: [Saying], 'Worship Allah, fear Him and obey me.

data.name: Quran5423
data.value: Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allah, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew.' "

data.name: Quran5424
data.value: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.

data.name: Quran5425
data.value: But my invitation increased them not except in flight.

data.name: Quran5426
data.value: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.

data.name: Quran5427
data.value: Then I invited them publicly.

data.name: Quran5428
data.value: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly

data.name: Quran5429
data.value: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.

data.name: Quran5430
data.value: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

data.name: Quran5431
data.value: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.

data.name: Quran5432
data.value: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur

data.name: Quran5433
data.value: While He has created you in stages?

data.name: Quran5434
data.value: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers

data.name: Quran5435
data.value: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?

data.name: Quran5436
data.value: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.

data.name: Quran5437
data.value: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.

data.name: Quran5438
data.value: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse

data.name: Quran5439
data.value: That you may follow therein roads of passage.' "

data.name: Quran5440
data.value: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.

data.name: Quran5441
data.value: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.

data.name: Quran5442
data.value: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr.

data.name: Quran5443
data.value: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."

data.name: Quran5444
data.value: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers.

data.name: Quran5445
data.value: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.

data.name: Quran5446
data.value: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.

data.name: Quran5447
data.value: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."

data.name: Quran5448
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an.

data.name: Quran5449
data.value: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone.

data.name: Quran5450
data.value: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son

data.name: Quran5451
data.value: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression.

data.name: Quran5452
data.value: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie.

data.name: Quran5453
data.value: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden.

data.name: Quran5454
data.value: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone [as a messenger].

data.name: Quran5455
data.value: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.

data.name: Quran5456
data.value: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him.

data.name: Quran5457
data.value: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.

data.name: Quran5458
data.value: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways.

data.name: Quran5459
data.value: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight.

data.name: Quran5460
data.value: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden.

data.name: Quran5461
data.value: And among us are Muslims [in submission to Allah], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course.

data.name: Quran5462
data.value: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood.'

data.name: Quran5463
data.value: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision

data.name: Quran5464
data.value: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment.

data.name: Quran5465
data.value: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone.

data.name: Quran5466
data.value: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass."

data.name: Quran5467
data.value: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."

data.name: Quran5468
data.value: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."

data.name: Quran5469
data.value: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.

data.name: Quran5470
data.value: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever.

data.name: Quran5471
data.value: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number.

data.name: Quran5472
data.value: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."

data.name: Quran5473
data.value: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone

data.name: Quran5474
data.value: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers

data.name: Quran5475
data.value: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.

data.name: Quran5476
data.value: O you who wraps himself [in clothing],

data.name: Quran5477
data.value: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little -

data.name: Quran5478
data.value: Half of it - or subtract from it a little

data.name: Quran5479
data.value: Or add to it, and recite the Qur'an with measured recitation.

data.name: Quran5480
data.value: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word.

data.name: Quran5481
data.value: Indeed, the hours of the night are more effective for concurrence [of heart and tongue] and more suitable for words.

data.name: Quran5482
data.value: Indeed, for you by day is prolonged occupation.

data.name: Quran5483
data.value: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion.

data.name: Quran5484
data.value: [He is] the Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of [your] affairs.

data.name: Quran5485
data.value: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance.

data.name: Quran5486
data.value: And leave Me with [the matter of] the deniers, those of ease [in life], and allow them respite a little.

data.name: Quran5487
data.value: Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire

data.name: Quran5488
data.value: And food that chokes and a painful punishment -

data.name: Quran5489
data.value: On the Day the earth and the mountains will convulse and the mountains will become a heap of sand pouring down.

data.name: Quran5490
data.value: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.

data.name: Quran5491
data.value: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure.

data.name: Quran5492
data.value: Then how can you fear, if you disbelieve, a Day that will make the children white- haired?

data.name: Quran5493
data.value: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled.

data.name: Quran5494
data.value: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way.

data.name: Quran5495
data.value: Indeed, your Lord knows, [O Muhammad], that you stand [in prayer] almost two thirds of the night or half of it or a third of it, and [so do] a group of those with you. And Allah determines [the extent of] the night and the day. He has known that you [Muslims] will not be able to do it and has turned to you in forgiveness, so recite what is easy [for you] of the Qur'an. He has known that there will be among you those who are ill and others traveling throughout the land seeking [something] of the bounty of Allah and others fighting for the cause of Allah. So recite what is easy from it and establish prayer and give zakah and loan Allah a goodly loan. And whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allah. It is better and greater in reward. And seek forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

data.name: Quran5496
data.value: O you who covers himself [with a garment],

data.name: Quran5497
data.value: Arise and warn

data.name: Quran5498
data.value: And your Lord glorify

data.name: Quran5499
data.value: And your clothing purify

data.name: Quran5500
data.value: And uncleanliness avoid

data.name: Quran5501
data.value: And do not confer favor to acquire more

data.name: Quran5502
data.value: But for your Lord be patient.

data.name: Quran5503
data.value: And when the trumpet is blown,

data.name: Quran5504
data.value: That Day will be a difficult day

data.name: Quran5505
data.value: For the disbelievers - not easy.

data.name: Quran5506
data.value: Leave Me with the one I created alone

data.name: Quran5507
data.value: And to whom I granted extensive wealth

data.name: Quran5508
data.value: And children present [with him]

data.name: Quran5509
data.value: And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life].

data.name: Quran5510
data.value: Then he desires that I should add more.

data.name: Quran5511
data.value: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate.

data.name: Quran5512
data.value: I will cover him with arduous torment.

data.name: Quran5513
data.value: Indeed, he thought and deliberated.

data.name: Quran5514
data.value: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.

data.name: Quran5515
data.value: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.

data.name: Quran5516
data.value: Then he considered [again];

data.name: Quran5517
data.value: Then he frowned and scowled;

data.name: Quran5518
data.value: Then he turned back and was arrogant

data.name: Quran5519
data.value: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].

data.name: Quran5520
data.value: This is not but the word of a human being."

data.name: Quran5521
data.value: I will drive him into Saqar.

data.name: Quran5522
data.value: And what can make you know what is Saqar?

data.name: Quran5523
data.value: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned],

data.name: Quran5524
data.value: Blackening the skins.

data.name: Quran5525
data.value: Over it are nineteen [angels].

data.name: Quran5526
data.value: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity.

data.name: Quran5527
data.value: No! By the moon

data.name: Quran5528
data.value: And [by] the night when it departs

data.name: Quran5529
data.value: And [by] the morning when it brightens,

data.name: Quran5530
data.value: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]

data.name: Quran5531
data.value: As a warning to humanity -

data.name: Quran5532
data.value: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind.

data.name: Quran5533
data.value: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained

data.name: Quran5534
data.value: Except the companions of the right,

data.name: Quran5535
data.value: [Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other

data.name: Quran5536
data.value: About the criminals,

data.name: Quran5537
data.value: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar?"

data.name: Quran5538
data.value: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,

data.name: Quran5539
data.value: Nor did we used to feed the poor.

data.name: Quran5540
data.value: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],

data.name: Quran5541
data.value: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense

data.name: Quran5542
data.value: Until there came to us the certainty."

data.name: Quran5543
data.value: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.

data.name: Quran5544
data.value: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away

data.name: Quran5545
data.value: As if they were alarmed donkeys

data.name: Quran5546
data.value: Fleeing from a lion?

data.name: Quran5547
data.value: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.

data.name: Quran5548
data.value: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.

data.name: Quran5549
data.value: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder

data.name: Quran5550
data.value: Then whoever wills will remember it.

data.name: Quran5551
data.value: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness.

data.name: Quran5552
data.value: I swear by the Day of Resurrection

data.name: Quran5553
data.value: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection].

data.name: Quran5554
data.value: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones?

data.name: Quran5555
data.value: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips.

data.name: Quran5556
data.value: But man desires to continue in sin.

data.name: Quran5557
data.value: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"

data.name: Quran5558
data.value: So when vision is dazzled

data.name: Quran5559
data.value: And the moon darkens

data.name: Quran5560
data.value: And the sun and the moon are joined,

data.name: Quran5561
data.value: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape?"

data.name: Quran5562
data.value: No! There is no refuge.

data.name: Quran5563
data.value: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence.

data.name: Quran5564
data.value: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back.

data.name: Quran5565
data.value: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness,

data.name: Quran5566
data.value: Even if he presents his excuses.

data.name: Quran5567
data.value: Move not your tongue with it, [O Muhammad], to hasten with recitation of the Qur'an.

data.name: Quran5568
data.value: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation.

data.name: Quran5569
data.value: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation.

data.name: Quran5570
data.value: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you].

data.name: Quran5571
data.value: No! But you love the immediate

data.name: Quran5572
data.value: And leave the Hereafter.

data.name: Quran5573
data.value: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant,

data.name: Quran5574
data.value: Looking at their Lord.

data.name: Quran5575
data.value: And [some] faces, that Day, will be contorted,

data.name: Quran5576
data.value: Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking.

data.name: Quran5577
data.value: No! When the soul has reached the collar bones

data.name: Quran5578
data.value: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]?"

data.name: Quran5579
data.value: And the dying one is certain that it is the [time of] separation

data.name: Quran5580
data.value: And the leg is wound about the leg,

data.name: Quran5581
data.value: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession.

data.name: Quran5582
data.value: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed.

data.name: Quran5583
data.value: But [instead], he denied and turned away.

data.name: Quran5584
data.value: And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride].

data.name: Quran5585
data.value: Woe to you, and woe!

data.name: Quran5586
data.value: Then woe to you, and woe!

data.name: Quran5587
data.value: Does man think that he will be left neglected?

data.name: Quran5588
data.value: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted?

data.name: Quran5589
data.value: Then he was a clinging clot, and [Allah] created [his form] and proportioned [him]

data.name: Quran5590
data.value: And made of him two mates, the male and the female.

data.name: Quran5591
data.value: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead?

data.name: Quran5592
data.value: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?

data.name: Quran5593
data.value: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.

data.name: Quran5594
data.value: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.

data.name: Quran5595
data.value: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.

data.name: Quran5596
data.value: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur,

data.name: Quran5597
data.value: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].

data.name: Quran5598
data.value: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.

data.name: Quran5599
data.value: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,

data.name: Quran5600
data.value: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.

data.name: Quran5601
data.value: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."

data.name: Quran5602
data.value: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness

data.name: Quran5603
data.value: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].

data.name: Quran5604
data.value: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold.

data.name: Quran5605
data.value: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.

data.name: Quran5606
data.value: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],

data.name: Quran5607
data.value: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure.

data.name: Quran5608
data.value: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger

data.name: Quran5609
data.value: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel.

data.name: Quran5610
data.value: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.

data.name: Quran5611
data.value: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.

data.name: Quran5612
data.value: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.

data.name: Quran5613
data.value: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."

data.name: Quran5614
data.value: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.

data.name: Quran5615
data.value: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].

data.name: Quran5616
data.value: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening

data.name: Quran5617
data.value: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night.

data.name: Quran5618
data.value: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day.

data.name: Quran5619
data.value: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.

data.name: Quran5620
data.value: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.

data.name: Quran5621
data.value: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.

data.name: Quran5622
data.value: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.

data.name: Quran5623
data.value: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts

data.name: Quran5624
data.value: And the winds that blow violently

data.name: Quran5625
data.value: And [by] the winds that spread [clouds]

data.name: Quran5626
data.value: And those [angels] who bring criterion

data.name: Quran5627
data.value: And those [angels] who deliver a message

data.name: Quran5628
data.value: As justification or warning,

data.name: Quran5629
data.value: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.

data.name: Quran5630
data.value: So when the stars are obliterated

data.name: Quran5631
data.value: And when the heaven is opened

data.name: Quran5632
data.value: And when the mountains are blown away

data.name: Quran5633
data.value: And when the messengers' time has come...

data.name: Quran5634
data.value: For what Day was it postponed?

data.name: Quran5635
data.value: For the Day of Judgement.

data.name: Quran5636
data.value: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement?

data.name: Quran5637
data.value: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

data.name: Quran5638
data.value: Did We not destroy the former peoples?

data.name: Quran5639
data.value: Then We will follow them with the later ones.

data.name: Quran5640
data.value: Thus do We deal with the criminals.

data.name: Quran5641
data.value: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

data.name: Quran5642
data.value: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained?

data.name: Quran5643
data.value: And We placed it in a firm lodging

data.name: Quran5644
data.value: For a known extent.

data.name: Quran5645
data.value: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine.

data.name: Quran5646
data.value: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

data.name: Quran5647
data.value: Have We not made the earth a container

data.name: Quran5648
data.value: Of the living and the dead?

data.name: Quran5649
data.value: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water.

data.name: Quran5650
data.value: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

data.name: Quran5651
data.value: [They will be told], "Proceed to that which you used to deny.

data.name: Quran5652
data.value: Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns

data.name: Quran5653
data.value: [But having] no cool shade and availing not against the flame."

data.name: Quran5654
data.value: Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress,

data.name: Quran5655
data.value: As if they were yellowish [black] camels.

data.name: Quran5656
data.value: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

data.name: Quran5657
data.value: This is a Day they will not speak,

data.name: Quran5658
data.value: Nor will it be permitted for them to make an excuse.

data.name: Quran5659
data.value: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

data.name: Quran5660
data.value: This is the Day of Judgement; We will have assembled you and the former peoples.

data.name: Quran5661
data.value: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.

data.name: Quran5662
data.value: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

data.name: Quran5663
data.value: Indeed, the righteous will be among shades and springs

data.name: Quran5664
data.value: And fruits from whatever they desire,

data.name: Quran5665
data.value: [Being told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."

data.name: Quran5666
data.value: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

data.name: Quran5667
data.value: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

data.name: Quran5668
data.value: [O disbelievers], eat and enjoy yourselves a little; indeed, you are criminals.

data.name: Quran5669
data.value: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

data.name: Quran5670
data.value: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.

data.name: Quran5671
data.value: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

data.name: Quran5672
data.value: Then in what statement after the Qur'an will they believe?

data.name: Quran5673
data.value: About what are they asking one another?

data.name: Quran5674
data.value: About the great news -

data.name: Quran5675
data.value: That over which they are in disagreement.

data.name: Quran5676
data.value: No! They are going to know.

data.name: Quran5677
data.value: Then, no! They are going to know.

data.name: Quran5678
data.value: Have We not made the earth a resting place?

data.name: Quran5679
data.value: And the mountains as stakes?

data.name: Quran5680
data.value: And We created you in pairs

data.name: Quran5681
data.value: And made your sleep [a means for] rest

data.name: Quran5682
data.value: And made the night as clothing

data.name: Quran5683
data.value: And made the day for livelihood

data.name: Quran5684
data.value: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]

data.name: Quran5685
data.value: And made [therein] a burning lamp

data.name: Quran5686
data.value: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water

data.name: Quran5687
data.value: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation

data.name: Quran5688
data.value: And gardens of entwined growth.

data.name: Quran5689
data.value: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -

data.name: Quran5690
data.value: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes

data.name: Quran5691
data.value: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways

data.name: Quran5692
data.value: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.

data.name: Quran5693
data.value: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait

data.name: Quran5694
data.value: For the transgressors, a place of return,

data.name: Quran5695
data.value: In which they will remain for ages [unending].

data.name: Quran5696
data.value: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink

data.name: Quran5697
data.value: Except scalding water and [foul] purulence -

data.name: Quran5698
data.value: An appropriate recompense.

data.name: Quran5699
data.value: Indeed, they were not expecting an account

data.name: Quran5700
data.value: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.

data.name: Quran5701
data.value: But all things We have enumerated in writing.

data.name: Quran5702
data.value: "So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."

data.name: Quran5703
data.value: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -

data.name: Quran5704
data.value: Gardens and grapevines

data.name: Quran5705
data.value: And full-breasted [companions] of equal age

data.name: Quran5706
data.value: And a full cup.

data.name: Quran5707
data.value: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood -

data.name: Quran5708
data.value: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,

data.name: Quran5709
data.value: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech.

data.name: Quran5710
data.value: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct.

data.name: Quran5711
data.value: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.

data.name: Quran5712
data.value: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust!"

data.name: Quran5713
data.value: By those [angels] who extract with violence

data.name: Quran5714
data.value: And [by] those who remove with ease

data.name: Quran5715
data.value: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming

data.name: Quran5716
data.value: And those who race each other in a race

data.name: Quran5717
data.value: And those who arrange [each] matter,

data.name: Quran5718
data.value: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation],

data.name: Quran5719
data.value: There will follow it the subsequent [one].

data.name: Quran5720
data.value: Hearts, that Day, will tremble,

data.name: Quran5721
data.value: Their eyes humbled.

data.name: Quran5722
data.value: They are [presently] saying, "Will we indeed be returned to [our] former state [of life]?

data.name: Quran5723
data.value: Even if we should be decayed bones?

data.name: Quran5724
data.value: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."

data.name: Quran5725
data.value: Indeed, it will be but one shout,

data.name: Quran5726
data.value: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface.

data.name: Quran5727
data.value: Has there reached you the story of Moses? -

data.name: Quran5728
data.value: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,

data.name: Quran5729
data.value: "Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.

data.name: Quran5730
data.value: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself

data.name: Quran5731
data.value: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"

data.name: Quran5732
data.value: And he showed him the greatest sign,

data.name: Quran5733
data.value: But Pharaoh denied and disobeyed.

data.name: Quran5734
data.value: Then he turned his back, striving.

data.name: Quran5735
data.value: And he gathered [his people] and called out

data.name: Quran5736
data.value: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."

data.name: Quran5737
data.value: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression].

data.name: Quran5738
data.value: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [Allah].

data.name: Quran5739
data.value: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it.

data.name: Quran5740
data.value: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it.

data.name: Quran5741
data.value: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness.

data.name: Quran5742
data.value: And after that He spread the earth.

data.name: Quran5743
data.value: He extracted from it its water and its pasture,

data.name: Quran5744
data.value: And the mountains He set firmly

data.name: Quran5745
data.value: As provision for you and your grazing livestock.

data.name: Quran5746
data.value: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -

data.name: Quran5747
data.value: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,

data.name: Quran5748
data.value: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -

data.name: Quran5749
data.value: So as for he who transgressed

data.name: Quran5750
data.value: And preferred the life of the world,

data.name: Quran5751
data.value: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.

data.name: Quran5752
data.value: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,

data.name: Quran5753
data.value: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.

data.name: Quran5754
data.value: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?

data.name: Quran5755
data.value: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?

data.name: Quran5756
data.value: To your Lord is its finality.

data.name: Quran5757
data.value: You are only a warner for those who fear it.

data.name: Quran5758
data.value: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.

data.name: Quran5759
data.value: The Prophet frowned and turned away

data.name: Quran5760
data.value: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].

data.name: Quran5761
data.value: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified

data.name: Quran5762
data.value: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?

data.name: Quran5763
data.value: As for he who thinks himself without need,

data.name: Quran5764
data.value: To him you give attention.

data.name: Quran5765
data.value: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.

data.name: Quran5766
data.value: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]

data.name: Quran5767
data.value: While he fears [Allah],

data.name: Quran5768
data.value: From him you are distracted.

data.name: Quran5769
data.value: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;

data.name: Quran5770
data.value: So whoever wills may remember it.

data.name: Quran5771
data.value: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,

data.name: Quran5772
data.value: Exalted and purified,

data.name: Quran5773
data.value: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,

data.name: Quran5774
data.value: Noble and dutiful.

data.name: Quran5775
data.value: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.

data.name: Quran5776
data.value: From what substance did He create him?

data.name: Quran5777
data.value: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;

data.name: Quran5778
data.value: Then He eased the way for him;

data.name: Quran5779
data.value: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.

data.name: Quran5780
data.value: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.

data.name: Quran5781
data.value: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.

data.name: Quran5782
data.value: Then let mankind look at his food -

data.name: Quran5783
data.value: How We poured down water in torrents,

data.name: Quran5784
data.value: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],

data.name: Quran5785
data.value: And caused to grow within it grain

data.name: Quran5786
data.value: And grapes and herbage

data.name: Quran5787
data.value: And olive and palm trees

data.name: Quran5788
data.value: And gardens of dense shrubbery

data.name: Quran5789
data.value: And fruit and grass -

data.name: Quran5790
data.value: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.

data.name: Quran5791
data.value: But when there comes the Deafening Blast

data.name: Quran5792
data.value: On the Day a man will flee from his brother

data.name: Quran5793
data.value: And his mother and his father

data.name: Quran5794
data.value: And his wife and his children,

data.name: Quran5795
data.value: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.

data.name: Quran5796
data.value: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -

data.name: Quran5797
data.value: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.

data.name: Quran5798
data.value: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.

data.name: Quran5799
data.value: Blackness will cover them.

data.name: Quran5800
data.value: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.

data.name: Quran5801
data.value: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]

data.name: Quran5802
data.value: And when the stars fall, dispersing,

data.name: Quran5803
data.value: And when the mountains are removed

data.name: Quran5804
data.value: And when full-term she-camels are neglected

data.name: Quran5805
data.value: And when the wild beasts are gathered

data.name: Quran5806
data.value: And when the seas are filled with flame

data.name: Quran5807
data.value: And when the souls are paired

data.name: Quran5808
data.value: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked

data.name: Quran5809
data.value: For what sin she was killed

data.name: Quran5810
data.value: And when the pages are made public

data.name: Quran5811
data.value: And when the sky is stripped away

data.name: Quran5812
data.value: And when Hellfire is set ablaze

data.name: Quran5813
data.value: And when Paradise is brought near,

data.name: Quran5814
data.value: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].

data.name: Quran5815
data.value: So I swear by the retreating stars -

data.name: Quran5816
data.value: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -

data.name: Quran5817
data.value: And by the night as it closes in

data.name: Quran5818
data.value: And by the dawn when it breathes

data.name: Quran5819
data.value: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger

data.name: Quran5820
data.value: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],

data.name: Quran5821
data.value: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.

data.name: Quran5822
data.value: And your companion is not [at all] mad.

data.name: Quran5823
data.value: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.

data.name: Quran5824
data.value: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.

data.name: Quran5825
data.value: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].

data.name: Quran5826
data.value: So where are you going?

data.name: Quran5827
data.value: It is not except a reminder to the worlds

data.name: Quran5828
data.value: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.

data.name: Quran5829
data.value: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.

data.name: Quran5830
data.value: When the sky breaks apart

data.name: Quran5831
data.value: And when the stars fall, scattering,

data.name: Quran5832
data.value: And when the seas are erupted

data.name: Quran5833
