data.value: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,

data.name: Quran5834
data.value: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.

data.name: Quran5835
data.value: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,

data.name: Quran5836
data.value: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?

data.name: Quran5837
data.value: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.

data.name: Quran5838
data.value: No! But you deny the Recompense.

data.name: Quran5839
data.value: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,

data.name: Quran5840
data.value: Noble and recording;

data.name: Quran5841
data.value: They know whatever you do.

data.name: Quran5842
data.value: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,

data.name: Quran5843
data.value: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.

data.name: Quran5844
data.value: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,

data.name: Quran5845
data.value: And never therefrom will they be absent.

data.name: Quran5846
data.value: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

data.name: Quran5847
data.value: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

data.name: Quran5848
data.value: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.

data.name: Quran5849
data.value: Woe to those who give less [than due],

data.name: Quran5850
data.value: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.

data.name: Quran5851
data.value: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.

data.name: Quran5852
data.value: Do they not think that they will be resurrected

data.name: Quran5853
data.value: For a tremendous Day -

data.name: Quran5854
data.value: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?

data.name: Quran5855
data.value: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.

data.name: Quran5856
data.value: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?

data.name: Quran5857
data.value: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.

data.name: Quran5858
data.value: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,

data.name: Quran5859
data.value: Who deny the Day of Recompense.

data.name: Quran5860
data.value: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.

data.name: Quran5861
data.value: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

data.name: Quran5862
data.value: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.

data.name: Quran5863
data.value: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.

data.name: Quran5864
data.value: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.

data.name: Quran5865
data.value: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."

data.name: Quran5866
data.value: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.

data.name: Quran5867
data.value: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?

data.name: Quran5868
data.value: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed

data.name: Quran5869
data.value: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].

data.name: Quran5870
data.value: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure

data.name: Quran5871
data.value: On adorned couches, observing.

data.name: Quran5872
data.value: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.

data.name: Quran5873
data.value: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.

data.name: Quran5874
data.value: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.

data.name: Quran5875
data.value: And its mixture is of Tasneem,

data.name: Quran5876
data.value: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.

data.name: Quran5877
data.value: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.

data.name: Quran5878
data.value: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.

data.name: Quran5879
data.value: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.

data.name: Quran5880
data.value: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."

data.name: Quran5881
data.value: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.

data.name: Quran5882
data.value: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,

data.name: Quran5883
data.value: On adorned couches, observing.

data.name: Quran5884
data.value: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?

data.name: Quran5885
data.value: When the sky has split [open]

data.name: Quran5886
data.value: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]

data.name: Quran5887
data.value: And when the earth has been extended

data.name: Quran5888
data.value: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]

data.name: Quran5889
data.value: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -

data.name: Quran5890
data.value: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.

data.name: Quran5891
data.value: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,

data.name: Quran5892
data.value: He will be judged with an easy account

data.name: Quran5893
data.value: And return to his people in happiness.

data.name: Quran5894
data.value: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,

data.name: Quran5895
data.value: He will cry out for destruction

data.name: Quran5896
data.value: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.

data.name: Quran5897
data.value: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;

data.name: Quran5898
data.value: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].

data.name: Quran5899
data.value: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.

data.name: Quran5900
data.value: So I swear by the twilight glow

data.name: Quran5901
data.value: And [by] the night and what it envelops

data.name: Quran5902
data.value: And [by] the moon when it becomes full

data.name: Quran5903
data.value: [That] you will surely experience state after state.

data.name: Quran5904
data.value: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,

data.name: Quran5905
data.value: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?

data.name: Quran5906
data.value: But those who have disbelieved deny,

data.name: Quran5907
data.value: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.

data.name: Quran5908
data.value: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,

data.name: Quran5909
data.value: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.

data.name: Quran5910
data.value: By the sky containing great stars

data.name: Quran5911
data.value: And [by] the promised Day

data.name: Quran5912
data.value: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,

data.name: Quran5913
data.value: Cursed were the companions of the trench

data.name: Quran5914
data.value: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,

data.name: Quran5915
data.value: When they were sitting near it

data.name: Quran5916
data.value: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.

data.name: Quran5917
data.value: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,

data.name: Quran5918
data.value: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.

data.name: Quran5919
data.value: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.

data.name: Quran5920
data.value: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.

data.name: Quran5921
data.value: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.

data.name: Quran5922
data.value: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.

data.name: Quran5923
data.value: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,

data.name: Quran5924
data.value: Honorable Owner of the Throne,

data.name: Quran5925
data.value: Effecter of what He intends.

data.name: Quran5926
data.value: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -

data.name: Quran5927
data.value: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?

data.name: Quran5928
data.value: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,

data.name: Quran5929
data.value: While Allah encompasses them from behind.

data.name: Quran5930
data.value: But this is an honored Qur'an

data.name: Quran5931
data.value: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.

data.name: Quran5932
data.value: By the sky and the night comer -

data.name: Quran5933
data.value: And what can make you know what is the night comer?

data.name: Quran5934
data.value: It is the piercing star -

data.name: Quran5935
data.value: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.

data.name: Quran5936
data.value: So let man observe from what he was created.

data.name: Quran5937
data.value: He was created from a fluid, ejected,

data.name: Quran5938
data.value: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.

data.name: Quran5939
data.value: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.

data.name: Quran5940
data.value: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,

data.name: Quran5941
data.value: Then man will have no power or any helper.

data.name: Quran5942
data.value: By the sky which returns [rain]

data.name: Quran5943
data.value: And [by] the earth which cracks open,

data.name: Quran5944
data.value: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,

data.name: Quran5945
data.value: And it is not amusement.

data.name: Quran5946
data.value: Indeed, they are planning a plan,

data.name: Quran5947
data.value: But I am planning a plan.

data.name: Quran5948
data.value: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.

data.name: Quran5949
data.value: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,

data.name: Quran5950
data.value: Who created and proportioned

data.name: Quran5951
data.value: And who destined and [then] guided

data.name: Quran5952
data.value: And who brings out the pasture

data.name: Quran5953
data.value: And [then] makes it black stubble.

data.name: Quran5954
data.value: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,

data.name: Quran5955
data.value: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.

data.name: Quran5956
data.value: And We will ease you toward ease.

data.name: Quran5957
data.value: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;

data.name: Quran5958
data.value: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.

data.name: Quran5959
data.value: But the wretched one will avoid it -

data.name: Quran5960
data.value: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,

data.name: Quran5961
data.value: Neither dying therein nor living.

data.name: Quran5962
data.value: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself

data.name: Quran5963
data.value: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.

data.name: Quran5964
data.value: But you prefer the worldly life,

data.name: Quran5965
data.value: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.

data.name: Quran5966
data.value: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,

data.name: Quran5967
data.value: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

data.name: Quran5968
data.value: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?

data.name: Quran5969
data.value: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,

data.name: Quran5970
data.value: Working [hard] and exhausted.

data.name: Quran5971
data.value: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.

data.name: Quran5972
data.value: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.

data.name: Quran5973
data.value: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant

data.name: Quran5974
data.value: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.

data.name: Quran5975
data.value: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.

data.name: Quran5976
data.value: With their effort [they are] satisfied

data.name: Quran5977
data.value: In an elevated garden,

data.name: Quran5978
data.value: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.

data.name: Quran5979
data.value: Within it is a flowing spring.

data.name: Quran5980
data.value: Within it are couches raised high

data.name: Quran5981
data.value: And cups put in place

data.name: Quran5982
data.value: And cushions lined up

data.name: Quran5983
data.value: And carpets spread around.

data.name: Quran5984
data.value: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?

data.name: Quran5985
data.value: And at the sky - how it is raised?

data.name: Quran5986
data.value: And at the mountains - how they are erected?

data.name: Quran5987
data.value: And at the earth - how it is spread out?

data.name: Quran5988
data.value: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.

data.name: Quran5989
data.value: You are not over them a controller.

data.name: Quran5990
data.value: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -

data.name: Quran5991
data.value: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.

data.name: Quran5992
data.value: Indeed, to Us is their return.

data.name: Quran5993
data.value: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.

data.name: Quran5994
data.value: By the dawn

data.name: Quran5995
data.value: And [by] ten nights

data.name: Quran5996
data.value: And [by] the even [number] and the odd

data.name: Quran5997
data.value: And [by] the night when it passes,

data.name: Quran5998
data.value: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?

data.name: Quran5999
data.value: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -

data.name: Quran6000
data.value: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,

data.name: Quran6001
data.value: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?

data.name: Quran6002
data.value: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?

data.name: Quran6003
data.value: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -

data.name: Quran6004
data.value: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands

data.name: Quran6005
data.value: And increased therein the corruption.

data.name: Quran6006
data.value: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.

data.name: Quran6007
data.value: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.

data.name: Quran6008
data.value: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."

data.name: Quran6009
data.value: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."

data.name: Quran6010
data.value: No! But you do not honor the orphan

data.name: Quran6011
data.value: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.

data.name: Quran6012
data.value: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,

data.name: Quran6013
data.value: And you love wealth with immense love.

data.name: Quran6014
data.value: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -

data.name: Quran6015
data.value: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,

data.name: Quran6016
data.value: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?

data.name: Quran6017
data.value: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."

data.name: Quran6018
data.value: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,

data.name: Quran6019
data.value: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].

data.name: Quran6020
data.value: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,

data.name: Quran6021
data.value: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],

data.name: Quran6022
data.value: And enter among My [righteous] servants

data.name: Quran6023
data.value: And enter My Paradise."

data.name: Quran6024
data.value: I swear by this city, Makkah -

data.name: Quran6025
data.value: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -

data.name: Quran6026
data.value: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],

data.name: Quran6027
data.value: We have certainly created man into hardship.

data.name: Quran6028
data.value: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?

data.name: Quran6029
data.value: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."

data.name: Quran6030
data.value: Does he think that no one has seen him?

data.name: Quran6031
data.value: Have We not made for him two eyes?

data.name: Quran6032
data.value: And a tongue and two lips?

data.name: Quran6033
data.value: And have shown him the two ways?

data.name: Quran6034
data.value: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.

data.name: Quran6035
data.value: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?

data.name: Quran6036
data.value: It is the freeing of a slave

data.name: Quran6037
data.value: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger

data.name: Quran6038
data.value: An orphan of near relationship

data.name: Quran6039
data.value: Or a needy person in misery

data.name: Quran6040
data.value: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.

data.name: Quran6041
data.value: Those are the companions of the right.

data.name: Quran6042
data.value: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.

data.name: Quran6043
data.value: Over them will be fire closed in.

data.name: Quran6044
data.value: By the sun and its brightness

data.name: Quran6045
data.value: And [by] the moon when it follows it

data.name: Quran6046
data.value: And [by] the day when it displays it

data.name: Quran6047
data.value: And [by] the night when it covers it

data.name: Quran6048
data.value: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it

data.name: Quran6049
data.value: And [by] the earth and He who spread it

data.name: Quran6050
data.value: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it

data.name: Quran6051
data.value: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,

data.name: Quran6052
data.value: He has succeeded who purifies it,

data.name: Quran6053
data.value: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].

data.name: Quran6054
data.value: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,

data.name: Quran6055
data.value: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.

data.name: Quran6056
data.value: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."

data.name: Quran6057
data.value: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].

data.name: Quran6058
data.value: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.

data.name: Quran6059
data.value: By the night when it covers

data.name: Quran6060
data.value: And [by] the day when it appears

data.name: Quran6061
data.value: And [by] He who created the male and female,

data.name: Quran6062
data.value: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.

data.name: Quran6063
data.value: As for he who gives and fears Allah

data.name: Quran6064
data.value: And believes in the best [reward],

data.name: Quran6065
data.value: We will ease him toward ease.

data.name: Quran6066
data.value: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need

data.name: Quran6067
data.value: And denies the best [reward],

data.name: Quran6068
data.value: We will ease him toward difficulty.

data.name: Quran6069
data.value: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?

data.name: Quran6070
data.value: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.

data.name: Quran6071
data.value: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

data.name: Quran6072
data.value: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.

data.name: Quran6073
data.value: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.

data.name: Quran6074
data.value: Who had denied and turned away.

data.name: Quran6075
data.value: But the righteous one will avoid it -

data.name: Quran6076
data.value: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself

data.name: Quran6077
data.value: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded

data.name: Quran6078
data.value: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.

data.name: Quran6079
data.value: And he is going to be satisfied.

data.name: Quran6080
data.value: By the morning brightness

data.name: Quran6081
data.value: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,

data.name: Quran6082
data.value: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].

data.name: Quran6083
data.value: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].

data.name: Quran6084
data.value: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.

data.name: Quran6085
data.value: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?

data.name: Quran6086
data.value: And He found you lost and guided [you],

data.name: Quran6087
data.value: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.

data.name: Quran6088
data.value: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].

data.name: Quran6089
data.value: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].

data.name: Quran6090
data.value: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].

data.name: Quran6091
data.value: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?

data.name: Quran6092
data.value: And We removed from you your burden

data.name: Quran6093
data.value: Which had weighed upon your back

data.name: Quran6094
data.value: And raised high for you your repute.

data.name: Quran6095
data.value: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

data.name: Quran6096
data.value: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

data.name: Quran6097
data.value: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].

data.name: Quran6098
data.value: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.

data.name: Quran6099
data.value: By the fig and the olive

data.name: Quran6100
data.value: And [by] Mount Sinai

data.name: Quran6101
data.value: And [by] this secure city [Makkah],

data.name: Quran6102
data.value: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;

data.name: Quran6103
data.value: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,

data.name: Quran6104
data.value: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.

data.name: Quran6105
data.value: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?

data.name: Quran6106
data.value: Is not Allah the most just of judges?

data.name: Quran6107
data.value: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -

data.name: Quran6108
data.value: Created man from a clinging substance.

data.name: Quran6109
data.value: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -

data.name: Quran6110
data.value: Who taught by the pen -

data.name: Quran6111
data.value: Taught man that which he knew not.

data.name: Quran6112
data.value: No! [But] indeed, man transgresses

data.name: Quran6113
data.value: Because he sees himself self-sufficient.

data.name: Quran6114
data.value: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.

data.name: Quran6115
data.value: Have you seen the one who forbids

data.name: Quran6116
data.value: A servant when he prays?

data.name: Quran6117
data.value: Have you seen if he is upon guidance

data.name: Quran6118
data.value: Or enjoins righteousness?

data.name: Quran6119
data.value: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -

data.name: Quran6120
data.value: Does he not know that Allah sees?

data.name: Quran6121
data.value: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock -

data.name: Quran6122
data.value: A lying, sinning forelock.

data.name: Quran6123
data.value: Then let him call his associates;

data.name: Quran6124
data.value: We will call the angels of Hell.

data.name: Quran6125
data.value: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].

data.name: Quran6126
data.value: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.

data.name: Quran6127
data.value: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

data.name: Quran6128
data.value: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

data.name: Quran6129
data.value: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.

data.name: Quran6130
data.value: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.

data.name: Quran6131
data.value: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence -

data.name: Quran6132
data.value: A Messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures

data.name: Quran6133
data.value: Within which are correct writings.

data.name: Quran6134
data.value: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence.

data.name: Quran6135
data.value: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion.

data.name: Quran6136
data.value: Indeed, they who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures.

data.name: Quran6137
data.value: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.

data.name: Quran6138
data.value: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.

data.name: Quran6139
data.value: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake

data.name: Quran6140
data.value: And the earth discharges its burdens

data.name: Quran6141
data.value: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -

data.name: Quran6142
data.value: That Day, it will report its news

data.name: Quran6143
data.value: Because your Lord has commanded it.

data.name: Quran6144
data.value: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.

data.name: Quran6145
data.value: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,

data.name: Quran6146
data.value: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.

data.name: Quran6147
data.value: By the racers, panting,

data.name: Quran6148
data.value: And the producers of sparks [when] striking

data.name: Quran6149
data.value: And the chargers at dawn,

data.name: Quran6150
data.value: Stirring up thereby [clouds of] dust,

data.name: Quran6151
data.value: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,

data.name: Quran6152
data.value: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.

data.name: Quran6153
data.value: And indeed, he is to that a witness.

data.name: Quran6154
data.value: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.

data.name: Quran6155
data.value: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered

data.name: Quran6156
data.value: And that within the breasts is obtained,

data.name: Quran6157
data.value: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.

data.name: Quran6158
data.value: The Striking Calamity -

data.name: Quran6159
data.value: What is the Striking Calamity?

data.name: Quran6160
data.value: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?

data.name: Quran6161
data.value: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,

data.name: Quran6162
data.value: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.

data.name: Quran6163
data.value: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],

data.name: Quran6164
data.value: He will be in a pleasant life.

data.name: Quran6165
data.value: But as for one whose scales are light,

data.name: Quran6166
data.value: His refuge will be an abyss.

data.name: Quran6167
data.value: And what can make you know what that is?

data.name: Quran6168
data.value: It is a Fire, intensely hot.

data.name: Quran6169
data.value: Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you

data.name: Quran6170
data.value: Until you visit the graveyards.

data.name: Quran6171
data.value: No! You are going to know.

data.name: Quran6172
data.value: Then no! You are going to know.

data.name: Quran6173
data.value: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...

data.name: Quran6174
data.value: You will surely see the Hellfire.

data.name: Quran6175
data.value: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.

data.name: Quran6176
data.value: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.

data.name: Quran6177
data.value: By time,

data.name: Quran6178
data.value: Indeed, mankind is in loss,

data.name: Quran6179
data.value: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.

data.name: Quran6180
data.value: Woe to every scorner and mocker

data.name: Quran6181
data.value: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.

data.name: Quran6182
data.value: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.

data.name: Quran6183
data.value: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.

data.name: Quran6184
data.value: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?

data.name: Quran6185
data.value: It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,

data.name: Quran6186
data.value: Which mounts directed at the hearts.

data.name: Quran6187
data.value: Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them

data.name: Quran6188
data.value: In extended columns.

data.name: Quran6189
data.value: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?

data.name: Quran6190
data.value: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?

data.name: Quran6191
data.value: And He sent against them birds in flocks,

data.name: Quran6192
data.value: Striking them with stones of hard clay,

data.name: Quran6193
data.value: And He made them like eaten straw.

data.name: Quran6194
data.value: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -

data.name: Quran6195
data.value: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -

data.name: Quran6196
data.value: Let them worship the Lord of this House,

data.name: Quran6197
data.value: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.

data.name: Quran6198
data.value: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?

data.name: Quran6199
data.value: For that is the one who drives away the orphan

data.name: Quran6200
data.value: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.

data.name: Quran6201
data.value: So woe to those who pray

data.name: Quran6202
data.value: [But] who are heedless of their prayer -

data.name: Quran6203
data.value: Those who make show [of their deeds]

data.name: Quran6204
data.value: And withhold [simple] assistance.

data.name: Quran6205
data.value: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.

data.name: Quran6206
data.value: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].

data.name: Quran6207
data.value: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.

data.name: Quran6208
data.value: Say, "O disbelievers,

data.name: Quran6209
data.value: I do not worship what you worship.

data.name: Quran6210
data.value: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.

data.name: Quran6211
data.value: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.

data.name: Quran6212
data.value: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.

data.name: Quran6213
data.value: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."

data.name: Quran6214
data.value: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,

data.name: Quran6215
data.value: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,

data.name: Quran6216
data.value: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.

data.name: Quran6217
data.value: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

data.name: Quran6218
data.value: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.

data.name: Quran6219
data.value: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame

data.name: Quran6220
data.value: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.

data.name: Quran6221
data.value: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.

data.name: Quran6222
data.value: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One,

data.name: Quran6223
data.value: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.

data.name: Quran6224
data.value: He neither begets nor is born,

data.name: Quran6225
data.value: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."

data.name: Quran6226
data.value: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak

data.name: Quran6227
data.value: From the evil of that which He created

data.name: Quran6228
data.value: And from the evil of darkness when it settles

data.name: Quran6229
data.value: And from the evil of the blowers in knots

data.name: Quran6230
data.value: And from the evil of an envier when he envies."

data.name: Quran6231
data.value: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,

data.name: Quran6232
data.value: The Sovereign of mankind.

data.name: Quran6233
data.value: The God of mankind,

data.name: Quran6234
data.value: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -

data.name: Quran6235
data.value: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -

data.name: Quran6236
data.value: From among the jinn and mankind."
